K10bsu018_u:213: kṣāntibalino vīryabalino dhyānabalinaḥ prajñābalinaḥ śamathabalino vipaśyanābalino

K10bsu018_u:217: ye ca tatra padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā dhyānāhārāste bodhisattvā dharmāhārā gandhāhārāstadyathāpi nāma devā (KpSū 17)
K10bsu018_u:225: peyālaṃ na kleśaśabdo na parigraho na cātrāndhakāraṃ na durgandhaṃ na cittaklamatā na kāyaklamatā na narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:227: na kaṇṭakagahanapāṣāṇaśarkarā na cāgnirna candrasūryā na tārakārūpā na mahāsamudrā na sumerucakravāḍā na lokāntarikā na kālaparvatā na mīḍhapāṣāṇā na pāṃśuparvatāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:231: atha ca punaḥ padmā lokadhāturnityaṃ buddhābhayā bodhisattvābhayā puṇyābhayā ratnābhayā udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā /
K10bsu018_u:232: saphalāścātra nāma pakṣiṇomanojñāḥ snigdhāḥ svakasvakena svareṇa indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni pravyāharanti sma“
K10bsu018_u:233: atha khalu ratnavairocano bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “kiyanmahatī bhagavan sā padmā lokadhātuḥ?, (KpSū 18)

K10bsu018_u:250: padmā buddhakṣetramevākīrṇā bodhisattvaiḥ tadyathā sukhāvatī lokadhāturbodhisattvairākīrṇā /

K10bsu018_u:252: padmottarasya kulaputra tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
K10bsu018_u:253: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye padmāyāṃ lokadhātau pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyiṣyanti vā teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuḥpramāṇaṃ /

K10bsu018_u:255: na tvevaṃ pariśuddhābhūnna tvevam ākīrṇā śuddhasattvairbabhūva yathaitarhi padmā lokadhātuḥ /

K10bsu018_u:257: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
K10bsu018_u:262: ye cāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvāsteṣām etadavocan - “adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvāsyati,

K10bsu018_u:266: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:267: “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśābhyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
K10bsu018_u:269: tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
K10bsu018_u:270: padmottaro nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃs” /
K10bsu018_u:271: tatkālaṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:272: upetya candrottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samādhānabalena nānāprakārairbodhisattvavikurvaiścandrottamasya (KpSū 21)
K10bsu018_u:273: tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvaśca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavantametadavocan - “icchāmo vayam bhadanta bhagavan nime daśābhyantarakalpā nirodhamavahitena cittenātināmayituṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:274: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam
K10bsu018_u:277: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddho bhagavanto yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:278: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaste 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāmimaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ deśayiṣyanti / tadyathā;
K10bsu018_u:279: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke sammade mahāsammade devāṃ aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭhakke amimakasi (KpSū 22)
K10bsu018_u:280: hilicilitili ruruke mahāruruke jaye durjaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi amūle
K10bsu018_u:281: ale amūlaparichinne mārasainya vitrāsane mukte muktapariśuddhe abhīte bhayamocane
K10bsu018_u:283: nigrahaṃ paravādināṃ dharmavādināmanugrahaṃ ārakṣā dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadamidaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:284: buddhakāśaye amama nimama avevi arthe arthani stīraṇe lokādhimukte sandadha paribhāvane,
K10bsu018_u:286: bhāṣīthe bhāṣaṇe dhāre dhārayati gupte śubhe śubhaprade tatphale agraphale 'niṣphale
K10bsu018_u:287: nilaha samukta amukta nirmukte atravita vimuktavati vilaphala ayukta iviti diviti
K10bsu018_u:288: ratitula tulamaṃ ahiṃsāma ititāva atvānatvāna sarvaloka anaka livindha abhūsare hatamatte
K10bsu018_u:292: jaḍataḥ aniharavavatavyo idaṃ phalaṃ niyomaphalaṃ samudānāya vibhuṣa paśya sāmantra
K10bsu018_u:293: anumanto akumanto chedāvane mantrastā daśabala vigrahasthā isusthita sunikhama tīkṣṇamati
K10bsu018_u:296: anye manye mane mamane vire virate śame śamitā viśānte mukte nirakṣame same samasame
K10bsu018_u:297: kṣaye akṣaye ajiti śānte samiṣṭhe dhāraṇī ālokāvabhāse ratnavrate raśmyavate jñānavate
K10bsu018_u:300: cakṣa ābhāsanidarśane jñānālokanidarśanaṃ ca prabhāsane sarvendriya bhūmātikrante sarvasarve vamāṃ sarve prāthavā kṣayaṃ kare gokāha vadane lokānudarśana vibhū,
K10bsu018_u:303: acale buddhe dṛdhapracale sattve gṛhna siddhi kaṃpati nisiddha smahiddhe parekasire
K10bsu018_u:304: some caṇḍe datve acale acale apare vicivale nipare pracacale prasare anayan prabhyāse
K10bsu018_u:305: kaṃkame prabhāvini same nijase grakrame nayute,
K10bsu018_u:307: puṣpe supuṣpe drumaparihāre abhayarucire cekaratke akṣayamastu ninile mamale pañcaśiśire lokasya vijñāne nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte succendena,
K10bsu018_u:309: cakravajre maitra samāpade krānte kete karuṇa rudīkṣayi prītirūpe kṣamasaṃpanne arake varate kharo khare amūle mūle sādhane,
K10bsu018_u:311: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare prare hile hile dhare ārūpāvate huhure yathā jibhaṃga niṃbare yathāgne yathāparaṃ cariniśe yathā bhayaririśi (KpSū 25)
K10bsu018_u:312: satyanirhāra jaracavila vīryanirhāra cure mārganirhāra samādhinirhāra prajñānirhāra
K10bsu018_u:314: padāścaturuttaratathāgatena adbhutaṃ niradbhutaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ abuddha ihabuddhaṃ tatrabuddhaṃ
K10bsu018_u:315: nihaṃgamapare alaha dalaha paṇḍare paṇḍare tatrāntalu māṃgagharaṇi pūṭani saṃpūṭani
K10bsu018_u:316: gatapraṃgamanuniruva nāśani nāśabandhani cicchini cicchidra mayova hidiṃgamā vare
K10bsu018_u:317: mare hanane bharaṃ bhare bhinde bhire bhire ruṣare śaraṇe darane pravartte varaṇāḍaye
K10bsu018_u:318: vidranvumā varakhumā brahmacāriṇa indravani dhidhirāyani maheśvaralalani mamasume
K10bsu018_u:319: alamini ekākṣaraci vaṃcani carasti ābhicaṇḍāla sūre sarvasurā āvarasurā punakanitāṃ
K10bsu018_u:320: paṇḍitāṃ āyinakaṇḍi jabhāme gandhare atra runimakare bhirohiṇī siddhamatte vilokamate,
K10bsu018_u:323: samanantarārabdhe khalu punarbhagavatā asmin sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe atha
K10bsu018_u:324: tāvadiyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kaṃpitā prakaṃpitā saṃprakaṃpitā
K10bsu018_u:325: calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kṣubhitā prakṣubhitā saṃprakṣubhitā garjitā pragarjitā saṃpragarjitā,
K10bsu018_u:327: tathārūpaścāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ yaddaśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:328: naiva tasmin samaye sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaḥ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
K10bsu018_u:329: daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamātikrāntā lokadhātavaḥ samāpāṇitalajātā saṃdṛśyante /
K10bsu018_u:330: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu prativasanti,
K10bsu018_u:332: te tathāgatabalena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvantarhitā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā,
K10bsu018_u:333: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakārairvividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva niṣeduḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaśravaṇārthaṃ
K10bsu018_u:335: yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:338: ye cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sannipatitāste sarve padmāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyanti sma,
K10bsu018_u:339: padmottaraṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇena parivṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:341: dhāraṇīpratilabdhāśca te bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntān lokadhātusthān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma,
K10bsu018_u:343: āścaryaprāptāste samādhibalena bodhisattvavikurvitena ca buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasthuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:344: bhagavāṃstān evam āha - “imaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo
K10bsu018_u:349: pratilabdho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabhate mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:350: kevalamasya samādheḥ pratilābhāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān avabudhyate sarvajñajñānaṃ ca pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:352: imāṃ ca dhāraṇīṃ svabhāvena buddhvā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmāṃ deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:354: paśyata kulaputrāsyāḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśāyā dhāraṇyā anubhāvenāyaṃ mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya prādurbhūtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:358: ye ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanantāparyantā devāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā nāgā yakṣāsuramanuṣyāmanuṣyā vā imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ
K10bsu018_u:360: likhamānaścāvirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānena yāvadanuttareṇa parinirvāṇena; (KpSū 29)
K10bsu018_u:361: svādhyāyamānaśca bodhisattva imaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvāṇi gāḍhakarmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ kṣapayati,
K10bsu018_u:364: yadi tasya bodhisattvasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāṇi syurupacitāṇi tānyapyasya parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:366: yasya nāstyanantaryāṇi tasya tena janmanā sarvāṇyanyāni karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:368: yo 'pi na bhāvayati na svādhyāyati śṛṇvanaśca dharmabhāṇakasya paṭṭaṃ bandhati,
K10bsu018_u:369: tasya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanto dhriyanto yāpayantaḥ anyalokadhātusthāḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti,
K10bsu018_u:371: na cireṇa cāsau bodhisattvaḥ paṭṭaparityāgena yauvarājye 'bhiṣicyate,
K10bsu018_u:373: evameva yaḥ kaścid gandhena pūjāṃ karoti so 'pi na cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhigandhasya lābhī bhavati,
K10bsu018_u:376: bhakṣyānnapānaṃ dattvā dharmabhāṇakasyānuttarasya tathāgatāhārasya lābhī bhavati bodhisattvaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:378: yaśca dharmabhāṇakaṃ ratnairācchādayati so 'pyacirāt saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipākṣikadharmaratnāṇāṃ lābhī bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:379: tadevaṃ mahārthikaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:382: anena ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaṅgapratibhānatāṃ pratilabhate,
K10bsu018_u:384: ebhiḥ kulaputra sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaiścandrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavādata tathaiva pṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
K10bsu018_u:386: gaṇanātikrāntāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇyudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan /
K10bsu018_u:387: evameva samāni pāṇitalopamāni viṣamāni pṛthivīpradeśāni dṛśyante /
K10bsu018_u:388: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu (KpSū 31)
K10bsu018_u:390: evameva daśabhyo digbhyo gaṇanāsamatikrāntebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo gaṇanāsamatikrāntā
K10bsu018_u:394: tatra kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K10bsu018_u:395: āmantrayate - “abhijānāmyahaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāsta imān
K10bsu018_u:396: daśāntarakalpān nirodhām avahitena cetasā viharitvāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvā asya gaganamudrasya
K10bsu018_u:399: imān daśāntarakalpān dharmaṃ śrutvā daśasu dikṣu teṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
K10bsu018_u:400: teṣāṃ gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ bhagavatāmantike cittamabhiprasādya
K10bsu018_u:404: daśānāmantarakalpānām atyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttaraṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati?” /
K10bsu018_u:406: eṣām daśānām antarakalpānāmatyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
K10bsu018_u:409: tatra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāntikāddharmaṃ śroṣyati taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā kuśalamulānyavaropayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:411: so 'bhisaṃbuddhabodhiṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravaracakraṃ avaivartikacakraṃ pravartayitvā bahubodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāvaivartikāṃ
K10bsu018_u:412: ye bodhisattvā iha daśāntarakalpān tasya sakāśādimaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaṃ deśāmānaṃ śroṣyanti te tasmin samaye dharmaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu018_u:413: ye tu kalpaṃ śroṣyanti te bodhisattvāstasmin samaye bhūmimavakramiṣyanti,
K10bsu018_u:416: tasminneva samaye imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ paryantato lapsyante” ityuktvā,
K10bsu018_u:417: candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vividhāni buddhaviṣayaprātihāryāṇi saṃdarśayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:418: gaganamudrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nārāyaṇaṃ samādhiṃ nidarśayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:424: yena bodhyāsane supravartitadharmacakro bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10bsu018_u:426: yena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamāno bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi avaivartikāṃ sthāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:428: bodhisattvasaṅghena bhagavatāḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya sthitāścandrottamo
K10bsu018_u:430: ca bodhisattvāstasyāmeva rātryāmatyayāt tasya bhagavataḥ śarīre pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśanti sma /
K10bsu018_u:432: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāste nirodhasamādhānenaitān daśāntarakalpān atināmayanti /
K10bsu018_u:433: gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10bsu018_u:434: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ daśāntarakalpān kuśalamūlānyavaropitavān /
K10bsu018_u:439: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe bhāṣyamāṇe aśītīnāṃ bodhisattvanayutaśatasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabdhā,
K10bsu018_u:444: atha khalu ratnacandravairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “katamairbhadanta bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate?” /
K10bsu018_u:445: bhagavān āha - “caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:449: , iha bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa cīvareṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:456: asmin prathame āryavaṃśe vyavasthito bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:458: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāreṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:462: pratilabdhvāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'gṛddho hyagrathito 'mūrcchito 'navadhyavasito 'nadhyavasānamāpanna ādīnavadarśī niḥsaraṇaṃ prajānaṃ paribhuṅkte
K10bsu018_u:464: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate bhāvayati ca /
K10bsu018_u:465: aparaiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:467: , iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ātmanā śīlavāṃ viharati,
K10bsu018_u:471: parānapi śīlavirahitāṃ dṛṣṭvā śīlasaṃpade samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:472: anena prathamena dharmaṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:473: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dṛṣṭivyasanagatāṃ sattvāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ vyutthāpya samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:476: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nācāravyasanagatāṃ sattvān samyagācāre samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:477: anena tṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:478: punaraparam āśayavipannān sattvān āśayasaṃpattau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:479: anena caturtheṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:480: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne saṃprasthitān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati
K10bsu018_u:481: anena pañcamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:482: ebhiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:483: aparaiḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:485: , iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayameva bahuśruto bhavati śrutādhāraḥ śrutasannicayaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:486: tasya ye te dharmā ādau kalyāṇā madhye kalyāṇāḥ paryavasāne kalyāṇāḥ svarthāḥ suvyañjanāḥ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ (KpSū 38)
K10bsu018_u:488: tadrūpā anena dharmā bahavaḥ śrutā bhavanti dhṛtā vacasā paricitā manasā anvīkṣitā dṛṣṭyā supratividhāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:489: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ samānaḥ parān aśrutān sattvān bāhuśrutye samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:492: sa parān īrsyāmātsaryābhibhūtān sattvān anīrṣyāyām tyāgasaṃpadi ca samādāpayati yāvat pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K10bsu018_u:493: anena dvitīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:496: akuhakaśca bhavatyalapako 'śaṭhaśca bhavatyamāyāvī śūnyatayā ca bahulīviharati /

K10bsu018_u:498: evaṃrūpairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvān samāsavistareṇa saptavarṣāṇīmān (KpSū 39)

K10bsu018_u:503: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambhād bodhisattvo mahāsattvastadrūpam āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ pratilabhate,
K10bsu018_u:504: yena prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tiṣṭhato dhriyato yāpayato mahāprātihāryavidarśayataḥ sarvāṃ paśyati,
K10bsu018_u:505: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smitavidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā caturaśītidhāraṇīmukhasahasrāṇi pratilabhate,
K10bsu018_u:508: asyāṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabhate,
K10bsu018_u:510: yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā bhavati tena yadi pañcānantaryāṇī karmāṇyācīrṇāni bhavati,
K10bsu018_u:513: tṛtīye janmani niravaśeṣaṃ tāni karmāṇi naṣṭāni bhavanti,
K10bsu018_u:515: yasya tu bodhisattvasya nānantaryāṇi karmāni kṛtāni bhavanti tasyānyāni sarvakarmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:519: evaṃ bahukaraḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:520: satatasamitaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smitavidarśanāt prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpeṇa ṛddhiviṣayena samanvāgato bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:521: yad gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhasamādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ
K10bsu018_u:523: evaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ karmaparikṣayāya saṃvartate kuśalābhivṛddhaye /
K10bsu018_u:524: ye ca kulaputra sattvā asyāḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇyā nāma śroṣyanti (KpSū 41)
K10bsu018_u:528: atha te bodhisattvā evamāhuḥ - “asmābhirbhadanta bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu atīteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu tiṣṭhatsu dhriyatsu yāpayatsu iyaṃ dhāraṇī śrutā ca pratilabdhā ca” /

K10bsu018_u:540: sālendrarājo nāma buddho 'bhūd vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathīḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /

K10bsu018_u:555: yathaiva te maitreyāśāparipūrṇāśaktastvaṃ maitreya śīghramevānuttareṇa jñānenānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau praveṣṭuṃ /
K10bsu018_u:556: yacca tvaṃ maitreya iyacciraṃ saṃsāre 'bhiratastat sarvaṃ praṇidhānavaśena kālaprekṣiṇā,
K10bsu018_u:557: tena te maitreya etarhi mamāntikādyauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ,

K10bsu018_u:592: tatra bhagavān vaiśāradyasamavasaraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvamāmantrayate sma - “durlabhaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo;
K10bsu018_u:595: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ,

K10bsu018_u:609: na hi kulaputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyathā kathayanti” /
K10bsu018_u:612: mukhācca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ pracchādya tasmājjihvendriyāt
K10bsu018_u:613: ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyaḥ pramuktāstaiśca raśmibhiḥ ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturudāreṇāvabhāsena (KpSū 48)
K10bsu018_u:616: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva
K10bsu018_u:617: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya sattvasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K10bsu018_u:618: samalaṅkṛtagātraḥ aśītibhiranuvyañjanairvirājitatanuryaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā
K10bsu018_u:621: te bhagavataḥ sakāśe premaprasādaṃ gauravaṃ ca saṃjanayanti /
K10bsu018_u:622: bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ kathayati - “bhoḥ sattvā evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣadhvaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:625: tataste nairayikāḥ sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācamudīrayanti,
K10bsu018_u:627: atha te nairayikāḥ sattvāstena kuśalamūlena tena ca cittaprasādena tataścyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā,
K10bsu018_u:632: evaṃ pretānāṃ piśācānāṃ kṣuttṛṣṇāprajvalitagātrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ te raśmayo bubhukṣāgniṃ nirvāṇaṃ kurvanti,
K10bsu018_u:634: ekaikasya pretasya nirmitaṃ buddharūpamagrataḥ sthitaṃ bhavati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaṃ aśītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ;
K10bsu018_u:635: taṃ dṛṣṭvā te pretā buddhadarśanāt sukhā prīṇitagātrā evaṃ cintayantaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:637: te bhagavataḥ sakāśe prasādaṃ premagauravaṃ cotpādayanti /
K10bsu018_u:644: atha te pretasattvāstena kuśalamūlena tataścyavitvā kecid deveṣūpapannāḥ ekatyā manuṣyeṣvevaṃ tiraścāṃ saṃcodayanti,
K10bsu018_u:646: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśaṃ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu018_u:653: atha khalu śāntimatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavatā svarddhyābhisaṃskāre pratiprasraṃbhite bhagavantam etad avocat /
K10bsu018_u:654: “ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad anyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrā apagatakaluṣā apagatapañcakaṣāyā nānāguṇavyūhā buddhakṣetrāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:655: sarve cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nānāviddhaguṇaparipūrṇā nānāsukhasamarpitā,

K10bsu018_u:660: catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ trīṇī yānāny ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati? /

K10bsu018_u:668: , tathā mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham etarhy evaṃ pratikaṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetra upapannaḥ /

K10bsu018_u:673: tasmiṃś ca mahākalpe buddhakṣetre tasyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ araṇemī nāma rājābhūc caturdvīpakaḥ cakravartī /

K10bsu018_u:676: jātamātrasya ca devaśatasahasraiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā samudragarbha iti nāma sthāpitaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:677: so 'pareṇa samayena niṣkramya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya (KpSū 53)
K10bsu018_u:680: dharmacakrapravartanena sa bhagavān bhahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ svargamokṣaphale pratiṣṭhāpitavān /

K10bsu018_u:683: tatra “bahir nagarasya nātidūre jambūvano nāmodyāne ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati sārdham anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair” iti aśroṣīd,
K10bsu018_u:684: rājāraṇemī “ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyakasaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpto jambūvanodyāne viharati anekaiḥ śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:686: upasaṃkramya taṃ tathāgatam satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:687: athāraṇemī rājārājarddhyā mahatā ca rājānubhāvenānekaiḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nagarān nirjagāma,
K10bsu018_u:689: yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena yātvā padbhyām evārāmaṃ prāviśad, yena (KpSū 54)
K10bsu018_u:691: upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdad,
K10bsu018_u:692: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānam araṇeminaṃ ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati
K10bsu018_u:693: anekaparyāyeṇa dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā tūṣṇīm abhūt /
K10bsu018_u:694: atha rājāraṇemī utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya yena ratnagarbhas
K10bsu018_u:695: tathāgatas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnagarbham tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etad avocat /
K10bsu018_u:696: “adhivāsayatu me bhagavān idam traimāsaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
K10bsu018_u:698: adhivāsayati kulaputra ratnagarbhas tathāgato rājño 'raṇeminaḥ tūṣṇībhāvena /
K10bsu018_u:699: atha rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:704: so 'haṃ yo me kaścid upabhogaparibhoga upasthānaṃ paricaryāntaḥpuraṃ ca gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato nivedayāmi bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
K10bsu018_u:705: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca” /
K10bsu018_u:708: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:716: tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
K10bsu018_u:718: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā bhagavata upari ratnavṛkṣaṃ dhārayati /
K10bsu018_u:719: sa ca vṛkṣo 'laṅkṛtaḥ saptabhī ratnairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairvicitraiścābharaṇairnānāvidhaiśca mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:721: yā cāraṇemino rājño 'gramahiṣī sā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitā,
K10bsu018_u:724: tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
K10bsu018_u:725: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt,
K10bsu018_u:728: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:729: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ yathā bhagavatastathā,
K10bsu018_u:730: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati,
K10bsu018_u:733: bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ vijahāra sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
K10bsu018_u:734: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K10bsu018_u:735: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat,
K10bsu018_u:736: praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā,
K10bsu018_u:738: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ (KpSū 58)
K10bsu018_u:740: svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa
K10bsu018_u:741: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:743: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti,
K10bsu018_u:744: divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
K10bsu018_u:745: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti,
K10bsu018_u:747: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
K10bsu018_u:748: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
K10bsu018_u:752: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān /
K10bsu018_u:753: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu018_u:755: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī /
K10bsu018_u:757: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
K10bsu018_u:758: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
K10bsu018_u:761: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:764: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:765: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
K10bsu018_u:767: chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi
K10bsu018_u:770: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:771: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:776: punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca” /
K10bsu018_u:777: (KpSū 61) yacca rājño 'raṇeminaḥ putrasahasraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya bhagavantamekaikamidamavocat
K10bsu018_u:781: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:782: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:783: tadyathā rājāraṇemī tathaivamanimiṣapramukhaṃ rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ
K10bsu018_u:784: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:785: sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate,
K10bsu018_u:786: sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K10bsu018_u:789: 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto,
K10bsu018_u:792: yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:795: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā,
K10bsu018_u:796: so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni
K10bsu018_u:800: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
K10bsu018_u:802: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:803: animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
K10bsu018_u:804: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:851: yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ (KpSū 64)
K10bsu018_u:853: evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa,
K10bsu018_u:854: tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
K10bsu018_u:855: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ
K10bsu018_u:856: keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayanti,
K10bsu018_u:857: adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti (KpSū 65)
K10bsu018_u:859: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrayate,
K10bsu018_u:862: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena //
K10bsu018_u:863: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi /
K10bsu018_u:866: kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
K10bsu018_u:871: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā
K10bsu018_u:872: kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha
K10bsu018_u:874: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt,
K10bsu018_u:875: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
K10bsu018_u:876: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
K10bsu018_u:877: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
K10bsu018_u:879: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
K10bsu018_u:881: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
K10bsu018_u:886: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
K10bsu018_u:888: rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante,
K10bsu018_u:890: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti /
K10bsu018_u:891: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:893: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati,
K10bsu018_u:894: śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān /
K10bsu018_u:895: punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
K10bsu018_u:900: bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha,
K10bsu018_u:906: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:908: “hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai
K10bsu018_u:909: rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā
K10bsu018_u:912: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:913: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K10bsu018_u:914: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ (KpSū 69)
K10bsu018_u:916: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā
K10bsu018_u:917: bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triśaraṇakriyāvastuṣu sthāpitāni vinītāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K10bsu018_u:918: yacca mayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saptavarṣāṇyupanimantritaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
K10bsu018_u:919: tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ padmānyanupreṣitāni /
K10bsu018_u:921: tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
K10bsu018_u:926: yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni dhyāyamānāni,
K10bsu018_u:928: yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru,
K10bsu018_u:929: yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā dattāni /
K10bsu018_u:930: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye,
K10bsu018_u:934: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma,
K10bsu018_u:935: upetya svayameva bhagavato hastaśaucamupanāmayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
K10bsu018_u:936: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
K10bsu018_u:937: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
K10bsu018_u:938: viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
K10bsu018_u:940: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:941: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat,
K10bsu018_u:942: praviśya ca yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu018_u:943: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /
K10bsu018_u:944: bhagavān āha - “yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt mahāntamavabhāsaṃ yenāvabhāsena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu (KpSū 71)
K10bsu018_u:945: buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭā tava padmāni visarjayanti,
K10bsu018_u:946: teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ pramuñcamānāste ca raśmayastava mukhe praviśanti /
K10bsu018_u:948: tena tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāśca,
K10bsu018_u:949: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:950: yacca tvayā sarvasattvārthaṃ mahāyajñasyārambhaḥ kṛtastena tvaṃ brāhmaṇa buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:951: ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:952: yaiśca tava padmāni visarjitāni suvarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni asmagarbhakeśarāṇi,
K10bsu018_u:953: teṣu ca sarveṣu padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛśyante /
K10bsu018_u:955: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt svapne ye daśausu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca
K10bsu018_u:959: yasyāṃ eva rātrau tvaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase tasyāṃ eva rātrau daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣūdāraḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko 'bhyudgacchate,
K10bsu018_u:960: upari ca yāvad brahmalokaparyantaṃ kṛtvā na śakyante tava mūrdhānaṃ vyavalokayituṃ brahmādibhirdevalokairapi /
K10bsu018_u:962: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣit mahāntamātmabhāvaṃ yāvad brahmalokaṃ yacca sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ mālā śīrasi baddhā,
K10bsu018_u:963: tadye tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:964: te ca tavābhisaṃbuddhabodherbrāhmaṇa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu deśasu dikṣu sthitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante
K10bsu018_u:965: sarve ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitā te tavābhīkṣṇaṃ varṇaṃ udāhariṣyanti,
K10bsu018_u:966: “anena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
K10bsu018_u:969: te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān visarjayiṣyanti tava pūjākarmaṇe,
K10bsu018_u:973: tatra tava sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhāḥ samādhirdhāraṇīḥ kṣāntiśca pratilapsyante /
K10bsu018_u:974: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā tava varṇaṃ uccārayiṣyanti ghoṣamanuśrāvayiṣyanti /
K10bsu018_u:976: yattvayā brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭā bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni tava kukṣau praviśya padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭā dhyāyanti,
K10bsu018_u:977: abhisaṃbuddhabodhiśca tvaṃ brāhmaṇa bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayiṣyasi avaivartikāni sthāpayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:978: te tava parinirvṛtasya brāhmaṇānuttareṇa parinirvāṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
K10bsu018_u:979: kalpeṣu paścāddaśāsu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te buddhā bhagavanto dharmeṇa rājyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:981: “evam asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatikrānteṣu evaṃnāmā tathāgato abhūd arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:982: tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃboddhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā,
K10bsu018_u:986: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭavān sūkaramukhena yāvacchvamukhena rudhiramrakṣitena
K10bsu018_u:987: gātreṇānekavidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā hīna eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇāste 'pyanye vividhaiḥ
K10bsu018_u:989: punarapyāpyāyitakāyā rudhirābhyaktena kāyena yāvacchvamukhena bahuvidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā punarhīnasyairaṇḍavṛkṣasya mūle niṣaṇṇā vividhaiśca prāṇibhiḥ khādyante /
K10bsu018_u:990: te tvayā mohapuruṣāstrividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni samādāpitā prātiṣṭhāpitā dāne yame saṃyame ca,
K10bsu018_u:994: trividhe ca puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpitā deveṣu devarājyamabhilaṣanti manuṣyeṣu caikadvīpaiśvaryamākāṅkṣante /
K10bsu018_u:997: evaṃ te mohapuruṣāḥ sarve tvayā trividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni
K10bsu018_u:1000: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapnamadrākṣīt apare manuṣyā mahiṣarathābhirūdhāḥ sumanāmālālāṅkṛtaśirasaḥ apathena dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:1001: te 'pi tvayā brāhmaṇa kulaputrāḥ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ kevalamātmadamanārthaṃ ātmaśamanārthaṃ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1003: atha khalu kulaputra brāhmaṇaḥ samudrareṇū rājānamāraṇeminametadavocat - “durlabhaṃ mahārāja manuṣyatvaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1013: dakacandropamā bālāḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairatṛptā viṣayeṣu mattā devamāṇuṣāṃ śriyamabhilaṣanti /
K10bsu018_u:1014: te bālāḥ punaḥ punarnarakeṣu kāraṇāduḥkhamanubhavanti tiryakṣu saṃmohaduḥkhaṃ preteṣu
K10bsu018_u:1015: kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ manuṣyeṣu priyaviprayogaduḥkhaṃ deveṣu cyavanaduḥkhaṃ punargarbhavāsaduḥkhaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1019: , kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ na kurvanti na vyāyamanti aprāptasya prāptaye 'nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai /
K10bsu018_u:1020: evaṃ mūrkhā bālāḥ khidyante bodhicittena yatra sarvaduḥkhakṣayo bhavati,
K10bsu018_u:1021: saṃsāreṇa ca na khidyante nodvijanti yatra punaḥ punarduḥkhotpattirbhavati /
K10bsu018_u:1022: parīkṣasva mahārāja yathā saṃsāraḥ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1023: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja kṛtādhikāro bhagavataḥ śāsane 'varopitakuśalamūlastriṣu ratneṣu labdhaprasādaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1025: mahābhogatāyai rakṣitaśīlaḥ svargopapattipratilābhāya śruto bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ prajñāmahādharmapratilābhāya te saṃpatsyante /
K10bsu018_u:1029: yanmahābrāhmaṇa mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1065: rājā prāha - “ayaṃ brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ aśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ loka utpanno,
K10bsu018_u:1067: ye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlaste sattvāḥ phale sthitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1069: utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāstu ye sattvāste bodhau avaivartyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1072: katame sattvā bhagavatā vinītāḥ sadekasattvasyāpi duḥkhaṃ na praśāntaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1076: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caraṃstenāhaṃ mahājñānasamucchrayeṇa acintyenodāreṇa dharmamukhapraveśena sattvān vinayeyaṃ buddhakāryaṃ ca kuryāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1077: na kevalamasmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhāya cittaṃ (KpSū 80)
K10bsu018_u:1080: tadāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yadāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca spṛśeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1081: sarvaṃ ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ praśamayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:1082: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastādṛśamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān tadādarśavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ
K10bsu018_u:1083: tathā samāhitena bhagavatā ādarśavyūhe samādhau tathārūpāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1084: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ sarvaguṇavyūhā dṛṣyante;
K10bsu018_u:1087: yatra ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇā māraṃ parājayanti,
K10bsu018_u:1090: yatra ca buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sphuṭāṃ buddhakṣetrāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1093: yatra ca śūnyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ buddhebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ (KpSū 81)
K10bsu018_u:1107: sarvāvatī sā parṣattāṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhān,
K10bsu018_u:1111: athāraṇemī rājā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “kena bhagavan karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
K10bsu018_u:1115: bhagavān āha - “praṇidhānavaśena mahārāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti apagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1118: bhagavan nagaraṃ praviśyaikāgre niṣadya praṇidhānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi,
K10bsu018_u:1119: tathārūpaṃ me buddhakṣetramapagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ rocate tatremā subhavacaryā pariṇāmayiṣyāmi” /
K10bsu018_u:1121: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1122: nagaraṃ praviśya svake gṛha ekāgraḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1126: yacca tvayā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ śubhaṃ caratā puṇyamārjitaṃ tatsarvamanuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayā” /
K10bsu018_u:1127: sa prāha - “ahamapyupādhyāya svagṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃścintayiṣyāmi /
K10bsu018_u:1130: ataḥ so 'pi rājaputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ, (KpSū 83)
K10bsu018_u:1131: svakaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā ekākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ cintayati /
K10bsu018_u:1132: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimantrayitvovāca,
K10bsu018_u:1137: anyāni ca navatiḥ koṭyaḥ sattvānāṃ bodhau samādāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:1140: evamuktvā sarva eva svagṛhāṇi gatvaikākino niṣaṇṇāḥ saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānāni cintayanti //
K10bsu018_u:1141: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ apareṇa samayena cetasaḥ parivitarka udāpādi /
K10bsu018_u:1143: ayaṃ ca mayā buddho bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakarṇairupanimantritaḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
K10bsu018_u:1144: yadi ca mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryate tathā cāyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate yad ahaṃ devāsuragandharvayakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍān asmin mahāyajñe samādāpayāmi” /
K10bsu018_u:1146: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ purohito vaiśravaṇamākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
K10bsu018_u:1147: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājānekairyakṣaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya
K10bsu018_u:1150: ” vaiśrāvaṇaḥ prāha - “śrutaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇāsti vaiśravaṇo nāma yakṣādhipatiḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1151: so ahaṃ; brāhmaṇa kim ājñāpayasi kiṃ karavāṇi?” /
K10bsu018_u:1156: “tena hi tvaṃ mahārāja yākṣān asmākaṃ vacanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpaya /
K10bsu018_u:1163: vaiśravaṇo mahārājā tasya brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya tatraivāntarhitaḥ bherīmāhatya yakṣarākṣasāṃ sannipātyaitadavocat (KpSū 85)
K10bsu018_u:1166: taṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupasthāsyati /
K10bsu018_u:1168: tena ca yūyaṃ kuśalamūlenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatā” /
K10bsu018_u:1169: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahuyakṣarākṣasakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi añjaliṃ kṛtvocuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1172: tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ puṇyaskandhamanumodāmastena ca kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyemahi” /
K10bsu018_u:1174: yaḥ kaścid yuṣmākaṃ kuśalamūlenārthikaḥ puṇyārthī sa saptavarṣān pārāt samudrasya gośīrṣoragasāracandanamānayatu,
K10bsu018_u:1175: yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato bhikṣusaṅghasya cāhāraṃ sajjīkuryāt” /
K10bsu018_u:1178: yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato 'rthāyāhāraṃ sajjīkariṣyati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca” /
K10bsu018_u:1188: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo viruḍhakasya mahārājasyākāṅkṣati darśanaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1189: tato virūḍhako mahārājā yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya yāvad anekakumbhāṇḍakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1191: atha khalu dvitīyikāyāścāturdvīpikāyā lokapālā buddhānubhāvenāgatāḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sakāśat,
K10bsu018_u:1195: yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasrāt koṭīśataṃ vaiśravaṇānām saparṣatkānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti,
K10bsu018_u:1196: koṭīśataṃ vīrūḍhakānām koṭiśataṃ virūpākṣāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sapārṣadyānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1198: “yadyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ āśā ca samṛdhyeta yadi ca me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyeta,
K10bsu018_u:1202: sacedahamanena puṇyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyañchakro mamādya devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu,
K10bsu018_u:1203: suyamo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu” /
K10bsu018_u:1204: sahacittotpādādeva kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya śakro devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1206: devaputraḥ saṃtuṣitaśca devaputraḥ sunirmitaśca devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1214: “yāni yuṣmākaṃ devaloke sarvaviśiṣṭāni ratnamayāni kūṭāgārāṇi ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā
K10bsu018_u:1215: vā gandhavṛkṣā vā puṣpavṛkṣā vā phalavṛkṣā divyāni cīvarāṇi divyāsanāni divyāni prajñapanāni
K10bsu018_u:1218: “evam astu mārṣāste” pañcadevarājāno brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya brāhmaṇasyāntikāt prākāntā
K10bsu018_u:1219: devalokaṃ gatā gatvā veṭakaṃ devaputramāveṭukaṃ devaputraṃ rohiṇaṃ devaputraṃ korabhanandaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1221: ” gacchata yūyaṃ mārṣā jambūdvīpamavatīrya jambūvanaṃ udyānamevaṃvidhenālaṅkāraviśeṣenaivaṃvidhairāsanaiḥ saṃstatairalaṅkuruta yathaivāyaṃ (KpSū
K10bsu018_u:1223: evaṃvidhameva bhagavato 'rthāya ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayata yādṛśo 'yaṃ ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāra īdṛśaṃ mārṣā kūṭāgāraṃ kārayata” /
K10bsu018_u:1224: te pañcadevaputrā devarājñaḥ pratiśrutya jambūdvīpamavatīrya ekarātryā sarvaṃ jambūvanamudyānamevaṃrūpeṇālaṅkāreṇa ratnavṛkṣairyāvaddhvajairalaṅkṛtaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1225: evaṃrūpaḥ kūṭāgāro bhagavato 'rthāya kṛtastadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ
K10bsu018_u:1226: kūṭāgāraḥ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ca jambūvanaṃ divyenālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛtya devarājānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:1228: “yat khalu mārṣā jānīyuryathaivāyaṃ devalokaḥ svabhyalaṅkṛtaḥ tathaiva jambūvanodyānaṃ divyairalaṅkāraviśeṣaiḥ svalaṅkṛtaṃ sarvākārapariniṣṭhitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1229: evaṃrūpaśca sarvaratnamayaḥ kūṭāgāro bhagavato 'rthāya kṛtaḥ tadyathā śakrasya devānāmindrasya ratnaniryūhaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1230: na hi mārṣā devalokasya jambudvīpe ca jambūvanasyodyānasya kiṃcidapyasti nānākaraṇaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:1231: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ śakrasuyāmasaṃtuṣitāḥ sunirmitaparanirmitavaśavartī jambūdvīpamavatīrya samudrareṇuṃ brāhmaṇamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ
K10bsu018_u:1235: evamukte samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcadevaputānetadavocat - “yūyaṃ khalu pañcadevarājānaḥ pṛthagdevanikāye rājyaṃ kārayata tatra yuṣmākaṃ vaśo
K10bsu018_u:1238: bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmata vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhiksusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:1240: atha te pañcadevarājānaḥ svakasvakeṣu sthānāntareṣu gatvā śakro devānāmindro devāṃstrayastriṃśān
K10bsu018_u:1241: sannipātyaivamāhuḥ - “yut khalu mārṣā jānīyurjambudvīpe 'raṇemino rājñaḥ samudrareṇurnāma
K10bsu018_u:1243: sa ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrya pratimānayati sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
K10bsu018_u:1244: asmābhiśca bhagavato 'rthāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca sarva ārāmo 'laṅkṛtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1245: tadyūyaṃ kuśalamūlamanumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayata samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya samādāpanayā” /
K10bsu018_u:1246: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahavastrayastriṃśaddevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācamudīrayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1249: suyāmo devaputro yāmān devān sannipātya vistareṇa peyālaṃ tuṣitanirmāṇaratidevaputraḥ
K10bsu018_u:1250: paranirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devān sannipātya yāvad bahūni devaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyañjaliṃ
K10bsu018_u:1252: “anumodāmo vayaṃ mārṣā yat kuśalamūlaṃ tasmācca kuśalamūlatyatpuṇyaṃ tatsarvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1253: tena hi mārṣā gacchāmo jambudvīpamavatarāmaḥ bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca” /
K10bsu018_u:1255: sārdhaṃ jambudvīpamavatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavato
K10bsu018_u:1259: punaraparaṃ kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
K10bsu018_u:1262: tadayaṃ mama praṇidhiḥ saṃpadyate yadidamasurāṃ bodhau samādāpayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:1264: upasaṃkramya yāvadbahvasurakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇasya vacanena sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti,
K10bsu018_u:1268: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrṇo nāma māra āgatya yāvadanekairmārakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairmārakāyikairdevaputrasiḥ
K10bsu018_u:1270: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ketapuriṃ nāma mahābrahmāṇamākāṅkṣate upasaṃkramaṇāya /
K10bsu018_u:1273: tataścāvataranti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca,
K10bsu018_u:1275: (KpSū 93) atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ śakramākāṅkṣate
K10bsu018_u:1276: suyāmaṃ saṃtuṣitaṃ sunirmitaṃ paranirmitavaśavartinaṃ ca devaputramākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
K10bsu018_u:1277: te 'pi pañcadevarājāno bhagavato 'nubhāvena brāhmaṇasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntastān brāhmaṇaḥ samanuśiṣṭavān /
K10bsu018_u:1278: te 'pi svakāni bhavanāni gatvā svakāṃ parṣadaṃ brāhmaṇahastena samādāpayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1280: sastrīpuruṣadārakadārikaiste ca sahaśakreṇemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgatā bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
K10bsu018_u:1283: evaṃ suyāmaḥ saṃtuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ paranirmitavaśavartī devaputraḥ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartikān
K10bsu018_u:1286: bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:1288: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ asurendrā mārā brahmāṇaḥ, (KpSū 94)
K10bsu018_u:1290: mārā brahmāṇaḥ buddhānubhāvenemāṃ cāturdvīpikāṃ āgatāḥ sapariṣaṭkā yāvan te dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu018_u:1291: evaṃ yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrādbuddhakṣetrāt koṭīśataṃ śakrāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ suyāmānāṃ koṭīśataṃ saṃtuṣitānāṃ koṭīśataṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ koṭīśataṃ paranirmitavaśavartīnāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1292: koṭīśatamasurendrāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mārāṇāṃ koṭīśataṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ ekaiko mahābrahmānekaiḥ
K10bsu018_u:1294: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavadanubhāvenemāṃ cāturdvīpikāmāgato bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya
K10bsu018_u:1295: vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca bhagavataścāntikāddharmaṃ śrotuṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1296: tadā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrayāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sa kāścit pṛthivīpradeśo yo na sphuṭo 'bhūt //
K10bsu018_u:1298: “yadi mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvāśāparipūrirbhavati tadyathaivaṃ koṭīśataṃ vaiśravaṇānāṃ yāvat koṭīśataṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ māmanuvartanti tathaivaṃ (KpSū 95)
K10bsu018_u:1300: yadevaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kuryāt yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ tiryāñco yāmalokikā nairayikāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ duḥkhāvedanā praśāmyeta sukhāvedanotpadyeta,
K10bsu018_u:1301: teṣāṃ caikaikakasyāgrato buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhet yastāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayet” /
K10bsu018_u:1302: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya cetasā cittamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pratāpaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1303: yathā samāhitena cittena bhagavān pratāpe samādhau bhagavataḥ kāyādaikaikasmād romakūpād
K10bsu018_u:1304: gaṇanāsamatikrāntā raśmaya udgatāstaiśca raśmibhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo 'bhut /
K10bsu018_u:1305: sa tatra kecid raśmayo narakaṃ gatvā śītanarakopapannānāṃ sattvānāmuṣṇā vāyavo vānti,
K10bsu018_u:1306: ye uṣṇanarakopapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti yena teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaṃ kṣuttarṣaśramaduḥkhaṃ praśāmyati sukhāvedanotpadyate
K10bsu018_u:1307: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya nirmito buddhavigraho 'gratastiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairalaṅkṛtagātraḥ aśītibhiranuvyañjanaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaśarīraḥ
K10bsu018_u:1314: teṣāṃ bhagavānāha - “sādhu yūyaṃ sattvā namo buddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣatāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1316: evaṃ yuṣmākaṃ duḥkhāvedanā na bhūya utpadyate,
K10bsu018_u:1317: nityaṃ ca sukhāyā vedanāyā lābhino bhaviṣyatha” /
K10bsu018_u:1322: ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā dahyante teṣāṃ te raśmayaḥ śītalān vāyūn pramuñcanti,
K10bsu018_u:1324: yāvat kecit tataścyāvitvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ upapadyante /
K10bsu018_u:1325: evaṃ tiryagyonirvaktavyā evaṃ yāvan manuṣyā vaktavyāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1326: sā ca prabhā pratinivṛtyā bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ (KpSū 97)
K10bsu018_u:1328: dṛṣṭvā ca gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā avaivartikāḥ sthāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1330: yairjambūdvīpakairmanuṣyaiḥ śrutamañjure nagare rājadhānyāṃ jambūvanodyānaṃ bhagavato 'rthāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca devairdivyairalaṅkāravibhūṣaṇairalaṅkṛtaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1332: tatra ca ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyema bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
K10bsu018_u:1333: tatra gatvā bhagavataḥ sakāśād dharmaṃ śṛṇuyāmaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:1334: tena khalu punaḥ samayena divasedivase 'nekāni devamanuṣyebhyaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikākoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu018_u:1335: mañjurakaṃ nagaramāgacchanti bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:1340: ye te sattvā gatāstamudyānaṃ praviśanti tāṃste māṇavakā buddhasāraṇaṃ gamayanti dharmaśaraṇaṃ gamayanti saṅghaśaraṇaṃ gamayanti,
K10bsu018_u:1343: āsanasthā ye dūrasthāyinaḥ paścāttamudyānaṃ praviśanti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca darśanāya /
K10bsu018_u:1344: evaṃ samudrareṇumā brāhmaṇenāgrapurohitena tāni saptavarṣāṇi gaṇanātikrāntā devā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveṣitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
K10bsu018_u:1345: gaṇanātikrāntā nāgāḥ asurā yakṣarākṣasāḥ kumbhāṇḍā gandharvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā nairayikā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1347: sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturaśītiścakrasahasrāṇi sthāpayitvā divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1350: teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ atyayena rājño 'raṇeminaḥ na rāgacchanda utpadyate,
K10bsu018_u:1351: na dveṣacchandaḥ na mohacchandaḥ na rājacchandaḥ na dhanacchandaḥ na (KpSū 99)
K10bsu018_u:1352: putracchandaḥ na devīcchandaḥ nāhāracchandaḥ na pānacchandaḥ na vastracchandaḥ na gandhacchandaḥ na yānacchandaḥ na nidracchandaḥ nātmacchandaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1357: na rūpasaṃjñāṃ na śabdasaṃjñāṃ na rasasaṃjñāṃ na gandhasaṃjñāṃ na sparśāsaṃjñāṃ utpāditavān /
K10bsu018_u:1359: nityaṃ satatasamitaṃ daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyati /
K10bsu018_u:1361: nānye parvatāḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ na lokāntarikā na candrādityau na divyāni vimānāni cakṣuṣo 'vabhāsaṃ āgacchanti /
K10bsu018_u:1364: yathāraṇemī rājā īdṛśena sukhaguṇavihāreṇa saptavarṣāṇi viharati,
K10bsu018_u:1371: evaṃ tadrājñaḥ sarvaṃ putrasahastaṃ ca caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi aparāṇi ca dvānavatiprāṇakoṭyaḥ sarvāṇyevameva saptavarṣāṇi ekākino rahogatāḥ
K10bsu018_u:1372: daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn paśyanti /
K10bsu018_u:1373: na ca teṣāṃ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ antareṇa rāgacchanda utpanno na dveṣacchando na mohacchandaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1375: satatasamitaṃ ca daśasu dikṣvaikaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /
K10bsu018_u:1377: na cānye parvatā yāvanna divyāni vimānāni cakṣuṣo 'vabhāsamāgacchanti /
K10bsu018_u:1378: yathaiva te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tathaiva pariśuddhabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānaṃ cintayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1382: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastāni saptavarṣāṇi nirgatāni niṣṭhitāni viditvā saptaratnaṃ niryātayati /
K10bsu018_u:1383: (KpSū 101) yena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “mayā bhadanta bhagavan rājāraṇemī anutarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1384: sa gṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogataḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1385: na cātra kasyacin manuṣyasya praveśo dīyate /
K10bsu018_u:1386: evaṃ tatsahasraṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1387: evameva pratiprati svagṛhāṇi gatvā ekākinaḥ pratisaṃlayananiṣaṇṇaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1389: evaṃ yāvaccaturaśītiḥ koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi evamapare dvānavatiḥ prāṇakoṭyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1390: sarve svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gatvā hyekākino rahasi gatā niṣadya pratisaṃlīnā,
K10bsu018_u:1392: bhagavāṃścaināṃ samanvāharatu yāvad rājāraṇemī tasmāt pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāyehāgacchet;
K10bsu018_u:1393: te 'pi sarva ihagaccheyuḥ ye mayā sarve bodhau samādāpitāḥ acalāṃ ca buddhimanugṛhṇeyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1394: bhagavataścāntikādvyākaraṇaṃ prāpnuyurgotraṃ ca nāma ca buddhakṣetraṃ ca pratigṛhṇīyuḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:1398: yāṃ niśṛtya teṣāṃ pratisaṃlīnānāṃ viharatāmagrato brahmanirmitaḥ sthita evamāha /
K10bsu018_u:1399: “uttiṣṭhata mārṣā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramata vandanāya paryupāsanāya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
K10bsu018_u:1405: prasthitasya ca tasya rājño devatā gaganatale bherīmṛdaṃgapaṭahādīn vādyāni pravādayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1406: atha khalu rājāraṇemī rathābhirūḍhaḥ tena putrasahasreṇa caturaśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairdvānavatibhiśca
K10bsu018_u:1407: prāṇakoṭibhiḥ parivṛto nagarānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K10bsu018_u:1408: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena yātvā yānād avatarati,
K10bsu018_u:1411: upetya bhagavataḥ pādau śīrasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya caikānte nyaṣīdat sārdham anekaiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1412: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājānamaraṇeminaṃ prāha - “anumodatu mahārājemaṃ yacca
K10bsu018_u:1413: tvayā māstrayaṃ bhagavataḥ upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ aparimitasya bhikṣusaṅghasya
K10bsu018_u:1414: ca nānāvicitrāṇi ca ratnāni niryātitāni caturaśītiśca nagarasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu018_u:1415: tadevānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ yacca parityāgasahagataṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ sarvaṃ pariṇāmayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:1416: evaṃ tad rājñaḥ putrasahasraṃ samādāpayati tathaiva caturaśītiḥ koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi aparāśca bahuprāṇakoṭyaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1423: dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yan me ha tenāpnuyāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1428: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitad abhavat /
K10bsu018_u:1430: niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikabhūmau sthāpitāste ca mayā vyākartavyā buddhakṣetrāśca darśayitavyāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:1431: atha khalu bhagavān bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1433: yena smitāviṣkaraṇenānantā paryantā buddhakṣetrā udareṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya rājño 'raṇemino 'nyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ prāṇakoṭināṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ ādarśayati /
K10bsu018_u:1434: tena khalu punaḥ samayena daśasu dikṣu gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā
K10bsu018_u:1435: mahāsattvāḥ tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhānubhāvenemāṃ lokadhātuṃ samāgatā bhagavato
K10bsu018_u:1437: te ca vividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ paryupāsya purato niṣaṇṇā bodhisattvapraṇidhānaṃ śrotukāmāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1439: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohitaḥ rājānamaraṇeminamāha - “tvaṃ tāvan mahārāja prathamaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva”
K10bsu018_u:1440: atha rājānaṇemī yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - “ahaṃ bhagavan bodhyarthikaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1441: yanmayā māsatrayaṃ bhagavato nānāvidhairupakaraṇairupasthānaṃ kṛtamaprameyasya ca bhikṣusaṅghasya tanmayā kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1442: imāni ca bhagavan mayā saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāścintitā;
K10bsu018_u:1443: yatrāhaṃ bhagavan buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yatra na nirayā syurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1446: sarveṣāṃ tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ na syāt /
K10bsu018_u:1448: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa divyena cakṣuṣā samanvāgatāḥ syuryad buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ ca deśayataḥ paśyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1453: sarvasattvāḥ tathāvidhenarddhikauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ syuryadekacittotpādena buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi atikrameyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1454: mā ca tatra sattvā bhaveyuḥ parigrahavanto 'ntataḥ svaśarīre 'pyanāgṛhītamānasāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1458: na tatra sattvānāṃ āyuḥ pramāṇaparyantaḥ syād,
K10bsu018_u:1467: yāvad vividhena bodhisattvavikurvitenākāṅkṣeyuḥ buddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathaiva teṣāṃ siddhyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1471: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
K10bsu018_u:1477: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1482: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1483: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1484: yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:1485: / ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ (KpSū 109)
K10bsu018_u:1487: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu
K10bsu018_u:1488: gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye
K10bsu018_u:1489: tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa
K10bsu018_u:1491: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1494: tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1496: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvaduṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣye yāvannaivaṃrūpairguṇairbuddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣye;
K10bsu018_u:1501: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām (KpSū 110)
K10bsu018_u:1503: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
K10bsu018_u:1505: yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
K10bsu018_u:1506: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:1507: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1509: bodhiprāptasya me 'nyāsu gaṇanātikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu sattvā bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1513: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1517: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste 'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1518: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te 'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1520: yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1521: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
K10bsu018_u:1522: bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva
K10bsu018_u:1524: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1525: abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1526: yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1528: bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ (KpSū 112)
K10bsu018_u:1532: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1538: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño 'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt /
K10bsu018_u:1540: gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1541: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1542: tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:1548: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi jñāyate /
K10bsu018_u:1549: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam
K10bsu018_u:1550: kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:1551: parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme 'ntarhite ṣaṣṭīnāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sā lokadhāturmeruprabhā nāma bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:1557: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
K10bsu018_u:1558: tasya saddharme 'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:1562: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme 'ntarhite aparā nāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:1563: tara ratneśvaraghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpatsyate /
K10bsu018_u:1564: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:1568: evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca,
K10bsu018_u:1570: tatrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatī nāma bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:1573: rājāraṇemyāha - “kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ tatra buddhakṣetre (KpSū 115)
K10bsu018_u:1575: bhagavān āha - “ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo
K10bsu018_u:1576: digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
K10bsu018_u:1577: ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete 'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1578: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:1580: ekaikaścaiṣa mahārāja bodhisattvo 'nekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ antike kṛtādhikāro 'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1581: ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra prathamataraṃ buddhakṣetre buddhā bhaviṣyanti” /
K10bsu018_u:1582: rājāraṇemyāha - “ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yenāhaṃ sapariṣatko
K10bsu018_u:1583: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate?” /
K10bsu018_u:1586: rājā āha - “yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ (KpSū 116)
K10bsu018_u:1588: tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ prakampantu pracalantu /
K10bsu018_u:1589: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:1590: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1591: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1593: “santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti
K10bsu018_u:1595: dvitīye 'saṃkhyeye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitaśuddhāyāṃ amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1596: samantato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayiṣyasi” /
K10bsu018_u:1601: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1603: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājño 'raṇemino jyeṣṭhaputramanimiṣaṃ nāma rājakumāramāmantrayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:1606: “avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti /
K10bsu018_u:1607: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti /
K10bsu018_u:1612: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:1613: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā
K10bsu018_u:1615: yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1616: na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1618: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu /
K10bsu018_u:1619: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ
K10bsu018_u:1621: pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:1622: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo 'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate,
K10bsu018_u:1626: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1628: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
K10bsu018_u:1629: dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ
K10bsu018_u:1632: evaṃ cāha - “yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1638: yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
K10bsu018_u:1642: avalokiteśvara āha - “yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
K10bsu018_u:1643: pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
K10bsu018_u:1644: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1645: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
K10bsu018_u:1648: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu (KpSū 121)
K10bsu018_u:1650: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
K10bsu018_u:1655: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī” //
K10bsu018_u:1656: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:1658: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
K10bsu018_u:1660: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - “yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
K10bsu018_u:1663: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:1664: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:1668: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1674: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya” /
K10bsu018_u:1676: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1677: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1683: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu,
K10bsu018_u:1685: yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1691: calitā mahāpṛthivī vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭā sumanā varṣairbhaviṣyasi tvaṃ suranarabrahmabhūtaḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:1695: pratigṛhyāñjaliṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - “yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
K10bsu018_u:1702: daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1703: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1704: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā,
K10bsu018_u:1705: tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1708: tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā (KpSū 125)
K10bsu018_u:1709: mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:1710: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt /
K10bsu018_u:1711: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1712: sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
K10bsu018_u:1715: sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1716: sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ syuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1717: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
K10bsu018_u:1718: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt /
K10bsu018_u:1719: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1721: teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet;
K10bsu018_u:1722: samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyurnāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ ye vayaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāramāharema, (KpSū 126)
K10bsu018_u:1723: yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato 'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1724: pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:1725: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1726: tasya ca samādheḥ pratilābhādasajjanā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaccheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1727: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1728: prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1730: yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa prāvarayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1731: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā
K10bsu018_u:1732: bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1739: yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1740: yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo 'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1741: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta /
K10bsu018_u:1745: ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema,
K10bsu018_u:1747: agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt /
K10bsu018_u:1748: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ syāt;
K10bsu018_u:1756: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate,
K10bsu018_u:1758: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra
K10bsu018_u:1759: yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so 'nyatra lokadhātāvuṣitvā āyuḥ kṣapayitvā
K10bsu018_u:1764: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1765: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1771: liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre praviśeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1773: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1776: syāt, anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ syānnānāgandhairudārodāraistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt /
K10bsu018_u:1780: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi /
K10bsu018_u:1784: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt;
K10bsu018_u:1785: sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:1786: tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1787: bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1792: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt;
K10bsu018_u:1793: tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ me nānāratnavicitraṃ vajrāsanaṃ syāt,
K10bsu018_u:1796: paryaṅkamābhujya tenaiva muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yāvat parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na (KpSū 131)
K10bsu018_u:1797: bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1798: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo 'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1799: ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
K10bsu018_u:1800: tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1802: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet,
K10bsu018_u:1803: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1804: yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1805: na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1806: sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samanantarotpāditena buddhanamaskāracittena māṃ bodhivṛkṣaniṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
