K10bsu018_u:1807: dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so 'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1809: āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena,
K10bsu018_u:1811: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe 'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ
K10bsu018_u:1812: yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā,
K10bsu018_u:1815: tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1817: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1820: praviṣṭe ca tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuddhavirajaḥsannicayo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:1824: samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1825: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:1828: ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:1830: mañjuśrīrāha - “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1831: kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
K10bsu018_u:1832: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1837: tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ (KpSū 134)
K10bsu018_u:1839: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet” /
K10bsu018_u:1840: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā,
K10bsu018_u:1842: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā abhavanyathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1843: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti,
K10bsu018_u:1844: “ko 'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?
K10bsu018_u:1845: ” te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:1848: calitā kṣitiḥ tarpitāḥ sattvāḥ saukhyaiḥ puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha loka” // iti //
K10bsu018_u:1850: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati /
K10bsu018_u:1857: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:1862: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:1863: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:1865: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:1867: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
K10bsu018_u:1870: ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1871: teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ bhavedyāvadahaṃ śīrṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:1872: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate /
K10bsu018_u:1873: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1874: sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1879: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
K10bsu018_u:1881: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1882: yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1883: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha /
K10bsu018_u:1884: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1885: yenāhaṃ bhagavato 'grato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsaṃkhyai rathacakrapramāṇamātraiḥ (KpSū 138)
K10bsu018_u:1886: padmaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣet vayaṃ ca paśyema” /
K10bsu018_u:1887: sahodīrate vākye buddhānubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabdhavān,
K10bsu018_u:1888: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamai rathacakrapramāṇāmātraiḥ padmaiḥ padmavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1890: bhagavān āha - “atīva kulaputra śobhanaṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1894: sa āha - “yadi mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvāśāparipūrirbhaveta tadete padmā gagane tiṣṭhantu tathaiva gagane sthitā varṣantu” /
K10bsu018_u:1896: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra gaganamudro nāma bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:1901: padmottaraśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān aprameyena śuddhena bodhisattvasaṅghena,
K10bsu018_u:1904: gaganamudro bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā nipapāta /
K10bsu018_u:1908: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ rājaputramambaraṃ nāmāntrayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:1910: yāvad yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1911: “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad daśadiśī gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu (KpSū 140)
K10bsu018_u:1912: lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganeṣu saptaratnamayāḥ chatrāḥ prādurbhavantu hemajālapraticchannāḥ saptaratnamayābhirghaṇṭābhiralaṅkṛtāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1913: tatra chatraghaṇṭājālairevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaret yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdo balaśabdo 'bhijñāśabdo vaiśāradyaśabdaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1914: sarve ca te sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te śrutvā sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1915: ye cātra sattvāḥ pūrvamutpāditabodhicittāste 'vaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:1916: samanantaravyāhṛte 'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti /
K10bsu018_u:1918: punarevaṃ āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ
K10bsu018_u:1920: pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt” /
K10bsu018_u:1930: ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
K10bsu018_u:1931: dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:1932: sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1934: “uttiṣṭha suvrata surata dāntacitta sattvebhyaḥ tīvrakaruṇā mahatī pravṛttā /
K10bsu018_u:1935: tāre hi sattvān duḥkhārṇavatīraṃ saṃsthā yāvanna budhyasi anuttarabuddhabodhiṃ” //
K10bsu018_u:1937: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa /
K10bsu018_u:1938: peyālaṃ, “na cāsmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre tatrāhaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:1939: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate,
K10bsu018_u:1940: na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1941: na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā,
K10bsu018_u:1942: na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā,
K10bsu018_u:1943: na ca tatra sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:1944: na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā;
K10bsu018_u:1946: sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:1947: māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet;
K10bsu018_u:1949: nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā nānāmālyebhyo nānāvādyairnānāratnabhājanairnānāpuṣpaiśca te ratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtā (KpSū 143)
K10bsu018_u:1953: samāpannāśca tatra bodhisattvā darśanavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1954: yena samādhinā pratilabdhena daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:1956: yena daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1957: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ sarve jātismarā bhaveyuste ca buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān anusmareyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1958: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarve evaṃrūpaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1959: yat samantāddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ paśyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1960: sahopapannāśca te sattvāḥ sarva evaṃrūpeṇa paracittajñānakauśalyena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1961: yadekakṣaṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāṃ vijāneyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāṃ (KpSū 144)
K10bsu018_u:1963: rātryāḥ pratyuṣakālasamaye caturdiśaṃ sugandhāḥ prītikarāśca mṛdusukhasaṃsparśā vāyavo vāyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1965: te ca bodhisattvāstābhyaḥ samādhibhyo vyutthihitvā tebhyaḥ puṣpakeśarebhya uttiṣṭheyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:1966: tathārūpaṃ ca ṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratilabheran yad ekacittakṣaṇene buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānyekaikāṃ diśaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1967: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavato vanditvā paryupāsitvā tadā nivarteyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1969: dharmasukhamanasikāreṇa tathāgataṃ prekṣeyuryena yena ca niṣīdeyuḥ parivarteyurvā sarvadiśāsu ca māmeva paśyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1970: yathārūpaṃ ca tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kāṅkṣāvimatidharmeṣu saṃśayotpadyeta tatsarvaṃ mama darśanavyavalokanamātreṇa vigaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1971: yathārūpaṃ ca dharmadeśanān te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathārūpaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ mama vyavalokanamātreṇājāneyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1975: sarve ca tatra bodhisattvā avaivartikā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1977: bhavenna ca tatra buddhakṣetre śikṣāgrahaṇasya nāma bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:1982: sarve ca tatra sattvā muṇḍā navakāṣāyacīvaraprāvṛtāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:1986: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhiduḥkhaṃ prajñāyeta /
K10bsu018_u:1987: yeṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuḥparikṣayo bhavet te sarve paryaṅkena parinirvāyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1989: caturdiśaśca vāyava āgaccheyuḥ ye tāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu kṣipeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1990: evaṃrūpāśca mahāmaṇiratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tadyathā rājñaścakravartinaḥ prabhāsvaraṃ maṇiratnaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:1991: ye ca tatra sattvāstāṃ maṇiratnaprabhāṃ paśyeyuḥ taṃ vā maṇiratnaṃ paśyeyuḥ spārśeyurvā te sarve narakatiryagyamalokaduḥkhāni yāvadbodhinirvāṇena mā pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1992: te ca tataścyavitvā tatropapadyeyuḥ yatra tiṣṭhanto (KpSū 146)
K10bsu018_u:1993: yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu018_u:1994: tatropapannāśca te sattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuste ca bodhicittamutpādayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1996: na kaścitsattvo mama buddhakṣetre 'samāhitaḥ kālaṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu018_u:1997: na duḥkhavedanāyā na parasparavyāvadhacittāviprayogamaraṇāya tataśca mārākṣaṇeṣupapadyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:1998: yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ buddhadarśanenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:1999: sarve ca tatra sattvā apagatakhiladveṣamrakṣerṣyāmātsaryā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2002: snigdhacittā mṛducittā avairacittā akilviṣacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ samāhitacittāśca bhaveyuḥ tatra ye sattvā upapadyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2005: daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ lokadhātubhirdṛśyeta gandhena ca sphuret /
K10bsu018_u:2007: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre duḥkhaśabdaḥ śrūyeta /
K10bsu018_u:2008: tāvaccāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaścaivaṃrūpābhirbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasaṃpadābhiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
K10bsu018_u:2010: tataḥ paścād ahaṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2012: sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ca daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lakṣanālaṅkṛto me kāyaḥ saṃdṛśyediti
K10bsu018_u:2013: / ye ca tatra sattvā māṃ paśyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamayet,
K10bsu018_u:2016: yathāvidhāśca samādhidhāraṇīrākāṅkṣeta tathārūpā māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratilabheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2017: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ śītanarake pratyājātā bhaveyusteṣāṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhāvedanā prādurbhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2018: tathārūpāṃ ca sukhāṃ vedanāṃ pratilabheran yathāpi nāma dvitīyadhyānasamāpannasya
K10bsu018_u:2019: bhikṣoste ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā parameṇa kāyacaitasikena sukhena samarpitā bhaveyuste ca
K10bsu018_u:2021: samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuste ca tataścyavitvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
K10bsu018_u:2023: ye ca sattvāḥ pretabhavaneṣūpapannāḥ mama paśyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2026: evaṃ devāḥ dviguṇā ca me prabhāsayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2029: bodhiprāptasya ca me daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto mama varṇaṃ bhāṣeranyeṣāṃ anuśrāvayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2030: ye ca tatra sattvā mama varṇaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te tatra mama buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2031: te kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ sthāpayitvānantaryakārakāṃ saddharmapratikṣepakāṃ āryāpavādakāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2032: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ mama ca buddhakṣetra upapattiṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2033: teṣāmahaṃ maraṇakālasamayeṣvanekagaṇaparivṛto vitimirasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ tathārūpeṇa subhāṣitena tān sattvān saṃtoṣayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2037: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2038: ye ca punaranyatra buddhakṣetreṣu saptadhanavirahitāḥ sattvā anarthikāḥ tribhiryānairanarthikā
K10bsu018_u:2040: adharmarāgaraktā viṣamalobhābhibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāsteṣāṃ prabhāsamādhinā maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ tiṣṭheyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2044: te sattvā mamāntike paramaprītiprasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ bodhau ca cittānyutpādyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2048: kālaṃ ca kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:2051: sa prāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ pravarṣatu /
K10bsu018_u:2052: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ te sarve bodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2056: utpāditaśca kulaputra praṇītadyutiḥ samādhiḥ svayamevādrākṣīt tadbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu uragasāracandanacūrṇaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2057: daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ prāñjalibhūtā adrākṣuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2060: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā bodhau samādāpitāstena tvaṃ kulaputra siṃhagandho bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:2061: atikrānte siṃhagandha ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsaṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye uparimāya diśāyeto
K10bsu018_u:2065: prabhāsavirajaḥsamucchrayagandheśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2067: atha khalu kulaputra siṃhagandho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditavān /
K10bsu018_u:2070: chittvā tvaṃ bhavaduḥkhakleśabandhanāṃ bheṣyasi narajina āryapudgalaḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:2071: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'ṣṭamaṃ rājaputramamighaṃ nāmāmantrayāṃ āsa /
K10bsu018_u:2072: peyālaṃ, “tāvadahaṃ bhagavan kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhisattvabhūto bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvadahaṃ daśasahasrān kliṣṭān buddhakṣetrānevaṃrūpāṃ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi,
K10bsu018_u:2077: tathārūpāmahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā nānye bodhisattvāścaranti /
K10bsu018_u:2078: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannimāni saptavarṣāṇi buddhaguṇabodhisattvaguṇapariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇapariśuddhaṃ rahogata ekākī saṃcintayamāno
K10bsu018_u:2079: darśanavyūhasamādhipūrvaṃgamena ekadaśabodhisattvasamādhisahasrāṇi yāni mayātrotpāditāni pratilabdhāni bhāvitāni,
K10bsu018_u:2080: eṣā mama bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvabhūtasya bodhisattvacārikā;
K10bsu018_u:2081: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣvanantāparyantāsvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:2082: ye trādhvasamatikrāntā dhvajāgrākeyūrā buddhakṣetrāstāṃ paripūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ āvarteyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2083: tena ca samādhināhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan paramāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavato bodhisattvaśrāvakagaṇaparivṛtān paśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2085: (KpSū 153) ekaikena cāhaṃ kāyenānuttarairvicitrai ratnaiḥ puṣpairanuttarairvicitrairgandhairmālyaiśca curṇavilepanairvādyaiḥ sarvābhiścānuttarābhirvyūhābhirekaikaṃ pūjayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2087: yadā cāhaṃ sarvakāyavibhāvanena samādhinaikakṣaṇenaikaikasya buddhasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhagocarān ājāneyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2089: animiṣasamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekarajāgracittapramāṇena sarvabuddhakṣetrān pūrṇāṃ jinaiḥ paśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2090: araṇāsamādhinā cāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan nekacittakṣaṇena sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānatītānāgatapratyutpannān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyeyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2096: yatra buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2110: yathārūpeṇa ca sattvāḥ karmapratyayena sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhāṃ vā pratisaṃvedayanti,
K10bsu018_u:2117: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā daśasu sarvabuddhakṣetrasahasreṣu
K10bsu018_u:2118: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantatiṃ tathā pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā pūrvakarmakleśāṃ na kuryuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2123: evaṃ mayā svabuddhakṣetrasya svaparṣāyā ca yathā siṃhagandhena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2124: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā daśasu buddhakṣetrasahasreṣu sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni praśāmyantu,
K10bsu018_u:2129: yena te sattvāḥ tān buddhān pūjayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2131: ahaṃ ca bhagavan darśanavyūhasamādhānabalena svayaṃ paśyeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2132: sahodīritayāṃ vācāsminnevameva svayaṃ paśyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” iti /
K10bsu018_u:2134: yastvaṃ kulaputra samantake ca svake ca buddhakṣetre daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi pariśuddhāni sthāpayiṣyasi /
K10bsu018_u:2138: tena tvaṃ kulaputra samantabhadro nāma bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:2140: parivartāvaśiṣṭe dvitīya uttarāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni
K10bsu018_u:2143: jñānavajravijṛmbhiteśvaraketurnāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2144: atha khalu kulaputra samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta /
K10bsu018_u:2146: “uttiṣṭha surata suvrata dāntacittā sattvāna santati viśodhya dṛḍhapratijñatvaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2148: sattvān tāraya kleśanadīsughorān tvaṃ jñāna ulkadhara bheṣyasi buddha loke” //
K10bsu018_u:2149: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputra samayena daśakuśīdaprāṇasahasrāṇi ekakaṇṭhena vācaṃ babhāṣire /
K10bsu018_u:2150: “bhaviṣyāma vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan te pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2151: yāṃ suviśuddhāśayāḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carāmāṇaḥ pariśuddhāṃ sthāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:2152: evaṃ ca vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrayitvā tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyema” /
K10bsu018_u:2153: evaṃ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena daśaprāṇisahasrā vyākṛtāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2154: “yadā samantabhadro 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate tadā yūyaṃ teṣu sāmantakeṣu lokadhātuṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyadhve
K10bsu018_u:2155: sahasraikanāmakāstathāgatā bhaviṣyathaḥ yaduta sahasraṃ jvālakuṇḍeśvaraghoṣā nāma bhaviṣyatha tathāgatāḥ, aparaṃ (KpSū 158)
K10bsu018_u:2160: pañcaśatā ekaṃ nāmadheyāḥ yaduta sūryaghoṣanāmā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu018_u:2269: aparaṃ sahasraṃ visṛṣṭadharmarājāno nāgendravimuktibuddhalokasāgaralocanaśailanāmā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2272: te 'pi daśaprāṇasahasrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipetuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2277: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo navamaṃ rājaputramāmantrayate sma amighaṃ nāma /
K10bsu018_u:2278: peyālaṃ, sa prāha - “tathārūpamahaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me daśasu
K10bsu018_u:2280: buddhā bhagavanto bodhicārikāṃ carataḥ sākṣibhūtā bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2281: yadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan tvatpurato bodhāya cittamutpādayāmi,
K10bsu018_u:2283: atrāntareṇa me bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya na vipratisāracittamutpadyeta,
K10bsu018_u:2285: na cānyasya sattvasya cittasaṃkṣobho bhaveyaṃ, na (KpSū 162)
K10bsu018_u:2288: mā styānamiddhasahagatā mauddhatyasahagatā mā kaukṛtyasahagatā na vicikitsāsahagatā
K10bsu018_u:2289: na prāṇātipātaṃ nādattādānaṃ nābrahmacaryaṃ na mṛsāvādaṃ na paiśunyaṃ na pāruṣyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2290: nābhidhyā na vyāpādaṃ na mithyādṛṣṭiḥ na saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ na mātsaryasahagataṃ na
K10bsu018_u:2292: yāvadbodhiparyantān mama bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya ime dharmā na saṃvidyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2294: yāvadbodhiparyantena nāhaṃ buddhadarśanena virahito bhaveyaṃ na dharmaśravaṇena na saṅghopasthānena /
K10bsu018_u:2297: traicīvarikaḥ vṛkṣamūlikaḥ naiṣadyikaḥ āraṇyakaḥ piṇḍapātikaḥ alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ dharmadeśakaḥ ādeyavākyaḥ aparimāṇapratibhānasaṃpanno bhaveyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2301: śūnyatāmanaskāreṇa ca mātṛgrāmasya na dantavidarśanaṃ kuryāt, (KpSū 163)
K10bsu018_u:2304: yasya cāhaṃ dharmabhāṇakasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ śāstṛsaṃjñān tasyāntike utpādayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2305: satkṛtya cāhaṃ taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ yathā tathāgataṃ tathā satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ yāvadātmamāṃsairapi dharmabhāṇakamupasthiteyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2306: na cāhaṃ pātramapātraṃ cāvekṣya dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2309: svavīryabalapraṇidhānopārjitena cāhaṃ dravyena vyasanagatān sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2310: na cāhaṃ pravrajitaliṅginaṃ vā gṛhasthaliṅginaṃ vā āpattyānāpattyā vā codayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2312: / yadi ca me bhadanta bhagavannime praṇidhānā yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya saṃṛdhyeyuḥ yathā bhagavataḥ purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2313: tadubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ divyāścakraratnāḥ prādurbhavantu sahasrārāḥ sanābhikāḥ sanemikāḥ ādityavarṇaprabhāsvarāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:2314: sahabhāṣitāyāṃ asyāṃ vāci amighena rājaputreṇobhāyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ tathārūpāṇi cakrāṇi (KpSū 164)
K10bsu018_u:2316: punarāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yāvadbodhiparyantena tadime cakrāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gacchantu,
K10bsu018_u:2317: evaṃrūpeṇoccaśabdena yathā nandopanandā nāgarājā gacchanti tathā sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
K10bsu018_u:2320: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrotrendriyeṣvayaṃ dharmaparyāyamābhāsamāgacchatu,
K10bsu018_u:2321: nipatitamātre ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamatu,
K10bsu018_u:2324: preṣitau ca kulaputrāmighena rājaputreṇa tau dvau cakraratnau tau caivaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchatastadyathā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajavena gacchanti;
K10bsu018_u:2325: evameva tau dvau cakraratnau gacchataḥ daśasu diśāsvaprameyeśvasaṃkhyeyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
K10bsu018_u:2329: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rāgo yāvan mātsaryacittacaitasikāḥ praśāntāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2330: sarve ca buddhajñānaviṣayaṃ manaskāreṇānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditavanto,
K10bsu018_u:2331: muhūrtamātreṇa ca te cakrāḥ pratinivṛtyāmighasya rājaputrasya purataḥ sthitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2332: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ amighasya rājaputrasya sādhukāramadāt,
K10bsu018_u:2335: ime ca divyāścakraratnāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣitā,
K10bsu018_u:2341: akṣobhya āha - “tādṛśamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhamākāṅkṣāmi yathā sarvalokasvarṇabhūrbhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2342: samāpāṇitalopamā divyamaṇiratnavyavakīrṇā apagataśarkarakaṭhallā apagataśilāstaṃbhapāṣāṇaparvatā mṛdukā kācalindikasukhasaṃsparṣā,
K10bsu018_u:2346: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2349: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2350: na ca parasparabhayaṃ na ca parasparaviheṭhā na ca sattvānāmakālamaraṇaṃ vipratisāramaraṇaṃ nāsamāhitamaraṇaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2353: na pañcakaṣāyeṣu śūnyesu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāt buddhadarśanāvirahitā bhaveyurdharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā
K10bsu018_u:2355: sarve ca tatra daśakuśalāṃ karmapathān samādāya varteyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2356: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ śīlpagrahaṇaṃ bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2358: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ mārāvatāraṃ mārgena /
K10bsu018_u:2359: na ca tatra sattvā durvarṇā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2360: na ca tatra sattvā vaimātra bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2363: na ca tatra śrāvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vā śuklamokṣaṇaṃ bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2365: sarve ca tatra sattvā dharmakāmā dharmaparyeṣṭiparā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2366: na ca tatra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi viparītadṛṣṭiko bhavet na cānyatīrthiko,
K10bsu018_u:2367: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet cittaklamatā vā bhavet;
K10bsu018_u:2368: sarve ca te tatra sattvāḥ pañcābhijñā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2369: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇā vā bhukṣā vā viheṭhayet,
K10bsu018_u:2370: yādṛśaṃ cāhāramākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśaṃ ratnabhājaneṣu purataḥ prādurbhavet yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2371: na coccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇamaśru vā kāye svedo vā bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2372: na ca tatra śītaṃ noṣṇaṃ bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2375: te ca tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gandhakṛtyaṃ kurvīranyadākāṅkṣeyuḥ yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2386: tatra ca sattvānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2387: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkāḥ stritāḥ (KpSū 168)
K10bsu018_u:2393: yathārūpā ca tatra sattvā vastrābharaṇaṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ te tān tebhyaḥ kalpavṛkṣebhyo gṛhītvā prāvareyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2397: vāyusamīritaśca tato bodhivṛkṣāddivyātikrāntaḥ snigdho manojñaḥ pāramitā abhijñendriyabalabodhyaṅgaśabdo niścaret,
K10bsu018_u:2398: ye ca sattvāstaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuste virāgacittāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2399: sarvaguṇopetaśca tatra buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo bhavet tadyathā tuṣitadevanikāye 'psarāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2400: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmo durgandho bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2405: gatvā mātṛgrāmaṃ sarāgena cittena prekṣate muhūrtena puruṣasya rāgaḥ praśāmyeta,
K10bsu018_u:2410: yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2412: ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2413: tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti /
K10bsu018_u:2414: evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2415: tāśca striyo garbhiṇyaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2417: na ca te sattvā aśucinā garbhamalena kliśyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2418: saptame ca divase paramasugandhena parameṇa ca sukhopadhānena samarpitāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2419: na caiva sā strī duḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaved,
K10bsu018_u:2420: ubhau ca puṣkariṇīmavataritvā snātvā ca sā strī evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheta,
K10bsu018_u:2425: yacca pūrvajanmani tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavedyena ca bahukalpakoṭīstrībhāvamanubhavitavyaṃ tena samādhinābhinirvṛtena strībhāvaṃ ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacched,
K10bsu018_u:2426: yāvat parinirvāṇaṃ na bhūyaḥ strībhāvaṃ pratilabhet /
K10bsu018_u:2427: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavet yad gaṇanātikrāntān kalpān nityagarbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavitavyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2428: te bodhiprāptasya me nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ prasādaṃ ca pratilabheyuste tataścyavitvā
K10bsu018_u:2429: mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyurgarbhavāsena ca pratyājāyeyustatra sarveṇa sarvaṃ tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2430: gaccheyuryāvadbodhiparyantena na bhūyaste sattvā garbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurye sattvā
K10bsu018_u:2433: karmaparikṣayena mama buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo vā garbhavāso vā prajñāyeta ekāntasukhasamarpitāste sattvāstatra buddhakṣetre bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2437: manuṣyā ulkāvatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā te sattvāḥ śūnyatāvabhāsāṃ gambhīrān dharmān avabudhyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2438: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre kāmopasaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavet /
K10bsu018_u:2439: bodhivṛkṣamūlaniṣaṇṇaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnūyāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2440: bodhiprāptasya ca me tatra buddhakṣetre na bhūyaścandrasūryāṇāṃ prabhā prajñāyeta,
K10bsu018_u:2442: evaṃrūpāṃ cāhaṃ prabhāṃ pramuñceyaṃ yena divyena cakṣuṣāprameyāsaṃkhyeyairanyairbuddhakṣetraistiṣṭhato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2443: bodhiprāptaścāhamevaṃrūpeṇa svareṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yena svareṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetramāpūrayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2444: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ syuḥ te sarve buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste yena yena gaccheyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyurvā parivarteyurvā,
K10bsu018_u:2445: te satatasamitaṃ māṃ paśyeyuryathārūpeṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃśayā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ mama darśanamātreṇa vyavalokanamātreṇa ca teṣāṃ saṃśayā vigaccheyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:2446: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vānuttarayānikā vā mama nāmaṃ vā varṇaṃ va śṛṇuyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2449: te tatra mama dharmaṃ śrutvā ye śrāvakayānikāste 'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyino 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2450: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ te pratyekāṃ bodhimabhigaccheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2451: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāyānikāste mat sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā gambhīrāṃ samādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2453: aprameyaśca me śrāvakasaṅgho bhaved yo na śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra svayaṃ tathāgatena /
K10bsu018_u:2454: bodhiprāptaścāhaṃ yena yena gaccheyaṃ yatra yatra ca pādatalena pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ tatra tatra sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni prādurbhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2455: te ca padmāḥ śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā mama varṇaśabdaṃ ghoṣaṃ niścārayeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:2456: te ca sattvā mama nāma varṇaṃ yaśaśca śrutvā prītiprasādaprāmodyamutpādayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2463: anityaduḥkhānātmaśūnyatābhiratā ārabdhavīryā ca sā parṣadbhaveddharmaśravaṇā saṅghaprāgbhārā /
K10bsu018_u:2464: ye ca tatrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuste 'nāgatapraviṣṭāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste jātivyativṛttā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2465: yāvadbodhiparyantena te dharmā na saṃpramoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2470: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyānāgate 'dhvani atikrānte hyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeya 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi,
K10bsu018_u:2472: evaṃrūpayā guṇavyūhayā saṃpannā yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2474: evamevākṣobhyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2475: akṣobhya āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvatra lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaparigṛhītā (KpSū 174)
K10bsu018_u:2476: ye ca sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāste sarve maitracittā bhavantvavairacittā
K10bsu018_u:2477: akaluṣacittāste evaṃrūpaṃ kāyasukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ tadyathāpi nāma daśabhūmisthitasya
K10bsu018_u:2479: evaṃrūpeṇa sattvāḥ kāyacaitasikena sukhena samārpitā bhavantu /
K10bsu018_u:2480: yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeta tadā sarvapṛthivī svarṇāvabhāsā bhavatu” /
K10bsu018_u:2481: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā ca tasmin samaye sarvasattvā evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2485: sthāpitā bahutṛṣṇā karuṇacitte bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śubhamati jagati śāstā” //
K10bsu018_u:2487: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo daśamaṃ rājaputraṃ himaṇiṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
K10bsu018_u:2488: peyālaṃ himaṇī rājaputra evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīt tadyathākṣobhyena kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2489: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavan nevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvasattvā buddhālaṃbanamanaskāraṃ pratilabhantu /
K10bsu018_u:2491: te ca sarve taṃ gandhaṃ buddhavigraheṣu pariṇāmayantu” /
K10bsu018_u:2494: yacca tvayā sarvasattvā uragasāracandanahastā sthāpitā buddhamanaskāraścāśayenotpāditaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2498: parinirvṛte saddharme 'ntarhite saptame dviase tvaṃ gandhahaste tatra lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2500: suvarṇapuṣpo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2502: paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeyaṃ tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣatu” /
K10bsu018_u:2503: yadā khalu kulaputra gandhahastirbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat
K10bsu018_u:2506: darśaya śubhapatha varapraṇītaṃ sthāpaya bahujagamabhaye pāre” //
K10bsu018_u:2507: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa ekādaśamaṃ rājaputraṃ siṃhaṃ nāmāmantrayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:2514: 'saṃkhyeye tatrābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau parinirvṛte svarṇapuṣpe tathāgate tasya ca saddharme
K10bsu018_u:2515: 'ntarhite trayāṇāṃ antarakalpānāmatyayena tadbuddhakṣetraṃ jayasomaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:2516: tatra tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase nāgavinarditeśvaraghoṣo nāma bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:2517: evaṃrūpaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhena yathākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya” /
K10bsu018_u:2518: ratnaketurāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādau vande tadā sarvasattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2519: yathā bodhisattvā ye mahābodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya karuṇāyamānāḥ saṃbodhau prasthitā na nivarteyuḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:2520: evameva kulaputra ratnaketurbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau vanditvā,
K10bsu018_u:2521: evameva sattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabdhavanto yaduta karuṇācittāḥ sarvasattvāḥ sthāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2522: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato ratnaketuṃ bodhisattvamāha -
K10bsu018_u:2524: “uttiṣṭha dhairya sumate paramarūpa sattvahetu sudṛḍhakṛta pratijñā /
K10bsu018_u:2525: sthāpayasi bahujana virajacitte bhaviṣyase naravaro pravarabuddhaḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:2528: kṛtvaivaṃrūpā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2530: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2532: apare catvāraḥ śatā rājaputrāṇāṃ yairevaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ yathā vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsena,
K10bsu018_u:2533: te 'pi sarve ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau anyonyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
K10bsu018_u:2539: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:2541: evameva tribhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ pṛthakpṛthak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2543: sarve ca ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtāanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu018_u:2545: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyāśītiputrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya bhrātaraḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2547: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ samudreśvarabhuviṃ māṇavaṃ āmantrayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:2551: samudrareṇurāha - ” tvaṃ tāvat putra praṇidhānaṃ kuruṣva,
K10bsu018_u:2553: sa āha - “kiṃ tāvat pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratigṛhṇāmyutāhosvidapariśuddhaṃ?” /
K10bsu018_u:2554: agrapurohita āha - “ye mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatā bodhisattvāste kliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇanti,
K10bsu018_u:2557: atha khalu kulaputra samudreśvarabhuvirmāṇavako yena ratnagarbhas tathāgatastenopasamakrāmadupasaṃkramya
K10bsu018_u:2558: ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitvaivamāha - “evamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2561: yathaitarhi bhagavan sattvā mandarāgā mandadveṣā mandamohā udvignāśayāḥ saṃsāre bhayadoṣadarśinastathā tatra buddhakṣetre sattvā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2565: yadi bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad vyākarotu māṃ bhagavānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:2567: ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsame
K10bsu018_u:2571: ratnakūṭo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2572: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadiha sarvatrārāme lohitamuktiḥ pravarṣatu,
K10bsu018_u:2574: yadā ca kulaputra samudreśvarabhuvirmāṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvatrārāme lohitamuktimayavarṣaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2578: abhiprāya tubhya paripūryatu śuddha sattvāna arthakaru bheṣyasi buddha loke” //
K10bsu018_u:2583: lokadhātau baliṣṭhe buddhakṣetre vardhamānāśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vairocanakusumo
K10bsu018_u:2585: peyālaṃ, tṛtīyastvāha - “dvivarṣasahasrasya jyotigandho nāma bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2587: evaṃ sumanastathāgataḥ śailarājā saṃvṛtalocano brahmottaro jambūcchāyaḥ pūrṇamuttaro
K10bsu018_u:2588: ratnaśailaḥ samudragarbho nārāyaṇaḥ śikhī kanakamunirmunīndraḥ kauṇḍinyaḥ siṃhavikramo
K10bsu018_u:2589: jñānadhvajo buddhaśravo 'parājito vikasitojjayo hiteṣī prajñāvabhāso mahendraḥ śāntaprajñākaro
K10bsu018_u:2590: nando nyagrodharājaḥ kanakalocanaḥ sahitaḥ sūryanandiḥ ratnaśikhī sumetro brahmaḥ
K10bsu018_u:2592: arthadarśī yaśonandī yaśottaraḥ abhirūpaḥ sugandhaścaturaḥ pravaralocanaḥ sunijastaḥ
K10bsu018_u:2593: sārthavrataḥ sumanoratho varaprajñaḥ kanakadhvajaḥ sunetro devaśuddhaḥ śuddhodanaḥ
K10bsu018_u:2594: sudarśanaḥ virūḍhadhvajo virūpākṣo brahmasvaraḥ śrīsaṃbhavaḥ śrīmahāvirajo maṇibhadraḥ
K10bsu018_u:2595: mārīciḥ śākyamunirghoṣeśvaraḥ satyasaṃbhavaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃbhavapuṣpaḥ sukusumaḥ akṣobhyaḥ
K10bsu018_u:2596: sūryagarbho ratīśvaro nāgadanto vajraprabhāsaḥ kīrtirājā vyāghraraśmiḥ sanetyajñānasaṃbhavaḥ
K10bsu018_u:2598: yastu tatra kulaputra sarvapaścimakaḥ purohitaputraḥ vigatabhyasaṃtāpo nāma,
K10bsu018_u:2600: “ime bhadanta bhagavannekonāśītirmāṇavakāḥ sarve vyākṛtā utpalasaṃtīraṇe kalpe vardhamānadvaye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
K10bsu018_u:2604: yāntakaṃ teṣāmekonāśītīnāṃ buddhānāmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tāntakaṃ mamaikasya bodhiprāptasya bhavet /
K10bsu018_u:2605: yāntakāśca teṣāṃ vaineyā bhaveyustāntakā mamaikasya bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2609: ye ca teṣāmekonāśītīnāṃ buddhānāmutpannānāṃ sattvāstasminnutpalasaṃtīraṇe kalpe manuṣyalābhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2610: kṣīyamāṇe kalpe 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstān sattvāṃstribhiryānairniyatāṃ vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2611: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadvyākuruṣva māṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:2612: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato vigatabhayasaṃtāpasya sādhukāramadāt /
K10bsu018_u:2618: viagatarajasamudgatābhyudgatarājā nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:2621: yāvat sarve te tvatpraṇidhānāḥ saṃpatsyante yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:2622: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripuryeta yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandāmi tadā sarvatrāsmin buddhakṣetre nīlakusumāḥ pravarṣantu paramasugandhā,
K10bsu018_u:2623: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhamāghrāyeyuḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dhātavaḥ prasannā aviruddhā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2625: yadā ca kulaputra vigatabhayasaṃtāpo māṇavo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvatra tasmin buddhakṣetre nīlakusumavṛṣṭiḥ
K10bsu018_u:2626: ye ca sattvāstaṃ gandhaṃ ghrātavantasteṣāṃ sarve dhātavaḥ samā aviruddhāḥ saṃsthitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2627: sarve ca tatra sattvā arogā alpābādhāśca saṃvṛttāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2632: tasya ca kulaputra brāhmaṇasya trayaḥ koṭyo 'ntavāsināmārāmadvāre niṣaṇṇāste āgatāṃ sattvāṃstriśaraṇagamane sthāpayanti,
K10bsu018_u:2639: sa āha - “kīdṛśena mārgeṇa kīdṛśena saṃbhāreṇa kīdṛśyā caryayā kīdṛśyā saṃṛtyā bodhirlabhyate?” /
K10bsu018_u:2640: purohita āha - “catvāra ime māṇavakā bodhimārgapratipannena bodhisattvenākṣayakośāḥ samudānayitavyāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2647: uktaṃ caivaṃ māṇava tathāgatena saṃbhāraviśuddhisaṅgraho nāma saṃsārottaraṇadharmadvāraṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2685: purohitā āha - “ye māṇavāḥ saṃsārābhiratā dānaṃ dadanti,
K10bsu018_u:2687: ye māṇavaka kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bodhimārgapratipannāstairdānaṃ damacittatayā dātavyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2699: śuddho māṇavakā bodhimārga āśayena praṇidhānaṃ kartavyaṃ paripūryate;
K10bsu018_u:2705: atha khalu kulaputra jyotikṣabhako māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpyāha /
K10bsu018_u:2707: asmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre maṇḍarāgāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ maṇḍadveṣāṇāṃ maṇḍamohānāṃ askhalitāluḍitacittānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2710: triḥsvargapathodyuktacittānāṃ tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ samudānītakuśalamūlānāṃ triṣu yāneṣu prayuktacittānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2711: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadā me ubhayoḥ pāṇyorhastināgāḥ prādurbhavantu” /
K10bsu018_u:2712: sahapravyāhṛte vākye bhagavato 'nubhāvena ubhayoḥ pāṇyorhastināgāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sarvaśvetāḥ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2714: sarvāvantamidaṃ buddhakṣetramaṣṭāṅgopetena varṣeṇa paramasugandhena sarvasattvānito buddhakṣetrāt prabodhayata /
K10bsu018_u:2715: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāye tato bindu nipate ye vā gandhamājighreyusteṣāṃ pañcanīvaraṇāḥ prahīyantu;
K10bsu018_u:2718: sahapravyāhṛte vākye nāgā uparyantarīkṣe evaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:2719: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ prasāritāṃ bāhu saṃkocayet saṃkocitaṃ bāhu prasārayet /
K10bsu018_u:2720: evameva te hastināgāḥ kṛtakāryā yathā pūrvoktaṃ vivarttitvā tasyāgrataḥ sthitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2721: atha khalu kulaputra jyotikṣabho māṇavakaḥ paramaprītimanāḥ; (KpSū 192)
K10bsu018_u:2722: taṃ ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputrānāgate 'dhvani anupraviṣṭe
K10bsu018_u:2723: dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye ratnaprabhāse kalpe ratnasañcayaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:2724: asmiṃ cāturdvīpike ratnacchatrābhyudgataraśmirbhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2725: atha kulaputra jyotikṣabho bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā nipapāta /
K10bsu018_u:2728: bhaviṣyasi varaśuddhamārgaḥ bodhaye bhaviṣyasi varajinaḥ sattvanāyakaḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:2729: peyālaṃ, sahasro māṇavakānāṃ trayaḥ koṭyo māṇavakānāṃ yairasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau (KpSū 193)
K10bsu018_u:2731: sarve ca te ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vyākṛtāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2732: yāvadvipaśyī śikhī viśvabhuvaḥ paścimā buddhā babhūvuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2734: tatra sahasravedapāṭhakānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ yasteṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ gurusaṃmato vāyuviṣṇurnāma /
K10bsu018_u:2735: sa āha - “ahaṃ punaḥ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ spṛśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2736: tīvrarāgānāṃ tīvradveṣāṇāṃ tīvramohānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:2738: sa āha - “kimarthavaśaṃ samanupaśyamāno 'yaṃ bho upādhyāya vāyuviṣṇuḥ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre praṇidadhāti?” /
K10bsu018_u:2739: purohita āha - “sakalamahākaruṇāsamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre bodhimanuprāpnoti;
K10bsu018_u:2745: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā dṛśyata ye pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre praṇidadhanti” /
K10bsu018_u:2751: śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato bhavisyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2752: vāyuviṣṇurāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
K10bsu018_u:2753: pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vande tadā me bhagavān chatapuṇyalakṣaṇālaṅkṛtāvubhau caraṇau
K10bsu018_u:2755: yadā kulaputra vāyuviṣṇurmāṇavo bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipapāta tadā ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ ubhau caraṇau vāyuviṣṇorbodhisattvasya mūrdhni sthāpayitvāha -
K10bsu018_u:2759: atha khalu kulaputra jyotipālo māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2760: pṛthvyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpyāha - “utpādayāmyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2761: asmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohasabhāgacittānāmavyavasthitakuśalākuśalāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2762: ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - 'atikrāntānāṃ ekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ avaśiṣṭe dvitīye sahā nāmāyaṃ lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:2764: ' sahāste sattvā rāgasya sahāste dveṣasya sahāste mohasya sahāste kleśabandhanānāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2766: tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhadrako nāma bhaviṣyati mahākalpaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2768: bhadrake mahākalpe rāgadveṣamohacaritānāṃ sattvānāṃ sahasraṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpatsyate /
K10bsu018_u:2771: krakutsando nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃstribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayiṣyasi,
K10bsu018_u:2774: atha khalu kulaputra jyotipālo bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'tikramya tasthau /
K10bsu018_u:2775: atha khalu kulaputra dvitīyastumbururnāma māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2776: “bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan krakutsandasya tathāgatasyānusaṃdhau triṃsadvarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddho loke” /
K10bsu018_u:2780: kanakamunirnāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo lokasya” /
K10bsu018_u:2782: ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyābhimukhamāsthāt,
K10bsu018_u:2784: “susahita sumudita sumadhura vacanā askhalita aluḍita akaluṣa vimalā /
K10bsu018_u:2785: abhiśaya atiyati atimati matimā ṛṣivara jvala tuma munivara vṛṣabhī //
K10bsu018_u:2786: bahu tuma guṇadada guṇaśata bharitā sukhakara munivara naramanu namitā /
K10bsu018_u:2787: na hi anyu sattva vidyati tvayi samu tṛbhave tvayi adyi bahusattva bodhimārgi vyākṛtā” //
K10bsu018_u:2789: atha khalu kulaputra viśvagupto nāma māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ saptaratnamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ sthāpayitvā śatasahasramūlyena prajñapanena
K10bsu018_u:2790: tatra pīṭhe suvarṇapātraṃ sthāpayitvā saptaratnaparipūrṇasuvarṇamayaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ saptaratnamayā yaṣṭirbuddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṅghe niyojitavān
K10bsu018_u:2796: parinirvṛte kanakamunau tathāgate saddharme 'ntarhite 'ndhe loke 'nāyake viṃśativarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ”
K10bsu018_u:2797: tasya kulaputra viśvaguptasya brāhmaṇasya ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “sādhu sādhu brāhmaṇa mahāvidvān jñānasamanvāgataḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2800: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa vidvagañjakaruṇāśrayo nāma bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:2802: dvitīye sahāyāṃ lokadhātau anupraviṣṭe bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2803: kāśyapo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2804: atha khalu kulaputra vidvagañjakaruṇāśrayo bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt,
K10bsu018_u:2812: tvayā bahubodhisattvanayutā vandāma te naravarā sugatā” /
K10bsu018_u:2815: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ vimalavaiśāyanaṃ māṇavakaṃ saṃcodayāṃ āsa /
K10bsu018_u:2816: atha khalu kulaputra vimalavaiśāyano māṇavako ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitvāha - “evamevāhamasmin bhadrake kalpe bodhimākāṅkṣāmi,
K10bsu018_u:2818: yathā kāśyapasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya daśavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dānadamaparikṣīṇāśayānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2827: tāvat pañcakaṣāye loke hāyamānā daśavarṣāyuṣkā bhavanti,
K10bsu018_u:2828: śastrāntarakalpe pratyupasthite tatkālamahaṃ devebhyo 'vatīrya sattvān paritrāyeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2836: yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta vyākarotu māṃ bhadanta bhagavannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:2837: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ na lapsyāmi,
K10bsu018_u:2838: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ prārthayāmi na ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ yena yānena śīghraṃ saṃsārādvimucyāmi” /
K10bsu018_u:2841: yaiḥ kuśīdavastubhiḥ samanvāgatā ekatyā bodhisattvā dīrghasaṃsāralābhino dṛṣṭiprapāte saṃsāracārake duḥkhānyanubhavanti,
K10bsu018_u:2852: na ca sarvaparityāgī na sarvatraparityāgī bhavati,
K10bsu018_u:2854: na cādhyāśayena buddhakṣetraguṇavyuhān pratigṛhṇāti vaineyamanavekṣya praṇidhānaṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
K10bsu018_u:2855: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kuśīdo bodhisattvaḥ ciraṃ saṃsāracārake duḥkhamanubhavati,
K10bsu018_u:2861: sarvaparityāgī sarvatraparityāgī sattvānāṃ duḥkhaparimocanārthaṃ karuṇācittotpādaṃ dadāti,
K10bsu018_u:2871: dānātṛptatayā dharmaśravaṇātṛptatayā bhāvanātṛptatayā sattvebhyaḥ saṅgrahavastvatṛptatayā viharatavyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2885: acintyacakramatulyacakraṃ anabhilāpyacakraṃ nairyāṇikacakraṃ nairvedhikacakraṃ apravṛtticakraṃ pravartayanti /
K10bsu018_u:2887: 'cirapraviṣṭe bhadrake kalpe praśānte pañcakaṣāye kāle vardhamāne āyuṣi aśītivarṣasahasrikāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:2889: maitreyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
K10bsu018_u:2890: atha vimalavaiśāyano brāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvaikānte sthitvā puṣpamālyacurṇairbhagavataḥ pūjodyukto gāthābhirabhiṣṭauti /
K10bsu018_u:2893: kaste na nayu muni vṛṣabhā lokapradīpā guṇaśatabharitā
K10bsu018_u:2896: sarve samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena purohitena sahasraṃ vedapāṭhakānāṃ bodhau samādāpitāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2897: yathā krakutsandaḥ kanakamuniḥ kāśyapo maitreyo vyākṛta evaṃ siṃhaḥ pradyotaḥ yāvaddvirūnaṃ
K10bsu018_u:2898: sahasraṃ vedapāṭhakānāṃ māṇavakānāṃ sarve 'smin bhadrake kalpe 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu018_u:2900: sarve ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatenāsminneva bhadrake kalpe 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyavasthāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2907: prakṣiptā bhavacārake pratibhayaṃ skandhe niviṣṭā narāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2910: duḥkhena jālitabhūta sarvatribhaveya mithyāya dṛṣṭi sthitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2912: dharmā cakṣu vihīna pañcagatibhiratrāṇa sattvān smarī /
K10bsu018_u:2913: bhāve prajña jahitvā kaṅkṣavimati bodhāya candaṃ jane /
K10bsu018_u:2919: tvaṃ śīghraṃ upasaṃkramya hitakarapādā nipatyaṃ mune /
K10bsu018_u:2920: sarvā bho praṇidhi praśastra sudṛḍha buddho bhava nāyakaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2924: sa ca kulaputra mahābalavegadhārī māṇavaka āha - (KpSū 208)
K10bsu018_u:2930: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastato 'bhiniṣkramya svakāṃ pañcabrāhmaṇadārakānupasthāyakānāmantrayitvovāca - “bho dārakā utpādayatānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:2932: “nāsmākaṃ kiñcid asti yad vayaṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayāmaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2934: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohitaḥ prathamaḥ karabhujo nāmopasthāyakaḥ tasya saptaratnamayaṃ karṇavibhūṣaṇaṃ datvā,
K10bsu018_u:2935: dvitīyaḥ sthālabhujo nāmopasthāyakaḥ tasya dvitīyaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ karṇaveṭhakaṃ datvā,
K10bsu018_u:2936: tṛtīyaḥ jalabhujo nāmopasthāyakastasya saptaratnamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ dadāti,
K10bsu018_u:2940: “gacchata yūyaṃ māṇavakā imāni vastūni buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayitvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha” /
K10bsu018_u:2941: atha te pañcopasthāyakā gatvā bhagavatsakāśaṃ tāni vastuni yathā nikṣiptāni buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṅghasya niryātayitvaivamāhuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2944: peyālaṃ, vyākṛtāḥ kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena karabhujo māṇavako bodhāya bhadrakalpe dṛḍhasvaro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2947: tasyānusaṃdheḥ vegabhujaḥ priyaprasanno nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ, (KpSū 210)
K10bsu018_u:2948: tasyānusaṃdheḥ sārabhujo nāma māṇavako haripatracūḍo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2949: samanantaravyākṛtāste pañcabhadrakalpikā māṇavakāḥ purohitaḥ punarapi mahābalavegadhāriṇamāha - “mahābalavegadhārī gṛhṇāhi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān,
K10bsu018_u:2955: sa ca kulaputra mahābalavegadhārī māṇavako bhagavataḥ purato niṣaṇṇaścāha - “kiyadbahavo bhagavannanāgate 'dhvani munibhāskarā asmin bhadrakalpe
K10bsu018_u:2956: ” ratnagarbhastathāgata āha - “tasmin māṇavaka bhadrake kalpe caturuttaraṃ sahasraṃ munibhāskarāṇāṃ udayaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:2957: māṇavaka āha - “yāvatteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan bhadrake mahākalpe nirvṛtānāṃ jinasūryāṇāṃ paścimako sārabhujo (KpSū 211)
K10bsu018_u:2958: nāma māṇavako 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate haripatracūḍo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgata,
K10bsu018_u:2960: sarveṣāṃ ca bhadrakalpikānāmacirābhisaṃbuddhānāṃ prathamaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dadyāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2963: śīlavirahitān sattvān śīlasaṃpadi samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2964: dṛṣṭivirahitān saṅkaṭaprāptān sattvān samyakdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2968: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacirāstāṅgate saddharme punarahaṃ saddharmanetrī saddharmaparigrahaṃ saddharmasyotpādaṃ saddharmapradīpaṃ loke jvālayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2969: śastrāntarakalpakālasamaye sattvān prāṇātipātavairamaṇyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ yāvat samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2975: durbhikṣāntarakalpakālasamaye 'haṃ sattvāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayeyaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2982: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrakalpe sattvānevaṃrūpairvyasanaiḥ parimocayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2983: yadā caturuttaraṃ sahasraṃ buddhā bhagavanto bhadrake mahākalpe utpannā nirvṛtāśca bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2984: sarveṇa sarvaṃ ca saddharmanetrī antarhitā bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:2986: yāvāṃścaturuttarasahasrāṇāṃ bhadrakalpikānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāyurbhavet tāntakam mama bodhiprāptasya dīrghamāyurbhavet;
K10bsu018_u:2987: yāvāṃśca teṣāṃ śrāvakasaṅgho bhavet tāvān mamaikasya śrāvakasaṅghaḥ syāt; (KpSū 213)
K10bsu018_u:2989: buddhasahasraṃ sattvān viniyet tāvataḥ sattvān ahaṃ vinayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:2990: ye ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ skhaleyurdṛṣṭiprapāte vā prapateyurbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśe 'gauravacittāḥ praduṣṭacittā
K10bsu018_u:2992: rāgacittā āryāpavādāḥ ānantaryakārāśca bhaveyurbodhiprāptaścāhaṃ sarvān saṃsārapaṅkāduddhareyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:2994: yāvan mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmakṣayo na bhavet tāvad bhadrakamahākalpe 'kṣayo bhaveyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:2996: ye mama dhātavo janmaśarīraḥ te 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāstathāgatavigrahāḥ saṃtiṣṭheran dvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtagātrāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:2998: te ca tathāgatavigrahā daśasu dikṣvaprameyebhyo 'saṃkhyeyebhyaḥ śūnyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo (KpSū 214)
K10bsu018_u:2999: gatvā ekaiko buddhavigraho 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ sattvān samādāpayet niveśayet pratiṣṭhāpayed;
K10bsu018_u:3000: yatra buddhakṣetre 'ntarakalpe na nāśo bhavet tatra tathāgatavigrahaḥ sattvān paritrāyedyathā pūrvoktaṃ tathā paścāccintāmaṇiḥ prādurbhavet;
K10bsu018_u:3001: yeśu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ratnavirahitā bhaveyuḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā ratnavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣānnidhayaśca saṃdarśayeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3002: yeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāḥ kuśalakriyāvirahitā bhaveyuḥ vyādhibhīḥ kliṣṭāsteṣu buddhakṣetresu gośīrṣoragasārakālānusārī gandhavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3003: sā ca gandhavṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāṃ kleśavyādhīrdṛṣṭivyādhīḥ kāyavyādhīśca praśamayet;
K10bsu018_u:3004: tataste sattvāḥ puṇyakriyāvastuṣvabhiyuktā bhaveyuḥ svargaparāyaṇā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3005: evaṃrūpamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ sattvān paritrāyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3008: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannaivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryetā na ca sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūto (KpSū 215)
K10bsu018_u:3009: bhaveyaṃ, visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanatāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3011: ye 'pi te saṃpratipannāṃ bhagavan bahuprāṇakoṭyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ sattvāstān ahaṃ buddhān bhagavato virādhayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3013: mā ca me bhūyo bodhihetoḥ saṃsāre saṃsāramāṇasya buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdaḥ kuśalakarmakriyāśabdaḥ śrotrapatheṣu nipatet,
K10bsu018_u:3018: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ satpuruṣa sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtaḥ duḥkhebhyaśca parimocakastena tvaṃ satpuruṣa bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo nāma bhavasva /
K10bsu018_u:3023: nirvṛtasya ca haripatracūḍabhadrasya tathāgatasya saddharme 'ntarhite 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
K10bsu018_u:3024: rocaśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi yāvadbuddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:3026: yāvacca tasya caturuttarasya buddhasahasrasya bhadrakalpikānāṃ śrāvakasaṅgho bhaviṣyati tāvacca tavaikasya śrāvakasaṅgho bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:3028: parinirvṛtasya ca saddharmāntardhānaṃ bhadrakasya mahākalpasya kalpakṣayo na bhaviṣyati;
K10bsu018_u:3030: yāvacchūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gandhavṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāṃ kleśavyādhirdṛṣṭivyādhīḥ kāyavyādhīśca śamayiṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:3031: triṣu caiva puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti svargaparāyaṇāṃśca” /
K10bsu018_u:3033: atha khalu kulaputra bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo bodhisattva āha - “yadi me bhadanta
K10bsu018_u:3034: bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā me bhagavān satapuṇyalakṣaṇālaṅkṛtena pāṇinā
K10bsu018_u:3036: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇālaṅkṛtena pāṇinā bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalasya bodhisattvasya mūrdhānaṃ parimārjayitvā tasthau /
K10bsu018_u:3037: atha khalu kulaputra bhaiṣajyarājajyotirvimalo bodhisattvastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3038: pramuditacitto ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditavaikānte 'tikramya sthitaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3044: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaitadabhavat - “mayā bahavaḥ prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāni,
K10bsu018_u:3046: sarvāvantaṃ parṣadaṃ paśyāmi sarvaiścemairmahāsattvairudārodārāṇi praṇidhānāni kṛtāni
K10bsu018_u:3047: prasannāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi parigṛhītāni sthāpayitvā vāyuviṣṇunānyairbodhisattvaiḥ
K10bsu018_u:3049: mayāpi kaliyugakāle vartamāne sattvā dharmarasena tarpayitavyā,
K10bsu018_u:3051: tathārūpeṇa ca mayā praṇidhānena siṃhanādo naditavyaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3053: sarvāvatī ceyaṃ parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣāsuraśca loko 'yaṃ māṃ prāñjalībhūto namasyeta pūjāṃ ca kuryād /
K10bsu018_u:3054: ayaṃ ca me buddho bhagavān sādhukāramanuprayacchet vyākuryāt,
K10bsu018_u:3055: tathā ye ca daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto mama siṃhanādaṃ nadataḥ sādhukāraṃ pradadyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3057: dūtāṃśca preṣayeyuryat sarvāvatīyaṃ parṣat śṛṇuyāt tāṃśca dūtān paśyet /
K10bsu018_u:3058: ye 'pi ca tasyāṃ paścātkāle mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatā bodhisattvāste 'pyevaṃrūpaṃ kliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ mahākaliyugakāle bodhiṃ (KpSū 219)
K10bsu018_u:3062: yāvat parinirvṛtasyāpi me 'cintyāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātikrānte daśasu dikṣvatulyebhyo
K10bsu018_u:3063: 'parimāṇebhyaśca buddhakṣetrebhyo 'parimāṇā buddhā bhagavanto mama parinirvṛtasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeran,
K10bsu018_u:3066: te ca bodhisattvā mama karuṇāparibhāvitādhiṣṭānaṃ praṇidhānaṃ śrutvā paramāścaryaprāptā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3068: tataśca te evaṃrūpaṃ eva praṇidhānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuryathāhametarhi pratigṛhṇāmi,
K10bsu018_u:3073: evaṃrūpaṃ kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo agrapurohito mahākaruṇāparibhāvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ sarjayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:3074: ekāṃśaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmati (KpSū 220) sma /
K10bsu018_u:3075: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahudevakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi gaganatale divyāni tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vādyanti puṣpavṛṣṭiśca pravarṣitā,
K10bsu018_u:3080: kleśavyākule loke praśamayiṣyasi duḥkhaskandhaṃ sattvānāṃ jñānatoyena praśamayiṣyasi” /
K10bsu018_u:3081: sarvāvatī sā parṣatprāñjalībhūtā abhimukhā ekakaṇṭhena vadati /
K10bsu018_u:3083: pravarapaṇḍitāsmākaṃ hitakara kuruṣva dṛḍhapraṇidhānaṃ pravarabuddhimayaṃ śṛṇomaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:3084: purohitaścopasaṃkrāmati yadā ca nikṣiptaṃ purohitena bhagavataḥ sakāśe jānumaṇḍalaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3085: tāvaccāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvāvatīdaṃ saṃtaraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ kaṃpati prakaṃpati calati pracalati kṣubhyati prakṣubhyati vedhati pravedhati,
K10bsu018_u:3087: ye ca mṛgapakṣiṇaste sarve manojñaṃ snigdhaṃ ca śabdamudīrayanti,
K10bsu018_u:3089: ye kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīṃ niśritya bhūtāḥ prativasanti ye bodhau samādāpitā ye na ca samādāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3091: hitacittāḥ kalyāṇacittā avairacittā akaluṣacittā maitricittā āścaryacittā babhūvuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3092: ye sattvāḥ svargacarāste khe sthā evaṃ paramaprītimanasaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3093: puṣpairmālyairgandhairvādyai ratnacchatrairdhvajaiḥ patākābhirvastraduṣyaiḥ snigdhamanojñaṃ śabdaṃ brāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇāyodyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
K10bsu018_u:3094: caivaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantā devā jambūdvīpaṃ avatīrya gaganatale sthitvā divyairgandhairyāvadduṣyairbrāhmaṇasya praṇidhānaṃ śravaṇārthamudyuktāḥ pūjākarmaṇe /
K10bsu018_u:3098: giri saumya vinardasi siṃharivā na ca kaṃpase dṛḍhamerurivā /
K10bsu018_u:3099: na ca kṣobhyase udadhīṣarivā guṇadoṣavahī samudravāririvā /
K10bsu018_u:3101: mala sarva pravāhasi toyurivā dahi kleśvanaṃ muniragnirivā /
K10bsu018_u:3102: na ca sajjase kvacidvāyurivā muni tattve nidarśaka devurivā /
K10bsu018_u:3103: muni dharma pravarṣasi nāgurivā jaga sarvaṃ tarpayasi vṛṣṭirivā /
K10bsu018_u:3104: anyatīrthaṃ pramardasi siṃharivā guṇagandha pramuñcasi puṣparivā /
K10bsu018_u:3105: madhuragira bhāṣasi brahmarivā jaga duḥkhapramuñcaka vaidyarivā /
K10bsu018_u:3107: kira māna arī dṛḍha vajrarivā chindi tṛṣṇalatā muniśatrurivā /
K10bsu018_u:3108: jaga tārayase naditārurivā dahi jñānatṛṇāṃ munināgarivā /
K10bsu018_u:3109: dadi śītaprabhā municandrarivā nara padma vibodhayi sūryarivā /
K10bsu018_u:3112: jinabuddha viṣāla samudrarivā samacitta jage tṛṇakāṣṭharivā /
K10bsu018_u:3114: muni bodhiya vyākṛta sattva tvayā varalakṣaṇadhāri sukāruṇikā /
K10bsu018_u:3115: tvayi sattva vinīta anantabahū mama vyākari bodhiya agravare /
K10bsu018_u:3116: varaprajñā mahāriṣi satyaruceḥ mama vyākari bodhiya chindi matīṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3117: bhavi buddha jage kalikleśaraṇiḥ sthapi sattvaśatāṃśi viśāntapathe” //
K10bsu018_u:3118: yadā kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamābhirgāthābhiḥ stutvā tasthau,
K10bsu018_u:3119: tāvadeva sā sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣā sādhukāramadāt //
K10bsu018_u:3120: purohita āha - “mayā bhadanta bhagavan bahuprāṇakoṭyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāstaiśca (KpSū 224)
K10bsu018_u:3121: svakasvakodārodārāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi parigṛhītāni pariśuddhāśayāvaruptakuśalamūlāḥ suvinītāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3122: ime ca jyotipālapūrvaṃgamānāṃ caturuttarasahasraṃ vedapāṭhakāṇaṃ ye tathāgatena bhadrakalpikā vyākṛtāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3126: apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakārakā apuṇyakarāḥ paralokabhayādarśino viparītatattvabodhino
K10bsu018_u:3128: tathā devamānuṣikābhiḥ śrīsaṃpattibhirudyuktāḥ triṣu duścariteṣu saṃpratipannāḥ daśasu
K10bsu018_u:3129: kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu virahitāḥ sarvakalyāṇamitrai riñcitāḥ sarvapaṇḍitaiḥ prakṣiptā
K10bsu018_u:3131: nirmuktāḥ sarvakuśalakriyāyāṃ sarve śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūjjhitāḥ sakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3133: kāle sahe buddhakṣetre daśavarṣāyuṣkā bhadrakalpe manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu018_u:3135: tatkālaṃ bhavāvartake saṃsāracakre 'trāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā duḥkhabhājanabhūtāḥ sattvāstāṃ parivarjayitvā svakasvakā buddhakṣetrāḥ pradhānapradhānāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3136: suvinītāśca pariśuddhāśayāḥ avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ ārabdhavīryā bahubuddhakṛtādhikārā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3140: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāśca parigṛhītāstatraiva ca mayā vyākṛtāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:3141: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - “mamāpi bhadanta bhagavan hṛdayaṃ kaṃpati tadyathāpi kiṃśukapatraṃ paramadīnamānaso 'haṃ sarvaśarīraṃ ca me āyāsitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3142: yadi me bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ karuṇāspadabhūtā bodhisattvaistatkālamutsṛṣṭā mahākaliyugāndhakāraprakṣiptāḥ sarvaparivarjitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3145: 'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe daśavarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3146: prajāyāṃ kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇāstāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre na parikhidyeyaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇa,
K10bsu018_u:3149: śrutaṃ ca mayā bhagavataḥ sakāśād “vastunimittaṃ parityāgeyaṃ dānapāramitā” /
K10bsu018_u:3150: tathārūpamahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā janmāntareṣvaprameyāḥ sattvā yācanakā āgamiṣyanti teṣāṃ tathārūpāṃ parityāgaṃ parityajeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3155: ye ca punaḥ sattvā atityāgayācanakā āgatvā yācayeran tadyathā dāsadāsīgrāmanagararājyabhāryāputraduhitṛhastaparityāgapādaparityāgakarṇanāsānayanajihvācarmarudhirāsthikāyajīvitaśiraḥparityāgaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3156: evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ paramaprasannaḥ kāruṇyamānasaḥ aphalābhikāṅkṣī sattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadyāṃ vaineyānukaṃpārthaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3158: yanna kadācit pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvena evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ syurna ca
K10bsu018_u:3159: punaḥ paścāt kaścid bodhisattvaḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃrūpāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3161: yadahaṃ teṣu janmāntareṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ careyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3162: yadahaṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatānāṃ paścimakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ parityāganetrīguṇān sthāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3170: “yā vivekatā sarvasaṃskṛtā bhāvanā udyujyanā sarvāsaṃskṛtaśāntamanuttaracaryayā avivartanā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā” /
K10bsu018_u:3171: “yā sarvasaṃskāreṣu viparyāsaprahāṇāya śūnyatā samudācāraḥ iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā” /
K10bsu018_u:3175: na kaścid bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena
K10bsu018_u:3178: bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
K10bsu018_u:3183: śīlāniśrayatā kṣāntyāmanyanatā vīrye 'nāyūhanatā dhyāneṣvapratiṣṭhitatā prajñāyāmadvayatāṃ careyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3187: ekaikasya sattvasyārthe cāhaṃ kuśalamūlabījasaṃtatyāḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ daśamahākalpān (KpSū 230)
K10bsu018_u:3189: evaṃ tiryakpreteṣu yakṣadaridreṣu manuṣyadaridreṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3190: yathā caikasattvasya santatyāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathā sarvasattvānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ riktamuṣṭisadṛśasantānāṃ vaineyāṃ pratigṛhṇīyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3193: tāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsitvā ekaikasya ca buddhasyāhaṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3195: ekaikasya ca buddhasya sakāśādbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān guṇān adhigaccheyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3197: evaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāmevaṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ yathābhiprāyāṃśca sattvān tathāhaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3198: asati buddhotpāde loka ṛṣivratenāhaṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu niyojayeyaṃ samādhāvabhijñāsu ca niyojayeyaṃ, (KpSū 231)
K10bsu018_u:3200: nārāyaṇabhaktāṃścandrasūryabhaktāṃ yāvadbrahmabhaktān brahmarūpeṇāhaṃ sattvān kuśaladharmeṣu niyojayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3204: vyasanagatāṃśca sattvāṃ svakena kāyena jīvitena ca paritrāyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3205: tāvacciramahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan dagdhasantānānāṃ kuśalamūlaparihīnānāmarthāyātibalavegena cārikāṃ caraṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3206: tāvacciraṃ cāhaṃ saṃsāre sattvahetorvividhacaṇḍaghoradāruṇāṃ duḥkhāṃ praticcheyaṃ:
K10bsu018_u:3208: gaṅgānadīvāikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrake mahākalpe yadā jyotipālo māṇavako
K10bsu018_u:3209: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyati krakutsando nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3210: tasmin samaye āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu
K10bsu018_u:3211: lokadhātuṣu pravartitadhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3214: āryāpavādakā yāvatkumārge vihanyantaḥ mayā saṅkaṭaprāptāḥ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu018_u:3216: mayā te sattvāḥ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ niveśitāḥ syurmayā ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatkuśalamūlabījamanuttare nirvāṇe prakṣiptaṃ syāt,
K10bsu018_u:3218: prajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāre ca niyojitāḥ syustiṣṭhanto yāpayantasteṣu ca buddhakṣetresu buddheṣu bhagavatasūpanītāḥ syuryadānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇapratilabdhā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3219: samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhāśca syurbhūmyavakrāntāśca syurmayā ca te sattvā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā
K10bsu018_u:3220: praṇidhānaṃ samādāpitāḥ śikṣāpitāśca syuryathārūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3221: pratigṛhṇeyuste ca tān ahaṃ tasmin samaye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrakalpe krakutsande jinasūrya
K10bsu018_u:3222: udgate daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ (KpSū 233)
K10bsu018_u:3223: tiṣṭhato yāpayataḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3230: ye ca tasmin samaye dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dṛṣṭimārgasaṃpratipannā
K10bsu018_u:3231: ānantaryakārakāḥ kumārgavihanyamānāsteṣāṃ mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3233: astāṃgate jinasūrye tadāhamanābhogena buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvānniyojayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3234: tasmiṃśca kāle 'tikrānte devalokaṃ gatvā devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3240: amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakarā apuṇyakarā aparalokabhayadarśino
K10bsu018_u:3242: abhiyuktāstriṣu duścariteṣu anabhiyuktā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu abhiyuktā daśasvakuśaleṣu
K10bsu018_u:3248: muṣṭasmṛtayaḥ kuśalajugupsakā duḥprajñā alpaśrutā duḥśīlāḥ kuhakā matsariṇaḥ parasparābhāṣakā
K10bsu018_u:3250: garbhāśayasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vividharogapahatāḥ kliṣṭā durvarṇā avahoṭimakā ahrīkā anapatrāpyāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3252: ekapūrvabhaktena bahukāyavācā manasā duścaritaṃ samācaranti te praśaṃsitaśāśvatadṛṣṭikāḥ sattvā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu018_u:3254: vihiṃsācittāḥ kaluṣacittā rukṣacittāḥ kṣubhitacittā adāntacittā ahitacittā uddhatacittā
K10bsu018_u:3256: dharmavivarjitacittā avipakvacittā dharmeṣu sārambhacittā akuśala utpāditacittāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3261: sarvaparigrahamātsaryacittā akṛtajñacittāḥ paradārākramaṇacittā vyāpādavihiṃsanacittā apraṇidhānacittāḥ sattvāstatkāle
K10bsu018_u:3264: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo
K10bsu018_u:3267: kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda
K10bsu018_u:3274: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu018_u:3276: āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin
K10bsu018_u:3278: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:3285: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ (KpSū 238)
K10bsu018_u:3287: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā
K10bsu018_u:3289: māṃsabhojanarudhirāhārā mṛgacarmaprāvaraṇāḥ praharaṇādhiṣṭhānāḥ prāṇivadhodyuktā rūpakulavaṃśaiśvaryaśāstralipyaśvārohaṇadhanurgrahāyudhaparivārā mātsaryadarpitā bhaviṣyanti;
K10bsu018_u:3291: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ garbhavāsamupagṛhṇīyāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3292: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3293: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto 'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3294: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye (KpSū 239)
K10bsu018_u:3295: vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3296: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3298: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3299: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3300: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3301: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3302: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3303: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3305: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ; (KpSū 240)
K10bsu018_u:3306: tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3309: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
K10bsu018_u:3310: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3313: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
K10bsu018_u:3314: śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā
K10bsu018_u:3315: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3317: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ (KpSū 241)
K10bsu018_u:3319: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
K10bsu018_u:3320: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3321: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
K10bsu018_u:3322: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3323: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3324: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3325: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
K10bsu018_u:3330: samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3331: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3332: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:3333: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
K10bsu018_u:3340: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3342: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3349: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
K10bsu018_u:3352: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
K10bsu018_u:3353: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3355: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
K10bsu018_u:3358: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
K10bsu018_u:3361: vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā gṛhāgārasaṃpannāste 'pi mama duṣkaracaryāmupasaṃkrāmeyuryāvacchrāvakayānikā yathā pūrvoktaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3363: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
K10bsu018_u:3365: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
K10bsu018_u:3366: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3368: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
K10bsu018_u:3370: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena
K10bsu018_u:3371: vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
K10bsu018_u:3372: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ (KpSū 245)
K10bsu018_u:3374: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3379: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3386: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3387: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3389: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet /
K10bsu018_u:3391: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3393: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3397: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3398: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3399: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3402: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
K10bsu018_u:3404: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3409: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3410: ye 'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3411: śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3415: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3416: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3417: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
K10bsu018_u:3419: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3421: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3422: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3423: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3424: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra
K10bsu018_u:3425: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti, (KpSū 249)
K10bsu018_u:3426: piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
K10bsu018_u:3427: teṣām sattvānāmarthe 'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3428: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3433: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3434: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste 'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3435: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3442: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3443: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3446: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:3531: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi
K10bsu018_u:3533: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ; (KpSū 257)
K10bsu018_u:3573: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3577: ye 'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā
K10bsu018_u:3578: dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena
K10bsu018_u:3581: krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
