K10bsu018_u:3582: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3583: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3584: dānapāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3585: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3596: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3597: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3600: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3601: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3603: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte 'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3604: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3605: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3606: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ (KpSū 262)
K10bsu018_u:3617: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
K10bsu018_u:3619: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane 'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3622: vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
K10bsu018_u:3624: yāvat saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmolkāyāṃ nirvāpitāyāṃ dharmadhvaje patite te ca
K10bsu018_u:3625: mama janmaśarīramavatareyuryāvat kāñcanacakre tiṣṭheyuryasmin kāle sahe buddhakṣetre
K10bsu018_u:3626: ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ tiṣṭhet /
K10bsu018_u:3627: tacca tato 'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,
K10bsu018_u:3630: tataśca puṣpavarṣādvividhā śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabda
K10bsu018_u:3641: sarvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvā ajugupsanīyāste tato 'vatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:3642: evameva sarve kāmāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyusteṣāṃ ca tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaratikrīḍāsaumanasyābhiratāṃścittacaitasikāṃ sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3644: te ca devalokādavatīrya sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3645: te ca puṣpā ākāśe vividhā ratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3647: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṃ ratnavṛṣṭiṃ abhipravarṣeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3648: sarve ca sahe buddhakṣetre kalikalahavivādadurbhikṣarogaparacakraparuṣavāgrukṣaviṣaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ praśameyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3649: kṣemārogyā akalahābandhanavigrahāḥ subhikṣāḥ sarve sahe buddhakṣetre saṃsthiheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3650: (KpSū 266) yāni ca sattvāni tāni ratnāni paśyeyuḥ spṛśyeyuḥ upabhogakarma vā kurvīran
K10bsu018_u:3651: te sarve tribhiryānairavaivartyā bhaveyuste ca punaradho yāvat kāñcanacakre sthiheyurevameva
K10bsu018_u:3652: bhadanta bhagavan śastrāntarakalpakāle samaye punasta indranīlamaṇiratnāḥ saṃsthiheyurūrdhvaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3655: tadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravapāriyātrā yāvadevānantaprabhāstasmācca puṣpavarṣādvividhā manojñāḥ śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdo yāvatpūrvoktaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3656: te punaḥ śarīrā adho yāvat kāñcanacakre sthiheyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3657: evaṃ tasmiṃ samaye durbhikṣāntarakalpakāle punaste śarīrā ūrdhvamudgaccheyuryāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiryāvat pūrvoktaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3659: yathā bhadrake mahākalpe mama parinirvṛtasya śarīrāstṛkāryaṃ kuryuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3661: evaṃ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairmahākalpe vartamānairmama śarīrāḥ sattvān vineyustribhiryānairavaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ; yadā (KpSū
K10bsu018_u:3663: lokadhātubhyaste buddhā bhagavanta utpadyeyurye mayā bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3664: samyaksaṃbodhau caryāṃ caratā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ syuḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
K10bsu018_u:3665: mayā ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ syuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3666: bodhiprāptaścāhamapi sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyaṃ niveśayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3667: ye ca punaḥ parinirvṛtasya śarīravikurvaṇenāpi sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu018_u:3669: dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
K10bsu018_u:3670: mama varṇaṃ bhāṣyayeyuḥ śrāvayeyurghoṣaṃ codīrayeyu“ryacciraṃ bhadrako nāma kalpo babhūva,
K10bsu018_u:3671: tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe 'nupraviṣṭe caturthe jinabhāskara evaṃnāmā tathāgato babhūva,
K10bsu018_u:3674: dagdhasantānā akuśalasamavadhānagatā ānantaryakārakā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭikāstena vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3675: yena vayametarhi sarvajñāḥ sarvākāradhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3676: nirvarte tu gaticakre bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrān svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ syuḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:3677: ye ca sattvā bodhyarthikāsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśe mama varṇakīrtiyaśaśca śṛṇuyuste taṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3678: “kamarthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānaḥ sa bhagavāṃstathāgata evaṃ pañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
K10bsu018_u:3679: ” te ca tathāgatāsteṣāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā imaṃ mama mahākaruṇāsamanvāgataṃ
K10bsu018_u:3680: prathamacittotpādaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ praṇidhānapūrvayogaṃ ca bhāṣeyuste ca
K10bsu018_u:3681: bodhyarthikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā āścaryaprāptā bhaveyuste 'pyudārādhimuktikā
K10bsu018_u:3682: bhaveyuste 'pyevaṃrūpāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ sattveṣūtpādayeyurevaṃrūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
K10bsu018_u:3683: evaṃrūpe tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśakaṣāye kaliyuge buddhakṣetre ānantaryakārakāṃ yāvadakuśalasamavadhānāṃ vaineyāṃ (KpSū 269)
K10bsu018_u:3684: pratigṛhṇīyuste ca buddhā bhagavantastān mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ bodhyarthikāṃ kulaputrān
K10bsu018_u:3685: vā kuladuhitṝn vā evaṃrūpeṇa vyākareṇana vyākuryuryathābhiprāyāṃ taiḥ kulaputraiḥ
K10bsu018_u:3686: kuladuhitṛbhirvā tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśe kaliyuge praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3687: apare buddhā bhagavanto mama śarīravivartanebhiḥ pūrvayogaiḥ sattvānāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā vistareṇa bhāṣayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3689: parinirvṛtasya śarīrebhirevaṃ ciramevaṃrūpaṇāṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya evaṃrūpāṇi
K10bsu018_u:3690: vividhāni prātihāryāṇi vividhā ca nānāprakārā vikurvaṇākṛtāstasya śarīravikurvaṇābhirvayaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3692: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vayaṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānān prathamacittotpādādidaṃ pāramitāsu codyogaḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3694: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ sadevagandharvamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ imāṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ pañcaśatāni praṇidhānāni (KpSū 270)
K10bsu018_u:3695: kṛtavān, sa evamāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā cāhamanāgate
K10bsu018_u:3696: 'dhvani bhadarake kalpe tīvrakleṣe raṇakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāṇe 'ndhaloke 'nāyake
K10bsu018_u:3698: yadi cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalamevaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ yathā ca me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3702: na ca punarahaṃ anena kuśalamulena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayāmi,
K10bsu018_u:3711: śīlaṃ svargopapattaye śrutaṃ mahāprajñatāyai bhāvanā visaṃyogāya” /
K10bsu018_u:3714: yacca mayā bhadanta bhagavan dānamayaṃ vā śīlamayaṃ vā śrutamayaṃ vā bhāvanāmayaṃ vā puṇyamārjitaṃ syāt /
K10bsu018_u:3715: yadi naivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāmayāmi;
K10bsu018_u:3716: ye sattvāḥ pracaṇḍamaṇḍaghore 'vīcau narake duḥkhānyanubhavanti te cānena kuśalamūlena tato vyuttiṣṭhantu,
K10bsu018_u:3720: yacca teṣāṃ sattvānāmaparikṣīṇakarmaphalaṃ syāttadahametarhi kālaṃ kṛtvāvicau mahānarake upapadyeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3722: ekaikaśca me kāyaḥ sumeruparvatarājapramāṇo mahān saṃbhavet;
K10bsu018_u:3724: evaṃrūpāḥ suduḥkhā vedanā jānīyādyathaitarhi eṣa ekaḥ śarīraḥ suduḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ saṃjānāti;
K10bsu018_u:3725: ekaikaśca me ātmabhāvo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ tīvrāṃ caṇḍāṃ kharāṃ nairayikāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3726: kāraṇāṃ anubhaveyurye caitarhi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu
K10bsu018_u:3727: lokadhātuṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvadavīciparāyaṇāni karmāṇi samudānītāni syuryacca
K10bsu018_u:3732: sarve ca te sattvā buddhā bhagavanta ārāgayeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3736: yāvaddaśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvaistathārūpaṃ karmasamutthāpitaṃ ākṣiptaṃ niyatavedanīyaṃ pratāpane narake upapadyitavyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3738: evaṃ (KpSū 273) santāpane mahāraurave saṅghāte kālasūtre saṃjīvane,
K10bsu018_u:3743: yadā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvairevaṃrūpaṃ karmākṣiptaṃ syāt,
K10bsu018_u:3744: ye ca manuṣyāndhabadhirā ajihvākā ahastakā apādakāḥ smṛtipramuṣṭacittairutpādyitavyaṃ aśucibhakṣayitavyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3747: yāvacciraṃ saṃsāre dhātvāyatanaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyustāvacciramahaṃ evaṃrūpāṃ vividhe narakatiryakpreteṣu yakṣāsurarākṣaseṣu yāvan manuṣyaduḥkhopapattibhirevaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3749: yadi me evaṃrūpā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā na paripūryeta /
K10bsu018_u:3750: atha khalu ca punarme evaṃrūpānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryeta yāvat pūrvoktaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3752: ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te mama buddhā bhagavantaḥ (KpSū 274)
K10bsu018_u:3756: bhadrake kalpe bhaveyamahaṃ viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;
K10bsu018_u:3757: śakto 'hamevaṃrūpaṃ buddhakāryamabhiniṣpādayituṃ yā me pratijñā kṛtāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:3758: atha tāvadeva sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca lokaḥ kṣitigaganasthitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3759: sthāpayitvā tathāgataṃ te sarve 'śrūṇi pravartayamānāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāhuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3763: tadādhyāśayena sarvasattvā mahākaruṇayā saṃcchāditāya bhūyasānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ pratigṛhītā;
K10bsu018_u:3764: etena praṇidhānena jñāyate yathā tvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtastrāṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:3765: sattvānāṃ duḥkhapramocanārthaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā te āśā paripūryatu vyākarotu ca bhagavānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:3767: svayaṃ ca rājā amṛtaśuddhaḥ prarudamāno brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāha /
K10bsu018_u:3769: sattveṣu tvaṃ dayāpannaḥ asmākaṃ tvaṃ nidarśakaḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:3781: “evaṃ dattaṃ tvayā dānaṃ sattvebhyo mahatī kṛpā /
K10bsu018_u:3793: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ tvamāpnoṣi sattva mocayi duḥkhitān” //
K10bsu018_u:3823: mocesi tvaṃ trayaṃ lokyaṃ prabaddhaṃ bhavabandhanaiḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:3835: balasandarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prarudamāno brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvāñjaliṃ pragṛhītavānāha -
K10bsu018_u:3837: kṛpālu prajvālitā te sattvān mocesi duḥkhitān” //
K10bsu018_u:3838: sarvāvatī ca kulaputra sā parṣā sadevagandharvamāṇuṣā brāhmaṇasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vanditvā kṛtāñjaliḥ sthitvā vicitrābhiranvayapadayuktābhirgāthābhisabhistavitvā tasthau //
K10bsu018_u:3840: yadā ca kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:3841: atha tāvadeva mahāpṛthivicālaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ samantācca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
K10bsu018_u:3842: buddhakṣetreṣu pṛthivī calati pracalati saṃpracalati kṣubhati prakṣubhati saṃprakṣubhati
K10bsu018_u:3843: vedhati pravedhati saṃpravedhati raṇati praraṇati saṃpraraṇati /
K10bsu018_u:3845: vividhā ca puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitāstadyathā māndāravamahāmāndāravaṃ yāvadanantaprabhā evaṃrūpā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitavatī /
K10bsu018_u:3846: yaddaśasu diśāsu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
K10bsu018_u:3847: dhriyanti yāpayanti pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu apariśuddheṣu vā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu018_u:3848: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya
K10bsu018_u:3849: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ dṛṣṭvā punaste bodhisattvāstāṃ buddhāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3851: “ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya (KpSū 285)
K10bsu018_u:3854: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ito buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni
K10bsu018_u:3855: buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya ratnavicayā nāma lokadhātustatra ratnavicaye buddhakṣetre
K10bsu018_u:3856: ratnacandro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati yāpayati aprameyebhyo
K10bsu018_u:3857: 'saṃkhyeyebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ puraskṛtaḥ parivṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma yaduta buddhakṣetre mahāyānakathā /
K10bsu018_u:3859: tau dvau bodhisattvau yena ratnacandrastathāgatastenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnacandraṃ
K10bsu018_u:3860: tathāgatametadavocatāṃ - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya,
K10bsu018_u:3862: ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “asti kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamān buddhakṣetrānatikramya tatra santīraṇo nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3867: ekaścātra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mahākaruṇāparibhāvitā
K10bsu018_u:3868: vāgbhāṣitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇanirdeśaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathārūpā
K10bsu018_u:3869: praṇidhānā udbhāṣitā yadbahubhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhirbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3871: sarvataśca sa eko mahākaruṇāsamanvāgato mahābodhisattvo yaḥ sarvāvatīṃ tāṃ parṣadamabhibhūya
K10bsu018_u:3872: kliṣṭaṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ kleśaraṇikaliyugaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarva ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā
K10bsu018_u:3874: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣat sadevagandharvamāṇuṣāsuraśca lokastaṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamapahāya
K10bsu018_u:3875: tasya mahākāruṇikasya paścimakasya pūjāyodyuktāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena ca vanditvā prāñjalībhūtāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3877: sa ca (KpSū 287) mahāsattvastasya bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇo vyākaraṇaṃ śṛṇvānaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3878: yadā ca sa mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ purato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptavāṃstadā
K10bsu018_u:3879: sa bhagavāṃstathārūpaṃ smitaṃ prādurakārṣidyathā daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
K10bsu018_u:3881: sarvatra ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prabodhanārthaṃ mahākaruṇābodhisattvapraṇidhānacaryānidarśanārthaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3882: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo digbhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ
K10bsu018_u:3884: bhāṣaṇārthaṃ tena tathāgatena evaṃrūpāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśitāni” /
K10bsu018_u:3885: tau ca kulaputra dvau bodhisattvau taṃ ratnacandraṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchate sma /
K10bsu018_u:3886: kiyaccirotpāditaṃ bhadanta bhagavāṃstena mahākāruṇikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhicittaṃ?
K10bsu018_u:3888: yena pañcakaṣāye loke tīvrakleśaraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne kālaḥ (KpSū 288)
K10bsu018_u:3889: parigṛhīta ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ?” /
K10bsu018_u:3890: ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “sāṃprataṃ kulaputra tena mahākāruṇikena prathamacittamutpāditaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:3891: gacchata kulaputra yūyaṃ tat santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
K10bsu018_u:3893: taṃ ca mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ madvacanān pṛcchatha;
K10bsu018_u:3898: evaṃ ca prathamacittotpādena tvaṃ satpuruṣa mahākāruṇikavyāhāreṇa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetrāṇi śabdenāpūritāni,
K10bsu018_u:3899: tena tvayā sarvatra mahākāruṇika nāma pratilabdhaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:3900: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyaḥ paścimakānāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa praṇidhānanetrīdhvajamucchrayaṇaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3902: bhūyo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anāgatānasaṃkhyeyān kalpān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān daśadiśi lokadhātuṣu yaśaḥkīrtiśabdenāpūraya
K10bsu018_u:3903: yena tvayā bahvasaṃkhyeyasattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītāni,
K10bsu018_u:3907: ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitāḥ sarve te paścād yāvad buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsaṃkhyeyakalpairdaśasu
K10bsu018_u:3908: dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhatvaṃ prāpya dharmacakraṃ
K10bsu018_u:3910: anena tṛtīyena kāraṇena te sādhu satpuruṣa” /
K10bsu018_u:3911: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dvānavatibodhisattvakoṭya ekakaṇṭhena vadanti /
K10bsu018_u:3912: “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchemaḥ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikaṃ darśanāya vandanāya
K10bsu018_u:3914: vandanāya, yasya tathāgatena tribhiraṅgaiḥ sādhukāraḥ preṣita,
K10bsu018_u:3916: sa ca kulaputra ratnacandrastathāgata āha - “gacchata kulaputrā yasyaitarhi kālaṃ manyadhve,
K10bsu018_u:3917: tatra ca ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt samādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ caryāvaiśāradyadharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyadhve” /
K10bsu018_u:3918: atha tau dvau kulaputrau ratnaketuścandraketuśca ratnacandrasya tathāgatasya sakāśāccandrarocavimalaṃ
K10bsu018_u:3919: puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā sārdhaṃ dvānavatibhirbodhisattvakoṭībhī ratnavicayāyāṃ lokadhātau saṃprasthitau /
K10bsu018_u:3920: tadyathāpi nāma vidyutā evameva tato bodhisattvaparṣād ratnavicaye buddhakṣetre 'ntarhitau,
K10bsu018_u:3921: iha saṃtīraṇe buddhakṣetre jambūvanodyāne ca sthitau /
K10bsu018_u:3922: yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāme taṃ upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:3923: pādau śirasā vanditvā vividhābhirbodhisattvavikurvaṇābhiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ratnagarbhasya
K10bsu018_u:3924: tathāgatasyāgrato brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāvatīṃ ca bodhisattvaparṣāṃ prāñjalībhūtāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3928: atha tau dvau bodhisattvau bhagavataḥ sakāśāt parivartitvā brāhmaṇasya puṣpaṃ upanāmayitvā
K10bsu018_u:3929: etadavocatāṃ - “imaṃ te satpuruṣa ratnacandreṇa tathāgatena candrarocavimalaṃ puṣpaṃ preṣitaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3932: peyālaṃ, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyaḥ pūrvāyāṃ diśāyāṃ buddhakṣetrebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ santīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ saṃprāptāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3937: tatra niryūhavijṛṃbhito nāma lokadhātustatra niryūhavijṛṃbhite buddhakṣetre siṃhavijṛṃbhiteśvararājā
K10bsu018_u:3938: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati yāpayati śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:3942: siṃhavajraketustau dvau bodhisattvau siṃhavijṛṃbhiteśvararājaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ
K10bsu018_u:3943: sma - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya
K10bsu018_u:3946: peyālaṃ, yāvad aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyanyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ saṃtīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:3948: tena khalu punaḥ samayena paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrānatikramitvā tatra jayāvatirnāma
K10bsu018_u:3951: tatra bhadravairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ siṃhavijṛṃbhitakāyaśca nāma dvitīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastau dvau satpuruṣau jitendriyaviśālanetraṃ (KpSū 293)
K10bsu018_u:3956: tatra jamburnāma lokadhātustatra lokeśvararāja nāma tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān
K10bsu018_u:3957: śuddhānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:3960: tau lokeśvararājaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ sma - “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvasya,
K10bsu018_u:3964: tatra vigatatamo 'ndhakārā nāma lokadhātustatra vigatabhayaparyutthānaghoṣo nāma
K10bsu018_u:3968: tatra buddhakṣetre dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvāveko 'rajavairocano nāma dvitīyaḥ svargavairocano nāma,
K10bsu018_u:3970: tena khalu punaḥ samayenopariṣṭhāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāddve śatasahasre buddhakṣetrāṇāmatikramitvā
K10bsu018_u:3971: tatra saṃkusumitā nāma lokadhātustatra saṃkusumite buddhakṣetre prasphulitakusumavairocano
K10bsu018_u:3972: nāma tathāgata yāvad buddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati yāpayati,
K10bsu018_u:3974: tatra buddhakṣetre dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau prativasata,
K10bsu018_u:3975: ekaḥ svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayo nāma dvitīyo dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopito nāma bodhisattvastau dvau satpuruṣau prasphulitakusumavairocanaṃ tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantau /
K10bsu018_u:3976: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya (KpSū 295)
K10bsu018_u:3979: dve śatasahasre buddhakṣetrāṇāmatikramya tatra saṃtīraṇo nāma lokadhātustatra ratnagarbho
K10bsu018_u:3980: nāma tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃstiṣṭhati dharmaṃ ca deśayati sma /
K10bsu018_u:3982: ekaśca tatra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa evaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān,
K10bsu018_u:3987: sa caiko mahākaruṇāsamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sarvāvatiṃ parṣadamabhibhūya kliṣṭaṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ kleśāraṇikaliyugaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ (KpSū 296)
K10bsu018_u:3989: sarve cānantaryakārakā yāvad akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasaṃtānā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3990: sarvāvatīrca sā parṣā sadevagandharvāsuramānuṣaśca loko ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:3991: pūjāmapahāya tasya mahākāruṇikasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktāḥ pañcamaṇḍalena vanditvā prāñjalibhūtāḥ
K10bsu018_u:3993: sa ca mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣaṇṇo vyākaraṇaṃ śṛṇvānaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:3994: yadā ca tena mahāsattvena tasya bhagavataḥ purato dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ tadā tena bhagavatā tathārūpaṃ smitaṃ prāviṣkṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3995: yadā daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kaṃpitā yāvat puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā /
K10bsu018_u:3996: sarvebhyaśca tebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prabodhanārthaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:3998: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamebhyo lokadhātubhyo daśabhyo digbhyastatra buddhakṣetre sannipatanārthaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4002: tau ca kulaputra dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayaśca dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopitaśca taṃ prasphulitakusumavairocanaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchataḥ sma /
K10bsu018_u:4003: “kiyaccirotpāditaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃstena mahākāruṇikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhāya cittaṃ?
K10bsu018_u:4004: ; kiyacciraṃ vā sa mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4005: yena pañcakaṣāye loke tīvrakleśaraṇike kaliyuge vartamāne kālaḥ parigṛhīta ānantaryakārakā yāvad akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dagdhasaṃtānā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ?” /
K10bsu018_u:4006: prasphulitakusumavairocanastathāgata āha - “saṃprati kulaputra tena mahākāruṇikena prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4007: gacchata kulaputrā yūyaṃ santīraṇaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10bsu018_u:4008: samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya taṃ ca samādhānamukhanirdeśaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4010: taṃ ca mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mama vacanena pṛcchatha evaṃ ca vaktavyaḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4012: satpuruṣa pṛcchate candrarocavimalaṃ puṣpaṃ preṣitaṃ sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4013: evaṃ ca tvayā satpuruṣa prathamacittotpādena mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ śabdenāpūritāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4014: mahākaruṇāśabdaśca pratilabdhastena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4015: paścimakānāṃ mahākaruṇāmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa praṇidhānanetrīdhvajāmucchrepayasi;
K10bsu018_u:4016: tena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu bhūyastvaṃ satpuruṣa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāgatā
K10bsu018_u:4022: kaiścittatraiva bhagavataḥ sakāśe praṇidhānena buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ svakaruṇāraśmibhirācchāditā; (KpSū 299)
K10bsu018_u:4023: ye tvayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā na ca vyākaraṇapratilabdhaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4026: buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhatvaṃ prāpya dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ
K10bsu018_u:4028: etena tṛtīyena kāraṇena tvaṃ satpuruṣa sādhu” /
K10bsu018_u:4029: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahubodhisattvakoṭya evamūcur[“]vayamapi bhadanta bhagavaṃstatra saṃtīraṇe buddhakṣetre gacchema,
K10bsu018_u:4030: tasya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K10bsu018_u:4031: taṃ ca satpuruṣaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K10bsu018_u:4034: sa ca kulaputra prasphulitakusumavairocanastathāgatastānāha - “gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrā yasyaitarhi kālaṃ manyadhve /
K10bsu018_u:4035: tatra yūyaṃ kulaputrā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt samavadhānamukhanirdeśacaryāvaiśāradyaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ (KpSū 300) śroṣyatha” /
K10bsu018_u:4036: atha khalu kulaputra tau dvau bodhisattvau svaviṣayasaṃkopitaviṣayaśca dhāraṇīsaṃpraharṣaṇavikopitaśca
K10bsu018_u:4038: gṛhītvā bahubodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃkusumitādbuddhakṣetrāt prasthāpitā iha
K10bsu018_u:4039: buddhakṣetra ekakṣaṇena saṃprāptā jambūvanodyāne tasthuryena ca ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4040: tena khalu punaḥsamayena sarvāvantaṃ saṃtīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4042: mahoragaistadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā saṃpannaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet /
K10bsu018_u:4043: evameva tasmin samaye saṃtīraṇaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sphuṭaṃ mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrairyāvan
K10bsu018_u:4044: mahoragaiste ca bodhisattvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā vividhasamādhānabalena
K10bsu018_u:4045: bodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purataḥ brāhmaṇaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4046: dṛṣṭvā sarvāvatyaśca tāḥ parṣāḥ prāñjalibhūtāḥ sthitvā varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4048: “ayaṃ mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya prasphulitakusumavairocanena tathāgatena ime candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpā visarjitās[” /
K10bsu018_u:4049: ]te ca bodhisattvā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt parāvṛtya tasya brāhmaṇasya te candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpā upanāmayitvāhuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4050: “ime te satpuruṣa prasphulitakusumavairocanena tathāgatena candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ preṣitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4053: yāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravarṣitāni,
K10bsu018_u:4058: yaddaśasu diśāsu teṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitāstatra (KpSū 302)
K10bsu018_u:4059: ye kecit sattvā manuṣyā vāmanuṣyāste sarve ye kecit sattvā yamasadṛśāḥ kecidudakasadṛśāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4060: kecicchikharasadṛśāḥ kecidbrahmasadṛśāḥ kecicchakrasadṛśāḥ kecit puṣpasadṛśāḥ kecidgaruḍasadṛśāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4061: kecit siṃhasadṛśāḥ kecit sūryasadṛśāḥ keciccandrasadṛśāḥ kecit tārakasadṛśāḥ kecidgṛdhrasadṛśāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4063: yathārūpeṇa kuśalapakṣamanaskāreṇa te sattvāḥ sanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya,
K10bsu018_u:4065: tathārūpāśca kulaputra tatra sattvāḥ svakaṃ kāyaṃ paśyanti;
K10bsu018_u:4066: tathārūpāśca te sattvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya kāyaṃ samanupaśyanti /
K10bsu018_u:4068: samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ purataḥ sahasrapatre saptaratnamayapadmakeśare niṣaṇṇaṃ samanupaśyati /
K10bsu018_u:4069: sarve cātra kulaputra sattvā niṣaṇṇā vā sthitvā vā kṣitau vā ambare vā ekaikaḥ sattvo ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamevaṃ paśyanti;
K10bsu018_u:4073: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sādhukāramanupradattaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4075: gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ tvaṃ asi kāruṇikahitakaraḥ prabhāsakaro loke saṃdṛśyase /
K10bsu018_u:4076: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa saṃpannaṃ puṣpakṣetraṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāgandhaṃ nānāsparśaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānādaṇḍaṃ nānāmūlaṃ nānābhaiṣajyopakaraṇasthānaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4077: kecidatra puṣpā yojanaśataṃ pramāṇena varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti,
K10bsu018_u:4080: kecidatra puṣpā yāvat sarvacāturdvīpikāṃ lokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena tapanti virocanti /
K10bsu018_u:4081: ye ca tatra sattvāścakṣurhīnāste puṣpagandhaṃ ghrātvā cakṣuṃsi pratilabhante,
K10bsu018_u:4084: ye ca tatra sattvāścaturuttararogaśatopadrutāste taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvarogebhyaḥ parimucyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4085: ye ca tatra sattvā mattonmattaparamattāḥ suptacittā vikṣiptacittāḥ smṛtipraṇaṣṭāsteṣāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhamāghrātvā (KpSū 304)
K10bsu018_u:4087: evaṃ ca tatra madhye puṣpakṣetre puṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4088: dṛḍhasāraṃ vajramayaṃ vaidūryadaṇḍaṃ śatakomalaṃ kanakapatramaśmagarbhakiṃśukaṃ lohitamuktikeśaraṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4090: tacca puṇḍarīkaṃ daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāllokadhātuṃ varṇena gandhena sphuritvā virocate /
K10bsu018_u:4091: ye ca brāhmaṇa teṣu daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā
K10bsu018_u:4092: dhātuviruddhāḥ kāyā vyādhyupahatā aṅgavihīnā vā mattapramattonmattāḥ suptasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā
K10bsu018_u:4093: vikṣiptacittāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya puṇḍarīkasyāvabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ ghrātvā sarvavyādhayaḥ
K10bsu018_u:4095: ye ca tatra buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā mṛtā acirakālagatā avikṣiptaśarīrāsteṣāṃ kuṇapebhyaḥ
K10bsu018_u:4096: tasya puṇḍarīkasya raśmayo nipatitvā gandhena vā spṛṣṭvā punaste kuṇapā jīvitendriyaṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4097: punaścottiṣṭheyurmitrasālohitāṃśca dṛṣṭvā te sarve udyānaṃ praviśya pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samaṅgībhūtā vihareyusye ca punastataścyaveyusteṣu dve brahmavihāra upapadyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4101: yathā sūryodgamanakāle pratyupasthite te puṣpā visaritā prasphulitā bhavanti tapanti virocanti kecidyojanaśatamuccatvena kecid yāvad yojanasahasramuccatvena,
K10bsu018_u:4103: evameva satpuruṣāḥ tathāgato buddhasūryo loka udapādi /
K10bsu018_u:4104: yathā te puṣpāḥ sūryoditasya asya raśmibhirvikasitā bhāsanti
K10bsu018_u:4107: evamevāhaṃ satpuruṣa loka utpannaḥ sattvāṃ kāruṇyaraśmibhiḥ chādayitvā vikasitvā bhūyaḥ sattvāṃstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niyojayāmi,
K10bsu018_u:4108: tvayāpyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveṣitāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4109: pratiṣṭhāpitā mama ca sakāśamupanītāstaiśca sattvairmama sakāśe svakasvakāni praṇidhānāni
K10bsu018_u:4113: yaiḥ satpuruṣairmama sakāśāt pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītāstaiḥ śuddhāśayāḥ suvineyā avaruptakuśalamūlā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītā, (KpSū
K10bsu018_u:4117: na ca te bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ karuṇārthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣante /
K10bsu018_u:4122: yeṣāmevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavarjitā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatairmātṛgrāmairvivarjite
K10bsu018_u:4124: bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāṃ śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4126: bahūni kalpāni śūddhāśayānāṃ suvinītānāṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4130: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārayitvā pañcabhiraṅgulībhirnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇā raśmayaḥ prāmuñcan,
K10bsu018_u:4131: te gatvā raśmayo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā purimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrān avabhāsayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:4133: tatrāṅguṣṭhāyāṃ lokadhātau daśavarṣāyuṣkā manuṣyā durvarṇā drohoḍimakā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā aṅguṣṭhamātramuccatvena /
K10bsu018_u:4135: sa ca kaliyugapramāṇānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastamekaṃ tathāgata ūrdhvatvena hastaśca;
K10bsu018_u:4137: sa ca tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tribhiryānairdharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:4138: atha khalu kulaputra tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃśca manuṣyāṃstaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sarvāvatī ca sā parṣādrākṣīt /
K10bsu018_u:4139: ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha āha - “anena jyotīrasena tathāgatenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairatikrāntaiḥ prathamacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau (KpSū 308)
K10bsu018_u:4142: yathābhiprāyāṃ sattvaistasya tathāgatasya purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4143: kecidbuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītāḥ pariśuddhāḥ kecidapariśuddhāḥ pañcakaṣāyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4144: tatra ca tena mahāsattvenāhaṃ samādāpito niveśitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksabodhau /
K10bsu018_u:4145: tatra ca mayā ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4146: sa ca me tathāgataḥ sādhukāramadāsīt vyākṛtaścāhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:4147: yo 'sāvasmākaṃ bodhāya samādāyakaḥ kalyāṇamitro 'tīva satpuruṣastīvrapañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne kāle pratikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4149: vaineyasattva praṇidhānaḥ parigṛhītastasya satpuruṣasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo
K10bsu018_u:4151: yāpayanto buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāraṃ pradattavantaḥ preṣitavanto,
K10bsu018_u:4153: sa ca mahākaruṇāvairocanasaumyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitro hitakara etarhyacirābhisaṃbuddho 'ṅguṣṭhavatyāṃ lokadhātau aṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye,
K10bsu018_u:4154: teṣāṃ evāṅguṣṭhapramāṇānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ hastapramāṇena hastapramāṇakaḥ sa tathāgato daśavarṣāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitavān;
K10bsu018_u:4155: tasyāpi bodhiprāptasya daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyebhyo lokadhātubhyastiṣṭhadbhiryāpayadbhistaistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdūtāḥ preṣitāḥ pūjanārthāya,
K10bsu018_u:4156: ye tena prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4157: ye tena prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ
K10bsu018_u:4159: paśya brāhmaṇa yathā te buddhā bhagavataḥ sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dīrgheṇāyuṣā pariśuddhāśayānāṃ sukhavihāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ (KpSū
K10bsu018_u:4160: kurvanti; sa ca jyotīrasastathāgata evaṃ pratikruṣṭe pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre buddhatvaṃ prāptavān,
K10bsu018_u:4161: ānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatānāṃ sattvānāmevālpakenāyuṣā bahvatirekaṃ buddhakāryaṃ karoti,
K10bsu018_u:4163: evameva tvayā satpuruṣa sarvāmimāṃ bodhisattvaparṣāmabhibhūya viśiṣṭataraṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4164: pratikruṣṭe buddhakṣetre pañcakaṣāye vartamāne ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4165: ye ca te mahāsattvā yaiḥ pariśuddhā buddhakṣetrāḥ parigṛhītā narakatiryagyoniparivarjitāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaparivarjitāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4166: śuddhāśayāḥ suvinītā avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ime sattvāḥ puṣpopamā ucyante,
K10bsu018_u:4167: na te mahāsattvāḥ puṇḍarīkopamā ye suvinītānāmavaruptakuśalamūlānāṃ madhye buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti /
K10bsu018_u:4177: tadyathāpi nāma brāhmaṇa imān mahābodhisattvaparṣāṃ sthāpayitvā vāyuviṣṇunā yenāpariśuddhaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4178: buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ kleśākulāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītā ekatyo bhadrakalpikāḥ kulaputrāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4189: tvaṃ brāhmaṇaitarhi aprameyānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ madhye kuśalavyākaraṇakṣetraṃ tathāgatasyāgrataḥ karuṇāpuṇḍarīkamutpannaṃ praṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa
K10bsu018_u:4190: yadā tvayā ānantaryakārakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstīvraṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4191: mahākaruṇāvyāhāreṇa tvaṃ satpuruṣa daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sādhukāro datto,
K10bsu018_u:4195: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahākāruṇikānāgate 'dhvanyatikrāntānāmekagaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāṃ parīttāvaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame
K10bsu018_u:4196: tasmineva sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake kalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4200: loke tathāgato bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;
K10bsu018_u:4201: vivartitagaticakraḥ pravartitadharmacakraḥ vivartitavaśavartimārakleśamāraśca anantāparyantāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇi śabdenāpūrayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:4205: yathā tasmin samaye 'yaṃ rājāmṛtaśuddho 'mitāyurnāmāprameyaiḥ kalpaiḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:4206: evameva tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tatra sahe buddhakṣetre bhadrake mahākalpe viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyāṃ prajāyāṃ pañcacatvāriṃśatibhirvarṣairevaṃrūpaṃ sakalaṃ mahābuddhakāryaṃ kariṣyasi,
K10bsu018_u:4208: parinirvṛtasya ca te satpuruṣānuttaraparinirvāṇenādhikaṃ varṣasahasraṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyate /
K10bsu018_u:4209: saddharme cāntarhite tava satpuruṣa te 'pi dhātavaḥ janmaśarīre evaṃrūpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyanti,
K10bsu018_u:4214: sa evamāha - “teṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu tava satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhaṃ nityopasthāyaka upakaraṇamaitryānukūlaḥ sahāyako bhūtvā tvāmupasthiheyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:4217: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:4219: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ janetrī mātā bhaveyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4220: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ mahākāruṇika māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:4222: sāpyāha - “teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasyāhaṃ kṣīradhātrī mātā bhaveyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4231: sa evamāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika teṣu teṣu yāvaccaramabhavikasya putro bhaveyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:4233: sāpyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇika tāsu tāsu jātiṣu bhāryā bhaveyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4234: bodhiprāptaśca tvaṃ satpuruṣa māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:4236: so 'pyāha - “ahaṃ te mahākāruṇikā teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu satpuruṣa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasyāhamupakaraṇamaitryānukulaḥ sahāyo dāsatvenopasthiheyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4238: bodhiprāptasya ca te satpuruṣa dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartane 'dhyayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4239: ahaṃ ca te dharmadeśanāṃ prathamāṃ saphalāṃ kuryāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4246: sa āha - “ahaṃ te bho mahābrāhmaṇa bahūpakaraṇasahāyako bhaviṣyāmi /
K10bsu018_u:4248: nityaṃ ca tvatsakāśamupasaṃkrameyaṃ vastuyācanārthaṃ śayyāsanavāhanahastyaśvarathagrāmanigamanagarakulaputraduhitṛmāṃsarudhiracarmāsthihastapādajihvākarṇanāsanayanaśīrṣāṇi ca yāceyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4251: evaṃrūpo 'haṃ mahābrāhmaṇa bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇasya tava ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sahāyako bhaveyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:4252: yāvattvaṃ bodhiṃ prāpnuyā ahaṃ ca te śrāvakasthānamāsādayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4254: tvaṃ ca māṃ vyākuryā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
K10bsu018_u:4255: śrutvā ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko brāhmaṇo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā,
K10bsu018_u:4257: “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa yastvaṃ mama sahāyako bhaviṣyasi anuttaracaryāya,
K10bsu018_u:4261: bhūyaśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:4262: purata āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavaṃsteṣu teṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:4263: samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇasya ye mama purato yācanakāḥ sthitvānnaṃ yācanti
K10bsu018_u:4264: mṛduvacanena vā puruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghanavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā yāceyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4265: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣaṃ utpādayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4266: aprasādaṃ votpādayeyaṃ dānasya vā phalavipākaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇo dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4267: visaṃvāditā me bhaveyuḥ ye 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:4270: bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasya prasannacitto dānaṃ dadyāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4273: antaśo vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4274: yadīdaṃ pratigrāhakasya vālāgrakoṭīpramāṇamātramapi kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvantarāyaṃ kuryuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4277: yāvad ye mama yācanakāḥ śīrṣaṃ yāceyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4278: mṛduvacanena vā paruṣavacanena vā ullaṅghyavacanena vā spaṣṭavacanena vā śīrṣaṃ yācayeran;
K10bsu018_u:4279: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan yācanakasyāntike ekacittakṣaṇamapi roṣamutpādayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4284: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ yāvatprajñā parityāgo vācyaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:4286: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāramadāsīt /
K10bsu018_u:4288: mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣemaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:4289: sā ca kulaputra sarvāvatī parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣāsuraśca lokaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt /
K10bsu018_u:4291: mahākaruṇāpratiṣṭhitena manasā tvayā satpuruṣa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam /
K10bsu018_u:4293: sa ca kulaputra yathā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmājīviko bodhisattvo dānapratigrāhikayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān,
K10bsu018_u:4295: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastānyevaṃrūpāṇi praṇidhānāni caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ sakāśācchrutvā saṃjñāvikārabhīṣmeṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4296: atha mahākāruṇikaḥ paramaprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalībhūtaḥ sthitvā sarvāvatīṃ parṣāṃ vyavalokya paramaprītamanā āha /
K10bsu018_u:4298: bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ dharmadurbhikṣakṣīṇakāle mahākleśaraṇe kaliyuge pañcakaṣāye vartamāne loke 'nāyake sārthavāho 'vabhāsakaraḥ pradīpakaraḥ atrāṇānāmandhānāṃ mārganidarśakaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4300: sahāyakāḥ pratilabdhā ye mama janmāntareṣu śīrṣapratigrāhakā bhaviṣyanti nayanakarṇanāsājihvāhastapādacarmāsthirudhiraṃ
K10bsu018_u:4302: punarapi kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:4303: purato niṣaṇṇa āha - “ye ca mama bhadanta bhagavan teṣu teṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu
K10bsu018_u:4304: janmāntareṣu yācanakā upasaṃkrāmeyuryadi vānnaṃ yadi vā pānaṃ yāvacchiraḥ pratigṛhṇīyurantaśo
K10bsu018_u:4306: sacedahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya na tāṃ sattvāṃ saṃsārāt parimocayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4307: na ca punarvyākuryāṃ chrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
K10bsu018_u:4308: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ya etarhi daśasu dikṣu,
K10bsu018_u:4311: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sādhukāraṃ prādāsīt /
K10bsu018_u:4314: yathā meruśikhariṃdhareṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādena lokeśvarajyotiṣastathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:4315: purataḥ evaṃrūpayā bodhisattvacaryayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃrūpā bodhisattvacārikā
K10bsu018_u:4317: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā mahākalpā atikrāntā yathā tena satpuruṣeṇa purimāyāṃ diśīto koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetre
K10bsu018_u:4319: jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvaro nāma babhūva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān,
K10bsu018_u:4321: tasya khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya varṣasahasraṃ saddharmanetrī asthāsīt;
K10bsu018_u:4323: ye khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmanetryavasthitāyāṃ (KpSū 322)
K10bsu018_u:4324: saddharmapratirūpakā vā bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī vā duḥśīlapāpadharmā viṣamasamudācārāḥ staupikavastugrāhakālajjikā
K10bsu018_u:4325: vā dharmapūjācchedālajjasaṃsṛṣṭā vā caturdiśasaṅghasya vā saṃmukhībhūtasaṅghasya
K10bsu018_u:4328: tena khalu mahākāruṇika jñānakusumavirajasamucchrayabodhīśvareṇa tathāgatena sarve 'nupūrveṇa vyākṛtastribhiryānaiḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4329: ye kecin mahākāruṇika tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtāḥ sarve te avaivartikā vyākṛtāstribhiryānaiḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4330: ye 'pi kecin mūlāpattisamāpannā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā pūrvameva te tena tathāgatena śāstṛsaṃjñākuśalamūlavipākena tribhiryānairavaivartikā vyākṛtāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:4331: punaraparaṃ kulaputra sa mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:4332: purata āha - “eṣaiva me bhadanta bhagavan praṇidhiryāvadevāhamanuttarāyāṃ bodhicaryāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:4333: caramāṇo yān sattvānahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayeyaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ yāvat (KpSū 323)
K10bsu018_u:4335: yāvadbodhiparyantena caryāṃ caramāṇo na tān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikabhūmau sthāpayeyamantaśa ekasattvamapi,
K10bsu018_u:4336: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:4338: anuttarajñānapratilabdhaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan ye me sattvāḥ śāsane raktakāṣāyaprāvṛtā bhaveyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4339: yadi vā mūlāpattimāpannāḥ syuryadi vā dṛṣṭivyasanaṃ saṃpratipannāḥ syuryadi vā triṣu
K10bsu018_u:4340: ratneṣu skhalitāḥ sāparādhā bhaveyurbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā ya ekakṣaṇamapi mama
K10bsu018_u:4341: sakāśe śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ vā gauravacittaṃ votpādayeyurdharme vā saṅghe vā gauravacittamutpādayeyuḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4342: sacedahaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃstān sattvāṃstribhiryānairavaivartikāṃ na vyākuryāmantaśa
K10bsu018_u:4343: ekasattvamapi riṃceyurvisaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuryāvan mā cāhamanuttarāṃ
K10bsu018_u:4346: ca me bhadanta bhagavan devamanuṣyasatkṛtaṃ gurukṛtaṃ mānitaṃ pūjitaṃ raktakāṣāyacīvaraṃ bhavet /
K10bsu018_u:4347: sahadarśanena sattvāḥ kāṣāyakaṇṭhāstribhiryānairavaivartikā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitā
K10bsu018_u:4348: annapānavirahitā yakṣadāridrā vāntaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ sattvā ye kāṣāyamabhilaṣeyurantaśaścaturaṅgulamapi,
K10bsu018_u:4350: ye sattvāḥ parasparaviruddhavairabahulāḥ parasparayuddhasaṃgrāmagatā vā devā vā yakṣā
K10bsu018_u:4351: vā rākṣasā vā nāgā vā asurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā kuṃbhāṇḍā vā piśācā
K10bsu018_u:4353: te sattvāḥ karuṇācittā mṛducittā avairacittāḥ karmaṇyacittā bhaveyurye sattvāḥ saṃgrāme
K10bsu018_u:4354: vā vivāde vā yuddhe vā kalahe vā kāṣāyakhaṇḍakaṃ rakṣārthaṃ pūjanārthaṃ gauravārthaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4355: hareyuste sattvāḥ sadā aparājitā bhaveyuraskhalitā aviheṭhitā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4356: svastinā tataḥ saṃgrāmādvā yuddhādvā kalahādvā vivādādvā parimucyeyuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4357: yadi me bhadanta bhagavannebhiḥ pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktaṃ kāṣāyaṃ na samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
K10bsu018_u:4358: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣu, (KpSū 325)
K10bsu018_u:4359: yāvan, mā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4360: dharmā me saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā cāhaṃ śaktaḥ anyatīrthikāṃ parigṛhītuṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4361: ye ca bhadanta bhagavan mamābhisaṃbuddhasya yāvat parinirvṛtasya
K10bsu018_u:4366: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayitvā karatalena mahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ parimārjayitvāha - “sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa,
K10bsu018_u:4368: evameva te satpuruṣa pañcabhirāryaguṇai raktakāṣāyaṃ sattvānāmupajīvyaṃ bhaviṣyati” /
K10bsu018_u:4369: sa bho punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena vyākareṇena sādhukāraprāmodya
K10bsu018_u:4373: punarapi kulaputra sarvāvatī sā parṣā sadevagandharvamānuṣā prāñjalibhūtā tasthau,
K10bsu018_u:4374: mahākāruṇikasya pūjākarmaṇe udyuktāḥ puṣpairvādyairmahākāruṇikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā vicitravarṇaiḥ ślokaistuṣṭāva //
K10bsu018_u:4378: sa ca punaḥ kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:4379: pañcamaṇḍalena pādau śirasā vanditvā ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya purato niṣasāda
K10bsu018_u:4382: kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ?
K10bsu018_u:4383: ; kiyatā bhadanta bhagavan samādhānamukhanirdeśasaṃbhāraviśuddhimukho dharmaparyāyaḥ paripūrṇo bhavati?
K10bsu018_u:4384: ; kiyadrūpeṇa vā bhadanta bhagavan saṃbhāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛḍhapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
K10bsu018_u:4386: ” sa bhoḥ punaḥ kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahākāruṇikaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - “sādhu (KpSū 328)
K10bsu018_u:4387: sādhu mahākāruṇika bhadrakaḥ praśnaḥ kalyāṇaṃ te pratibhānaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4388: bhūyasyā mātrayā tvaṃ mahākāruṇikāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hitakaro bahukaraścotpanno,
K10bsu018_u:4389: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ mahākāruṇika tathāgatamidamevaṃrūpaṃ praśnaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /
K10bsu018_u:4390: tena hi mahākāruṇika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru ca /
K10bsu018_u:4391: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ asti mahākāruṇika śūraṃgamo nāma samādhiryatra samādhau sthito bodhisattvaḥ sarvasamādhiṣvanupraviṣṭo bhavati
K10bsu018_u:4392: asti ratnamudro nāma samādhiryena sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti /
K10bsu018_u:4393: asti siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiryatra sthitaḥ sarvasamādhibhirvikrīḍati /
K10bsu018_u:4397: vilokitamudro nāma samādhiḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ murdhānaṃ vyavalokayati /
K10bsu018_u:4399: niyatadhvajaketau samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati /
K10bsu018_u:4402: samādhirājasupratiṣṭhitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu rājatvena pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:4423: vairocanena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn bhāvayati tapati virocati /
K10bsu018_u:4425: vibhajati / animiṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo na kadācit samādhidharmā eṣante /
K10bsu018_u:4429: niścittena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prahīyante /
K10bsu018_u:4444: akṣayavatena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ na kṣayaṃ nākṣayaṃ darśayati /
K10bsu018_u:4448: aniñjitena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu neñjati na vepati na prapañcayati /
K10bsu018_u:4449: vivardhanena samādhinā sarvasamādhisamāpattiṣu vivardhamānāṃ jñeyaṃ samanupaśyati /
K10bsu018_u:4452: śuddhapratibhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu catasraḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ pratilabhate /
K10bsu018_u:4453: kārākāreṇa samādhinā kāravihārakriyāṃ karoti jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati /
K10bsu018_u:4454: vajropamena samādhinā sarvadharmānnirvedhīkaroti yasya vedhamapi na samanupaśyati /
K10bsu018_u:4456: na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,
K10bsu018_u:4460: ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate /
K10bsu018_u:4463: ratiṃ (KpSū 334) jahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ratiṃ jahāti /
K10bsu018_u:4489: jñānolkāmatā samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu tena bhāsati tapati virocati /
K10bsu018_u:4500: vimalaprabhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu saṃskṛtavimalaṃ na samanupaśyati /
K10bsu018_u:4508: tathāsthitanīścittena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu tathatā na vinivartate /
K10bsu018_u:4514: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhasaṃgraho dharmaparyāyaḥ?
K10bsu018_u:4558: punarapi kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato mahābodhisattvaparṣadaṃ vyavalokya mahākāruṇikaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4562: yo 'parigrahacittaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ sa ucyate mahāvaiśāradyaśramaṇadharmo yasyākāśapāṇisamacittaṃ sarvadharmeṣu /
K10bsu018_u:4564: kathaṃ ca punaḥ kṣāntyā paripūrirbhavati? aṇurapi (KpSū 342)
K10bsu018_u:4568: muditā ca nirjīvitā copekṣā ca niṣpudgalatā ca,
K10bsu018_u:4603: asmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ ye daśabhyo
K10bsu018_u:4607: śākyamunistathāgata āha - “asya khalu punaḥ kulaputra dharmaparyāyasya ratnagarbhasya
K10bsu018_u:4611: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasya samādhānamukhanirdeśasya saṃbhāraviśuddhimukhadharmaparyāyasya sakalaparipūrṇaṃ viśuddhajñānādhigamo babhūva” //
K10bsu018_u:4612: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena prāmodyaprasādena viṃśativarṣasadṛśaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃvṛtto,
K10bsu018_u:4615: putrasahasreṇāśītibhiśca koṭṭarājasahasrairanyaiśca dvānavatibhiḥ prāṇakoṭibhiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ śīlaśrutasamādhisauratyairabhiyogakṛtavān
K10bsu018_u:4616: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrveṇa caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrāvakayānakathāṃ paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca;
K10bsu018_u:4618: tataḥ śatasahasramanuttaramahāyānakathāyāṃ tathā kāyasmṛtyupasthānakathāyāmuddiṣṭavān paṭhitavān paryavāptavāṃśca,
K10bsu018_u:4631: yāvadapareṇa kālasamayena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4632: sa ca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ nānāvidhāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā vādyapuṣpacūrṇāmālyagandhavilepanacchatradhvajapatākāratnaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān,
K10bsu018_u:4634: śarīrapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kṛtavān pañcayojanamuccatvenārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa /
K10bsu018_u:4636: punarapi tatrāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4637: sa teṣāṃ saptānāṃ divasānāmatyayena caturaśītibhiḥ prāṇasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya
K10bsu018_u:4639: pravrajya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavān;
K10bsu018_u:4642: tatra cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvāṃstribhiryānaiḥ samādāpayāmāsa niveśayāmāsa pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
K10bsu018_u:4644: upāsakasaṃvare ca śrāmaṇerasaṃvare upasaṃpadāyāṃ bhikṣubhāve brahmacaryavāsasaṃvare niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4645: sa bahūni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi abhijñarddhikauśalye ca niyojayitvā sauratyabrahmacaryavāse
K10bsu018_u:4646: niyojayitvā śatrubhūteṣu ca skandhesu parijñāyāṃ niyojayitvā śūnyagrāmāyatanaparijñāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:4649: darśayitvā āryāṣṭāṅge mārge pratiṣṭhāpayitvā kālaṃ kṛtavān /
K10bsu018_u:4650: evameva ca te sattvāstasya mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto,
K10bsu018_u:4652: evameva tasmin samaye te sattvā mahākāruṇikasya mahāśramaṇasya śarīreṣu śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtavanto /
K10bsu018_u:4654: mahāśramaṇaḥ kālagatastasmin divase ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya saddharmo 'ntarhitastaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyatra lokadhātuṣūpapattiḥ parigṛhītāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4656: kecin manusyeṣu kecinnāgeṣu kecidasureṣu kecit praṇidhānena vividhāsu tiryagyoniṣūpapannāḥ //
K10bsu018_u:4657: kālagataśca kulaputra mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇaḥ praṇidhānavaśena dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśāyāmito
K10bsu018_u:4659: tatra manuṣyā akuśalamūlasamavadhānā raudrā lohitapāṇayaḥ pāpaniviṣṭā adayāpannaḥ
K10bsu018_u:4661: praṇidhānavaśena mahākāruṇiko mahāśramaṇastatra saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetre caṇḍālakula upapanno 'bhūt /
K10bsu018_u:4662: sa cātīvadīrghaśarīro 'bhūdatīvabalavān atīvavegavān atīvasmṛtimān atīvapratibhānavān atīvajavasamanvāgato 'bhūt /
K10bsu018_u:4663: sa dṛḍhena balavegena sattvān saṃgṛhītvāha - “yadi yūyaṃ bho sattvā adattādānāt prativiramata,
K10bsu018_u:4666: tadahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ jīvitaṃ prayacchāmi jīvitopakaraṇāni ca dāsyāmi /
K10bsu018_u:4670: “vayamidānīn tava nāthasya vacanenādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvamadattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭyāḥ prativiramāmaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:4671: sa balacaṇḍālo gatvā rājño vā rājabhaṭṭānāṃ vā nivedayati /
K10bsu018_u:4672: “jīvitopakaraṇena me prayojanamannena vā pānena vā khādyena vā bhojyena vā peyavastraśayyāgandhahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍarajatajātarūpeṇa
K10bsu018_u:4674: sa balacaṇḍālaḥ sattvān yāvajjīvaṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:4676: yaśca tatra rājā sa kālagataḥ tatastai rājāmātyaiḥ sa balacaṇḍālo rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ puṇyabalo nāma saṃskṛtaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4677: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇaiva taṃ viṣayamanuśāsitavān,
K10bsu018_u:4680: yāvad rājā puṇyabalo na cireṇa sarvajambūdvīpe rājā balacakravartī babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:4681: yadā ca rājñā puṇyabalena sarvajambūdvīpe rājatvaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ tataḥ paścāt sattvāḥ prāṇātipātaviramaṇe samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
K10bsu018_u:4683: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4684: atha rājā puṇyabalaḥ sarvajambūdvīpikāṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu saṃniyojya sarvajambūdvīpe ghoṣamanuśrāvayamāsa
K10bsu018_u:4685: “ye kecid yācanakā annārthikā yāvad ratnārthikā vā te sarva āgacchantu /
K10bsu018_u:4687: tato 'pareṇa kālasamayena sarvajambūdvīpikāḥ sattvā āgatvā rājānaṃ puṇyabalaṃ yācitavantaḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4693: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mahārāja lokapradīpo jina” iti /
K10bsu018_u:4695: pāṃśughoṣa ājīvika āha - “ahaṃ mahārāja vidyādharatvamicchāmi mahāsurasaṃgrāmapramardanakalpaṃ sādhayituṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4696: tenāhaṃ tava purataḥ sthitvā vijñāpayāmi jīvataḥ puruṣasya carmaṇā prayojanaṃ cakṣuṣā ca prayojanaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:4697: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabala evaṃ cintayati /
K10bsu018_u:4699: gaṇanātikrāntaśca sattvā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitā,
K10bsu018_u:4701: ayaṃ ca me kalyāṇamitro 'sārāt kāyāt sāramādadāmi” /
K10bsu018_u:4702: sa rājāha - “tuṣṭo bhava dadāmi te imaṃ prākṛtamāṃsacakṣustenāhaṃ labheyānuttaraṃ dharmacakṣuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4703: dadāmi te imaṃ svakaṃ carma prasannacittena,
K10bsu018_u:4705: atha kulaputra rājā puṇyabalo dakṣiṇena hastenobhau netrāvutpādyājīvikasya datvā rudhiramrakṣitena mukhenāha /
K10bsu018_u:4706: “śṛṇvantu me iha devayakṣamaharddhikā ye kecinnarā ye 'surā ye ca bhūtā ihāgatāḥ khecarā bhūmau sthitā ye narā,
K10bsu018_u:4707: bodhāya mayā dānaṃ nāmitaṃ śubhaṃ prāpsye 'haṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4709: ghorāt saṃsārārṇavāt pāre 'nuttare nirvāṇe śive sthāpayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:4712: tāvacciraṃ mama jīvitendriyaṃ mā nirudhyeta mā ca me smṛtirnaśyeta mā ca me vipratisāro bhaved,
K10bsu018_u:4713: yāvacciramasyājīvikasya sā vidyā na siddhā bhavet” /
K10bsu018_u:4715: sa ca kulaputra pāṃśughoṣājīvikastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā rājño dhriyataḥ kāyaccarmamapanetvā carma gṛhītvā vidyāṃ sādhayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:4716: tathā saptadivasāni rājñaḥ puṇyabalasya jīvitendriyaṃ na niruddhaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4718: na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
K10bsu018_u:4720: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva,
K10bsu018_u:4721: na cānyo draṣṭavyo 'haṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahākāruṇiko nāma babhūva ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā /
K10bsu018_u:4723: prathamacittotpādena ca me gaṇānātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:4724: ayaṃ me prathamaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
K10bsu018_u:4725: so 'haṃ praṇidhānavaśena tataścyavitvā saṃkarṣaṇe buddhakṣetra upapannaścaṇḍālakule dvitīyaḥ śūrabhāvaḥ śūrakāryaṃ ca /
K10bsu018_u:4727: sthitvā sattvāṃ kuśale niyojya svabalaparākrameṇa yāvadbalacakravartitvaṃ prāptaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4731: yadā ca me svanetrāḥ parityaktāḥ svacarmaparityāgaśca /
K10bsu018_u:4732: so 'haṃ tataścyutastatraiva saṃkarṣaṇe kṣetre dvitīye dvīpe praṇidhānavaśena caṇḍālakula upapannaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4733: peyālaṃ, tatra ca mayaivaṃrūpeṇa dṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇa sattvānniyojayitvā kuśaleṣu karmeṣu,
K10bsu018_u:4737: tatra ca svaśarīrāt jihvā karṇau ca parityaktau,
K10bsu018_u:4738: yāvat sarvan tatsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ mahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4739: praṇidhānadṛḍhavīryaparākrameṇānuprabandhena praṇidhānavaśena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu evaṃrūpaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraṃ kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4743: ityarthaṃ kulaputrānyeṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4744: yadā te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhicaryāṃ caramāṇā na parāmāpattyā (KpSū 354)
K10bsu018_u:4745: codayanti, na ca parasya bhayaṃ darśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:4747: ityarthaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ paripūrṇābhiprāyāṇāṃ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhavati /
K10bsu018_u:4754: na ca tatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya nāma prajñaptiprādurbhāvo 'sti /
K10bsu018_u:4755: yadā ca mayā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu mahākalpeṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
K10bsu018_u:4756: buddhakṣetreṣu paruṣavacanabhayena sattvāḥ prāṇātipātavairamaṇye samādāpitā yāvattriṣu
K10bsu018_u:4758: (KpSū 355) tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa ma etarhyevaṃ parikliṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ akuśalaśabdenāpūritaṃ akuśalamūlasamavadhānagataiḥ sattvaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4760: yathā ca me pūrvaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4761: yādṛśāśca me sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstadṛśenaiva balavīryodyogena bodhicārikāḥ cīrṇāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4762: yādṛśaṃ caiva bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pratilabdhaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4764: saṃkṣiptena te kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ kathayiṣyāmi yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4765: na kenacit pūrvaṃ bodhisattvenaivaṃrūpaḥ dānaparityāgaḥ parityaktaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4766: na ca punaḥ kaścidbodhisattvo bhaviṣyati ya evaṃrūpaṃ dānaparityāgaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ parityajati,
K10bsu018_u:4767: yathā mayā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇena dānaṃ parityaktaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4771: sarvaghoṣāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃkaramardārcirnāma tathāgato varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:4775: varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtavān gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā kalpātikrāntāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4777: adyāpi tasya mahākāruṇikasya śarīrāṇi śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakāryaṃ kurvanti /
K10bsu018_u:4778: evaṃ ca vadanti sārakusumito bodhisattvo dṛḍhavīryasamādhāno balavegaparityāgena bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
K10bsu018_u:4780: nāma bhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre tatrāsau satpuruṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyati,
K10bsu018_u:4781: sahetukṛṣṇavidhvaṃsanarājo nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvad buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:4783: nāma bodhisattvaḥ satpuruṣa ekasya mahākalpasyātyayena paścimāyāṃ diśi bhairavatī
K10bsu018_u:4784: nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati pañcakaṣāye varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
K10bsu018_u:4785: sūryagarbhārcivimalendro nāma bhaviṣyati tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:4786: ayaṃ punaḥ saṃrocano gaṇanātikrāntaiḥ kalpairnirdiṣṭitairuparimasyāṃ diśi kṣāravarcanikuñjitāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:4787: lokadhātau pañcakaṣāye tīvrakaluṣasaṃkṣobhaṇe kalpe 'sau saṃrocanaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena
K10bsu018_u:4790: acintyarocano nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati yāvad buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu018_u:4791: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena daśavarṣāni sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati
K10bsu018_u:4794: tataḥ paścādasau prahasitabāhurbodhisattvastatra ca kṣāravarcanikuñjite buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
K10bsu018_u:4796: so 'pi daśavarṣāṇi sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati /
K10bsu018_u:4797: tasya ca parinirvṛtasya pūrvapraṇidhānena saptavarṣāṇi saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
K10bsu018_u:4798: atra dvau satpuruṣau labdhapūrvavyākaraṇau labdhāsvādāvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu018_u:4799: bhagavataḥ purataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prītisaumanasyaprāmodyena saptatālamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe
K10bsu018_u:4801: “virocase buddha yathaiva sūrya abhyudgato merurimasmiṃ loke /
K10bsu018_u:4802: viśuddhacakṣurvirajā vināyakā ālokabhūtā sugatā namo 'stu te //
K10bsu018_u:4803: bahūni kalpāna ti vīryabhāvitā paryeṣamāṇena ti agrabodhi /
K10bsu018_u:4805: bahujinā pūjitā pūrve ye tvayā na caiva te vyākarṣīmatitanāyakāḥ //
K10bsu018_u:4806: prahīṇarāgā parimuktacittā kṛtaṃ ti kāryamiha sarvaloke /
K10bsu018_u:4807: praṇaṣṭamārgāṇa deśesi dharmaṃ sattvāṃśca uttārayase bhavārṇavāt //
K10bsu018_u:4808: vayaṃ pi pravrajya svayaṃbhūśāsane yā prātimokṣa jina śikṣa deśitā /
K10bsu018_u:4809: vayaṃ pi śikṣitva samāhitendriyā tavaiva āsanna sadā bhavemaḥ //
K10bsu018_u:4815: te catvāro dharaṇidatto vīryasaṃcodanaḥ sārakusumitaḥ prajñārciḥsaṃkopitadaṣṭaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4816: ime ṣaṭsatpuruṣā mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāstāṃ śṛṇu /
K10bsu018_u:4818: yadāsīttena kālena tena samayenedaṃ buddhakṣetramarajamerujugupsitaṃ nāmābhut,
K10bsu018_u:4819: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmapratirūpake (KpSū 361)
K10bsu018_u:4820: vartamāne 'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:4822: te 'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavantaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4823: sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4830: , yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito 'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4841: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi /
K10bsu018_u:4843: āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā /
K10bsu018_u:4844: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:4847: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4848: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4858: “]tato 'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot /
K10bsu018_u:4862: yathā tyajāmi priyarūpasaṃpadaṃ na śakrabrahmāṇa na mārakāraṇāt /
K10bsu018_u:4863: arthaṃ karo bheṣyasi devaloke bhaveyaṃ mahyaṃ bahumānsaśoṇitaṃ //
K10bsu018_u:4864: śṛṇvantu nāgā naradevayakṣā ye devatā śailagirau nivāsiṇaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4865: kṛpā mamotpannaya sattvahetoḥ tarpaṣya sattvāṃ svakamāṃsaśoṇitaiḥ” //
K10bsu018_u:4875: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
K10bsu018_u:4877: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4884: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
K10bsu018_u:4889: (KpSū 365) ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
K10bsu018_u:4904: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:4912: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4914: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
K10bsu018_u:4917: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4921: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
K10bsu018_u:4922: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4923: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4924: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4926: buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu svakāyajīvitena sattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4928: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
K10bsu018_u:4930: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ
K10bsu018_u:4931: mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4933: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
K10bsu018_u:4934: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā /
K10bsu018_u:4935: ye 'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
K10bsu018_u:4936: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4937: paśya (KpSū 368) kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena
K10bsu018_u:4938: tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet /
K10bsu018_u:4940: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
K10bsu018_u:4942: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī /
K10bsu018_u:4943: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā,
K10bsu018_u:4947: paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4951: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4952: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti (KpSū 369)
K10bsu018_u:4959: yaddevasya divasedivase 'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate
K10bsu018_u:4964: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:4965: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
K10bsu018_u:4966: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4967: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4970: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4971: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
K10bsu018_u:4972: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro
K10bsu018_u:4973: duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko 'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:4975: yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti paridevanti,
K10bsu018_u:4977: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:4983: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot
K10bsu018_u:4985: hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā
K10bsu018_u:4987: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:4988: labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu” /
K10bsu018_u:4990: te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ :
K10bsu018_u:4994: sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ;
K10bsu018_u:4995: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:4997: (KpSū 372) evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho 'bhūvan,
K10bsu018_u:4998: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
K10bsu018_u:5000: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5004: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5005: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo 'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5006: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
K10bsu018_u:5011: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5012: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ
K10bsu018_u:5013: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
K10bsu018_u:5021: “yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā (KpSū 374)
K10bsu018_u:5022: nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5024: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5026: tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:5028: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5040: devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu
K10bsu018_u:5043: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5044: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5049: anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5050: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5052: jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
K10bsu018_u:5055: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5056: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye 'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
K10bsu018_u:5058: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt /
K10bsu018_u:5060: caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:5061: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5063: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
K10bsu018_u:5071: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:5073: “yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ
K10bsu018_u:5075: yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5076: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5077: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
K10bsu018_u:5079: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ (KpSū 378)
K10bsu018_u:5080: ca, yadasmiṃ buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpaṃ śūrabhāvaṃ kuryāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5081: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ“,
K10bsu018_u:5083: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ
K10bsu018_u:5085: ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:5086: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño 'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5089: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati” /
K10bsu018_u:5096: atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati” /
K10bsu018_u:5097: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño 'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
K10bsu018_u:5099: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,
K10bsu018_u:5103: yo 'yaṃ mamaitarhi sarvajambūdvīpe rājā pratiṣṭhāpito vartatvasya jambūdvīpe ājñā,
K10bsu018_u:5108: roco nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau pādau yācitau,
K10bsu018_u:5109: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,
K10bsu018_u:5112: (KpSū 380) tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
K10bsu018_u:5113: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
K10bsu018_u:5116: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
K10bsu018_u:5117: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
K10bsu018_u:5126: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
K10bsu018_u:5127: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
K10bsu018_u:5129: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5135: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5142: na ca me roṣa utpāditastena me āśā paripūryatu,
K10bsu018_u:5144: ye kecit sattvā mānsāhārā rudhirapānāste māṃsaṃ bhakṣayantu rudhiraṃ pibeyantu /
K10bsu018_u:5145: yāvacca (KpSū 382) me sattvā māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyū rudhiraṃ ca pibeyustāvan me praṇidhānavaśena śarīraṃ vardhatu,
K10bsu018_u:5146: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa /
K10bsu018_u:5147: tatra mayā varṣasahasraṃ svamānsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā;
K10bsu018_u:5148: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena
K10bsu018_u:5149: cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya
K10bsu018_u:5151: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:5152: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
K10bsu018_u:5156: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5160: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca
K10bsu018_u:5165: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
K10bsu018_u:5166: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5167: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
K10bsu018_u:5168: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5173: ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5175: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
K10bsu018_u:5177: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:5178: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
K10bsu018_u:5180: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5181: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti /
K10bsu018_u:5189: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
K10bsu018_u:5191: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena (KpSū 385)
K10bsu018_u:5193: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ
K10bsu018_u:5196: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5199: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
K10bsu018_u:5200: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5203: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5205: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
K10bsu018_u:5207: śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5208: yathā ca mayā bahavaḥ sattvā bhayāt kuśalacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:5209: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ
K10bsu018_u:5211: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
K10bsu018_u:5213: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5220: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5224: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
K10bsu018_u:5226: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //
K10bsu018_u:5228: VI (EPILOGUE) yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān,
K10bsu018_u:5229: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5230: ye mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5231: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5232: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5236: saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:5237: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
K10bsu018_u:5238: mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitāḥ, peyālaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5239: purimāyāṃ diśi abhiratye buddhakṣetre akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato,
K10bsu018_u:5255: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi
