K10bsu018_u:5256: ye 'nutpāditabodhicittāḥ pūrve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
K10bsu018_u:5257: mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau”
K10bsu018_u:5258: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5260: tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tameva tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5261: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?“]iti /
K10bsu018_u:5262: sa tathāgatastānavocat - “asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya
K10bsu018_u:5263: tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:5264: sa etarhi caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:5265: tena tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādapitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5267: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:5268: tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
K10bsu018_u:5269: yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu018_u:5270: sa ca me śākyamunistathāgataḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ sahe lokadhātau tiṣṭhati yāpayati,
K10bsu018_u:5271: sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu018_u:5274: madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?” /
K10bsu018_u:5276: “]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste
K10bsu018_u:5280: “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāya” /
K10bsu018_u:5284: “tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:5285: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo vividhānyarciṃṣi pramumoca /
K10bsu018_u:5288: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5289: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5290: “paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5291: nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5292: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato 'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati” /
K10bsu018_u:5293: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgatasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmevamāha - “samantacakṣuḥ kulaputrāḥ śākyamunistathāgato /
K10bsu018_u:5294: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
K10bsu018_u:5295: “maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati” /
K10bsu018_u:5296: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ /
K10bsu018_u:5297: (KpSū 394) ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti,
K10bsu018_u:5306: ye maheśvarabhaktikāste sattvā maheśvararūpavarṇasaṃsthānavacanavyāhāreṇa śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
K10bsu018_u:5307: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti”
K10bsu018_u:5308: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5310: “gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha” /
K10bsu018_u:5314: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:5315: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgata āha - “mā kulaputrā evaṃ vadatha,
K10bsu018_u:5325: ekasmiṃ samaye kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5328: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā,
K10bsu018_u:5331: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe
K10bsu018_u:5332: lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya
K10bsu018_u:5334: sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān;
K10bsu018_u:5335: sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ vipulā ca prādurbhūtā,
K10bsu018_u:5336: yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma /
K10bsu018_u:5337: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
K10bsu018_u:5338: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
K10bsu018_u:5340: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:5341: pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5342: aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā /
K10bsu018_u:5345: sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati /
K10bsu018_u:5349: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:5352: atha pañcaśikho vīṇāṃ manojñena gītavāditena bhagavato 'nubhāvena pañcabhiḥ stavaśatairbhagavato varṇamabhāṣata /
K10bsu018_u:5353: yadā ca kulaputra pañcaśikha ārabdho bhagavato 'bhistavanāya tataḥ sa śākyamunirbhagavān
K10bsu018_u:5354: sughoṣavairocanaketuṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannastena samādhinā ye sahe lokadhātau maharddhikayakṣarākṣasā
K10bsu018_u:5355: vāsurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā vā gandharvā vā sarve kāmāvacarā devā sarve
K10bsu018_u:5356: rūpāvacarā devaputrāstatra sannipātā babhūvurye ca svarabhaktikāste svaraṃ śrutvā prasīdanti,
K10bsu018_u:5360: tataḥ śākyamunirbhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya sālaguhāyā dvāraṃ darśāpayāmāsa /
K10bsu018_u:5363: sa śākyamunistathāgata uvāca - “niṣīdadhvaṃ yakṣā yāvattasthuḥ samāgatāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:5364: tataḥ sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā saṃsthitā yathā dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamā yakṣāstatra guhāyāṃ praviṣṭā,
K10bsu018_u:5365: niṣaṇṇāyāśca tasyāḥ parṣadaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgatastathārūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:5366: yathā ye tasmin parṣadi śrāvakayānikā niṣaṇṇāste śrāvakayānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti,
K10bsu018_u:5368: ye ca tatra parṣadi anuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhayānikāste śuddhāṃ mahāyānakathāṃ śṛṇvanti;
K10bsu018_u:5369: tatra ca pañcaśikhagandharvapūrvaṃgamā aṣṭādaśanayutā avaivartikāḥ saṃsthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
K10bsu018_u:5375: sa ca tatra kauśikaḥ śakro bhayātparimukto,
K10bsu018_u:5380: na śakyaṃ kenacittasya tathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalasya paryantamudgṛhītuṃ vā gaṇāyituṃ vā /
K10bsu018_u:5386: yāvantaśca sattvā etarhi tatra sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitā yadi te sattvāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya
K10bsu018_u:5387: kukṣau praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyuste ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasyaikaromamukhe
K10bsu018_u:5389: te ekaromamukhāttasya tathāgatasya na śaktāḥ paryantamudgṛhītuṃ ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vāntaśo (KpSū 400)
K10bsu018_u:5393: yāvantaśca daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikasamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ
K10bsu018_u:5394: sattvaistadyathāpi nāmaitarhi sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarve te sattvā etarhi sahe buddhakṣetre
K10bsu018_u:5397: ] tathaiva tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ babhūva /
K10bsu018_u:5399: sacetkulaputra yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sahasraṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrā evaṃ vistīrṇāḥ
K10bsu018_u:5400: tadyathaitarhi sahabuddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇaṃ sattvaiḥ te sarve etarhi sahe lokadhātau
K10bsu018_u:5401: praviśeyuste sarve tatra vicareyurevaṃrūpaṃ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ prathamacittotpāditānuttarajñānapratilābhāya
K10bsu018_u:5406: gacchatha paścimāṃ diśaṃ yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5407: mama vacanena taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ ārogyakauśalyaṃ pṛcchata” /
K10bsu018_u:5408: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgataścandrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā raharājasya bodhisattvasya
K10bsu018_u:5409: jyotiraśmeśca bodhisattvasya datvāha - “gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:5411: “]vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gacchemaḥ tathāgatānubhāvena sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ tasya śākyamunestathāgatasya darśanāye vandanāya paryupāsanāya” /
K10bsu018_u:5413: tau ca dvau bodhisattvau raharājaśca jyotiraśmiśca sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya
K10bsu018_u:5414: vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasya riddhibalena tataḥ saṃpuṣpitāyā lokadhātoḥ saṃprasthitā
K10bsu018_u:5415: ekacittakṣaṇenedaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthātaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5418: purastime digbhāge ekonanavatibuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyatikramya tatra saṃpuṣpito nāma lokadhātuḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5420: sa ca punastathāgato bodhisattvagaṇaparivārastathāgatasya guṇavarṇakīrtayamāna evamāha - “śākyamunirnāma tathāgataḥ sahe buddhakṣetre tiṣṭhati yāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:5421: tena ca tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenāhaṃ sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5422: samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitastasya ca vacanena mayānuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5423: samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ niveśito,
K10bsu018_u:5426: yathā teneme candrarocavimalā puṣpāḥ preṣitā ārogyakauśalyaṃ ca pṛcchati” /
K10bsu018_u:5428: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipattitaste cāpi dṛṣṭvākṣobhyasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ paripṛcchanti sma /
K10bsu018_u:5431: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ purimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvā imaṃ sahaṃ
K10bsu018_u:5432: buddhakṣetraṃ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya paripṛcchanāya
K10bsu018_u:5434: samanantaraparivāsito bhagavataḥ purimāyāṃ diśi buddhakṣetranāma parikīrtanaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5437: tatra sarvaśokāpagato nāma lokadhātustatrāśokaśrīrnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyati yāpayati /
K10bsu018_u:5438: mayā sa bhagavān sarvaprathamaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caramāṇenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
K10bsu018_u:5457: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyāsanāni kaṃpanti /
K10bsu018_u:5458: sarve te buddhā bhagantaḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya varṇaṃ yaśaḥ kīrtimudīrayanti /
K10bsu018_u:5459: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathāgatadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ
K10bsu018_u:5460: puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptāḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya pṛcchanāya yāvaddharmaśravaṇāya” /
K10bsu018_u:5461: punaśca bhagavān āha - “paśyāmyahaṃ kulaputra paścimāyāṃ diśīto buddhakṣetrāt saptānavatibuddhakṣetranayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya
K10bsu018_u:5462: tatropaśāntamatirnāma buddhakṣetrastatra ratnagirirnāma tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyati
K10bsu018_u:5464: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito, (KpSū 406)
K10bsu018_u:5477: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ paścimāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yeṣāṃ śākyamuninā tathāgatena nāmāni parikīrtitāni teṣāmāsanāni kaṃpanti /
K10bsu018_u:5478: yāvattena samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhadūtā bodhisattvāḥ sahacandrarocavimalaiḥ puṣpairimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramanuprāptā yāvanniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu018_u:5488: mayā sa tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena sarvaprathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpito,
K10bsu018_u:5490: yāvanmayā sarvaprathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
K10bsu018_u:5493: yāvaccaturaśītisattvānāṃ varṇabhaktisaṃsthānarūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi tathā śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
K10bsu018_u:5495: ekaḥ vigopaśikharo nāma dvitīyaḥ saṃrocanabuddho nāma;
K10bsu018_u:5496: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājo nāma tathāgatastau dvau bodhisattvavāmantrayitvaivamāha - “gacchata yūyaṃ kulaputrau sahe buddhakṣetre,
K10bsu018_u:5500: “sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavannāvāṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5501: na ca tatraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau vā gagane vā yatrāvāṃ pratiṣṭhevahi” /
K10bsu018_u:5502: sa ca tathāgata āha - “mā kulaputraivaṃ vadata,
K10bsu018_u:5513: ekasmin samaye kulaputra sa śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā viṣamaśailendraparvatamadhye indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati sma,
K10bsu018_u:5519: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhyo digbhyaḥ dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sahe lokadhātau saṃprāptāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya /
K10bsu018_u:5521: gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ candrarocavimalāṃ puṣpāṃ;
K10bsu018_u:5523: yathā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ;
K10bsu018_u:5525: sa ca vigatasaṃtāpodbhavavaiśravaṇasālarājastathāgataḥ candrarocavimalān puṣpāṃ gṛhītvā vigopaśikharasya bodhisattvasya dadāti saṃrocanabuddhasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K10bsu018_u:5526: evaṃ cāha - “gacchata kulaputrau mamarddhibalādhānena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ” /
K10bsu018_u:5528: (KpSū 410) “vayamapi bhagavan gamiṣyāmastathāgatasyānubhāvena sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya” /
K10bsu018_u:5530: tatastau dvau bodhisattvau sārdhaṃ viṃśatibhirbodhisattvasahasraistasya tathāgatasya riddhyanubhāvena tato virajādbuddhakṣetrātsaṃprasthitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5538: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāḥ sannipatitāste cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathāgatasyāsanaṃ kaṃpitaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti,
K10bsu018_u:5542: yāvattena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā uttarapurimāyāṃ diśi tathāgatāste bodhisattvāḥ
K10bsu018_u:5545: tāvadeva śākyamunistathāgata ṛddhyanubhāvena sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye sahe buddhakṣetre sannipatitāsteṣāṃ ekaikasya sattvasya yojanapramāṇamātramātmabhāvaḥ
K10bsu018_u:5546: sarvāvantaṃ ca sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ evaṃrūpaiḥ sattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5547: na kaścidbuddhakṣetre kṣitau vā gagane vāvakāśo yaḥ sattvairasphuṭo 'ntaśo 'ñjanaśalākāpradeśamātramapi yaḥ sattvebhyo na sphuṭo 'bhūt /
K10bsu018_u:5548: sarve ca te sattvāḥ śūnyamākāśaṃ paśyanti,
K10bsu018_u:5552: divyā vimānā ūrddhaṃ yāvadadho kāñcanacakraṃ tatorddhaṃ pṛthivī cakṣuṣo nābhāsamāgacchanti,
K10bsu018_u:5555: tatra ca bhagavān ākāśasphuraṇaṃ dharmāvacchedapraśrabdhisamādhiṃ samāpanno /
K10bsu018_u:5556: yataste candrarocavimalāḥ puṣpāḥ sarvaromamukhesu bhagavataḥ praviśanti /
K10bsu018_u:5557: sarve ca te sattvāḥ paśyanti sahe lokadhātāvantargatā vigatāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaitasikeṣu manasikārarūpasaṃdarśanatāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5558: te caiva bhagavato romamukhe nirīkṣante sma /
K10bsu018_u:5560: nānāratnavṛkṣaṃ nānāpatraṃ nānāpuṣpaṃ nānāphalākīrṇāṃ nānāvastraṃ nānācchatradhvajapatākākeyūramuktikāhārālaṅkṛtāṃstāṃ vṛkṣāṃ paśyanti,
K10bsu018_u:5567: sarve pariśiṣṭāḥ sattvāstasya tathāgatasya romamukhebhyastathāgataśarīre praviṣṭāḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5571: maitreyo bodhisattva āha - “saṃprajānaṃ tataḥ sattvāḥ samanvāharata sarve vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣau sannipatitāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:5572: tataste sattvāḥ sāntarabāhiraṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ pratyakṣībhūtā “yathā vayaṃ tathāgatasya kukṣāvantargatāḥ sannipatitāśca“,
K10bsu018_u:5576: tato maitreyaḥ sarvāvatī parṣadaṃ svareṇa vijñapayannuvāca - “śṛṇvantu bhavantastathāgatasyaivamṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ
K10bsu018_u:5577: yadasmākaṃ hitakaraḥ śāstā dharmaṃ deśayati tadyuṣmābhiḥ sarvacetasā samanvāhartavyāḥ” /
K10bsu018_u:5597: imasya khalu punardharmaparyāyasya bhāṣyamāṇasyāśītikoṭīgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāḥ sattvāstathāgatasya kukṣigatā avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau;
K10bsu018_u:5598: gaṇanātikrāntāśca tatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye nānāvidhadhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā abhūn /
K10bsu018_u:5603: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ purimāṃ diśaṃ gacchanti aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5604: purimāyāṃ diśi yadbuddhakṣetrānatikrāmanti na ca śākyamunestathāgatasya svaramaṇḍalaṃ pratihanyate,
K10bsu018_u:5605: evaṃ ca tatra svaraṃ śṛṇvanti vicitrapadārthavyañjanāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5608: (KpSū 416) api ca tatrāpi śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
K10bsu018_u:5609: śākyamunestathāgatasya kāyaḥ sphuṭo dṛśyate bodhisattvaiḥ śrāvakaiścāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā
K10bsu018_u:5610: bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāścaikaromamukhe śākyamunestathāgatasya praviśanto niṣkrāmantaśca saṃdṛśyante /
K10bsu018_u:5614: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā yāvadbhagavataḥ kāyāntargatāḥ sā bhagavataḥ kāyaromamukhebhyo
K10bsu018_u:5615: niṣkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇī kṛtvā bhagavato
K10bsu018_u:5617: atha tāvaccaiva kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā vicitrāṃ ca gandhamālyavilepanavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣitā,
K10bsu018_u:5620: tatra vaiśāradyasamuddhāraṇirnāma bodhisattvo yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - (KpSū 417)
K10bsu018_u:5632: punarapyāha - “kiyantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:5633: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi?” /
K10bsu018_u:5636: yaḥ kaścidimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati antaśa ekagāthāmapi,
K10bsu018_u:5637: yaśca punaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāmantaśo likhitvā dhārayiṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:5639: na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5641: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5663: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:5667: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya;
K10bsu018_u:5669: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān /
K10bsu018_u:5670: bhagavān āha - “udgṛhṇa tvaṃ maharṣa imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ,
K10bsu018_u:5671: yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ deśāntaragatānāmavaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karṇapuṭeṣu prakāśasva /
K10bsu018_u:5673: atikrāmantā yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu018_u:5674: samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K10bsu018_u:5676: (KpSū 420) ahaṃ ca sattvānāṃ svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ udgṛhīṣyati,
K10bsu018_u:5678: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
K10bsu018_u:5681: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu018_u:5682: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ //
